trans-unit.source: IS_IPV4() has been available since MariaDB 10.0.12.
trans-unit.target: 自MariaDB 10.0.12起，IS_IPV4（）已可用。

trans-unit.source: IS_IPV4() is stricter than INET_ATON(), but as strict as INET6_ATON(), in determining the validity of an IPv4 address. This implies that if IS_IPV4 returns 1, the same expression will always return a non-NULL result when passed to INET_ATON(), but that the reverse may not apply.
trans-unit.target: IS_IPV4（）比严格INET_ATON（） ，但那样严格INET6_ATON（） ，在确定的IPv4地址的有效性。这意味着如果IS_IPV4返回1，则当传递给INET_ATON（）时，相同的表达式将始终返回非NULL结果，但相反的情况可能并不适用。

trans-unit.source: Identifier name '%s' is too long
trans-unit.target: 标识符名称'%s'太长。

trans-unit.source: Identifier names may begin with a numeral, but can't only contain numerals unless quoted.
trans-unit.target: 识别符名称可以以数字开头,但不能只包含数字,除非加引号。

trans-unit.source: Identifier quotes can themselves be used as part of an identifier, as long as they are quoted.
trans-unit.target: 只要引用了标识符引号,标识符引号本身就可以作为标识符的一部分使用。

trans-unit.source: Identifier to File Name Mapping
trans-unit.target: 识别符到文件名的映射

trans-unit.source: Identifiers are not permitted to contain the ASCII NUL character (U+0000) and supplementary characters (U+10000 and higher).
trans-unit.target: 标识符不允许包含ASCII NUL字符(U+0000)和补充字符(U+10000及以上)。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers are stored as Unicode (UTF-8)
trans-unit.target: 标识符以Unicode(UTF-8)方式存储。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers may be quoted using the backtick character - `. Quoting is optional for identifiers that don't contain special characters, or for identifiers that are not reserved words. If the ANSI_QUOTESSQL_MODE flag is set, double quotes (") can also be used to quote identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 标识符可以使用反引号字符被引用- ` 。对于不包含特殊字符的标识符或不是保留字的标识符，报价是可选的。如果设置了 ANSI_QUOTES SQL_MODE标志，则也可以使用双引号（ " ）来引用标识符。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers may or may not be case-sensitive. See Indentifier Case-sensitivity.
trans-unit.target: 标识符可能区分大小写，也可能不区分大小写。请参阅标识符区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers used to identify a BEGIN ... END construct.
trans-unit.target: 用于识别BEGIN...END结构的标识符。END结构。

trans-unit.source: Identify Aria tables that have the ROW_FORMAT table option set to PAGE.
trans-unit.target: 标识将 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 PAGE 的 Aria表。

trans-unit.target: IdentifyingNumber

trans-unit.source: If "base_cols" is more than one column, WITH ROLLUP will be subtotals as well as a grand total.
trans-unit.target: 如果 "base_cols "是多于一列的,WITH ROLLUP将是小计以及总和。

trans-unit.source: If "redistributeData stop" is called, all processing stops where it's at, but in a usable state. "redistributeData status" can be used to see how much has been done. A further "redistributeData start" will start over using the new state of the system. This may lead to a less optimal distribution, so stop-start sequences aren't recommended.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 "redistributeData stop",所有的处理都会停止在原地,但处于可用状态。"redistributeData status "可以用来查看已经做了多少。再调用 "redistributeData start "会使用系统的新状态重新开始。这可能会导致一个不太理想的分布,所以不推荐使用停止-启动序列。

trans-unit.source: If (CRN = FRN = RN) then the result is (value of expression from row at RN)
trans-unit.target: 如果(CRN=FRN=RN),那么结果是(RN处行的表达式的值)

trans-unit.source: If --lock-ddl-per-table is used:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用-lock-ddl-per-table。

trans-unit.source: If FLUSH TABLE WITH READ LOCK is not used, then only InnoDB tables will be consistent (not the privilege tables in the mysql database or the binary log). The backup point depends on the content of the redo log within the backup itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果不使用带有读锁的FLUSH TABLE，则只有InnoDB表是一致的（而不是mysql数据库或二进制日志中的特权表）。备份点取决于备份本身内重做日志的内容。

trans-unit.source: If FLUSH TABLE WITH READ LOCK was done:
trans-unit.target: 如果已完成带读取锁定的表刷新：

trans-unit.source: If persistent statistics are enabled, then the innodb_stats_persistent_sample_pages system variable applies instead. persistent statistics are enabled with the innodb_stats_persistent system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了持久统计信息，那么将应用 innodb_stats_persistent_sample_pages 系统变量。持久性统计信息通过 innodb_stats_persistent 系统变量启用。

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB strict mode is disabled and if a DDL statement is executed that touches the table, such as CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE, then InnoDB will raise a warning with this message.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了InnoDB严格模式，并且如果执行了接触该表的DDL语句（例如 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE )，那么InnoDB将在此消息中发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB strict mode is enabled and if a DDL statement is executed that touches the table, such as CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE, then InnoDB will raise an error with this message
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了InnoDB严格模式，并且执行了涉及表的DDL语句（例如 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE )，则InnoDB会在此消息中引发错误

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB strict mode is disabled, and if DDL is performed on a table that triggers a "Row size too large" error, then InnoDB will log a warning:
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用InnoDB严格模式，并且在触发“行大小太大”错误的表上执行DDL ，则InnoDB将记录警告：

trans-unit.source: If innodb_fast_shutdown is set to 2, then set it to 1:
trans-unit.target: 如果innodb_fast_shutdown设置为 2 ，则将其设置为 1 ：

trans-unit.source: If parallel replication is in use, then events that were logged with GTIDs with different gtid_domain_id values can be applied in parallel in an out-of-order manner.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在使用并行复制，则可以以乱序方式并行应用使用具有不同 gtid_domain_id 值的GTID记录的事件。

trans-unit.source: If semisynchronous replication is enabled, then the master also has an ACK receiver thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了半同步复制，则主机还具有ACK接收器线程。

trans-unit.source: If strict_mode has been set (the default from MariaDB 10.2.4), MariaDB will return an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了strict_mode（MariaDB 10.2.4的默认值），MariaDB将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If strict_mode has not been set (the default until MariaDB 10.2.3), MariaDB will adjust the number to fit in the field, returning a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未设置strict_mode（MariaDB 10.2.3之前的默认设置），MariaDB将调整该数字以适合该字段，并返回警告。

trans-unit.source: If extra-port is <> 0 then you can connect max_connections number of normal threads + 1 extra SUPER user through the 'extra-port' TCP/IP port. These connections use the old one-thread-per-connection method.
trans-unit.target: 如果extra-port为<> 0，则可以通过“ extra-port” TCP / IP端口连接正常线程的max_connections数量+ 1个额外的SUPER用户。这些连接使用旧的“每连接一个线程”方法。

trans-unit.source: If user statistics are enabled, the Information SchemaINDEX_STATISTICS table stores the index usage.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了用户统计信息，则信息架构INDEX_STATISTICS表将存储索引使用情况。

trans-unit.source: If --debug-sync-timeout=0 the value of the variable reads as "OFF".
trans-unit.target: 如果 --debug-sync-timeout=0 ，则该变量的值读取为 "OFF" 。

trans-unit.source: If --lock-ddl-per-table is used and there is a user query waiting for MDL, the user query will be killed to resolve a deadlock. Note that these are only queries of type ALTER, DROP, TRUNCATE or RENAME TABLE. (MDEV-15636)
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 --lock-ddl-per-table 并且有一个等待MDL的用户查询，则该用户查询将被杀死以解决死锁。请注意，这些仅是ALTER，DROP，TRUNCATE或RENAME TABLE类型的查询。（MDEV-15636）

trans-unit.source: If --lock-ddl-per-table was done:
trans-unit.target: 如果 --lock-ddl-per-table 已完成：

trans-unit.source: If --start or --start-dirty option is used, wait for all servers to exit before finishing the process. Otherwise, it will terminate if one (of several) servers is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 --start 或 --start-dirty 选项，请等待所有服务器退出，然后再完成该过程。否则，如果重新启动一台（几台）服务器，它将终止。

trans-unit.source: If --syslog and --log-error are both provided, then a warning is issued and --log-error takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果同时提供了 --syslog 和 --log-error ，则会发出警告，并且 --log-error 优先。

trans-unit.source: If innodb_stats_traditional is disabled, then the number of pages to sample for statistics is calculated using a logarithmic algorithm, so the exact number can change depending on the size of the table. This means that more samples may be used for larger tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果禁用了 innodb_stats_traditional ，则将使用对数算法来计算要统计的样本页面数，因此确切的数目可以根据表的大小而变化。这意味着更多的样本可以用于更大的表。

trans-unit.source: If innodb_stats_traditional is enabled, then the exact number of pages configured by the system variable will be sampled for statistics.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 innodb_stats_traditional ，则将采样由系统变量配置的确切页数以进行统计。

trans-unit.source: If innodb_stats_traditional is enabled, then the exact number of pages configured by this system variable will be sampled for statistics.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 innodb_stats_traditional ，则将采样此系统变量配置的确切页面数以进行统计。

trans-unit.source: If --lock-ddl-per-table is used and if a table is concurrently being dropped or renamed, then Mariabackup can fail to acquire the MDL lock.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了 --lock-ddl-per-table ，并且同时删除或重命名了一个表，则Mariabackup可能无法获取MDL锁。

trans-unit.source: If --tc-heuristic-recover is set to some value other than OFF and if the binary log is not enabled, then MariaDB will ignore information about transactions in the the memory-mapped file defined by the --log-tc option during the recovery process. Prepared transactions that are encountered during the recovery process will either be rolled back or committed, depending on the value of --tc-heuristic-recover.
trans-unit.target: 如果 --tc-heuristic-recover 被设定为比其他一些价值 OFF ，如果二进制日志中没有启用，那么MariaDB的就会忽略有关被定义在内存映射文件中的交易信息 --log-tc 中的选项恢复过程。在恢复过程中遇到的准备 --tc-heuristic-recover 事务将被回滚或提交，具体取决于--tc-heuristic-recover的值。

trans-unit.source: If --tc-heuristic-recover is set to some value other than OFF and if the binary log is enabled, then MariaDB will ignore information about transactions in the binary log during the recovery process. Prepared transactions that are encountered during the recovery process will either be rolled back or committed, depending on the value of --tc-heuristic-recover.
trans-unit.target: 如果 --tc-heuristic-recover 设置为 OFF 以外的其他值，并且启用了二进制日志，则MariaDB将在恢复过程中忽略有关二进制日志中事务的信息。在恢复过程中遇到的准备 --tc-heuristic-recover 事务将被回滚或提交，具体取决于--tc-heuristic-recover的值。

trans-unit.source: If sync_binlog=1 is set, but innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit is not set to 1 or 3, then it is possible after a crash to end up in a state where a transaction present in a server's binary log is missing from the server's InnoDB redo log. If the server is a replication master, then that means that the server can become inconsistent with its slaves, since the slaves may have replicated transactions from the master's binary log that are no longer present in the master's local InnoDB data.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 sync_binlog=1 ，但是 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit 未设置为 1 或 3 ，则崩溃后有可能以服务器的InnoDB重做日志中缺少服务器二进制日志中存在的事务的状态结束。如果服务器是复制主服务器，则这意味着服务器可能与其从服务器不一致，因为从服务器可能已经从主服务器的二进制日志中复制了不再存在于主服务器的本地InnoDB数据中的事务。

trans-unit.source: If log_warnings is 0, then many optional warnings will not be logged. However, this does not prevent all warnings from being logged, because there are certain core warnings that will always be written to the error log. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果 log_warnings 为 0 ，那么将不会记录许多可选警告。但是，这不会阻止所有警告记录下来，因为某些核心警告始终会写入错误日志中。例如：

trans-unit.target: 如果 log_warnings 为 2 ，则将显示其他两种不同的警告。例如：

trans-unit.source: If log_warnings is 3, then a couple other different kinds of warnings are printed. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果 log_warnings 为 3 ，则将输出其他两种不同的警告。例如：

trans-unit.target: 如果 log_warnings 为 4 ，则将输出其他几种不同类型的警告。例如：

trans-unit.source: If secure_file_priv is set to the path of some directory, then CSV tables can only be created with files in that directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 secure_file_priv 设置为某个目录的路径，则只能使用该目录中的文件创建CSV表。

trans-unit.source: If SQL_MODE does not have NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER set, then you can also create the user account via GRANT. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置 SQL_MODE NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER ，则还可以通过 GRANT 创建用户帐户。例如：

trans-unit.source: If SQL_MODE does not have NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER set, then you can also create the user this way with GRANT. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置 SQL_MODE NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER ，则还可以使用 GRANT 以这种方式创建用户。例如：

trans-unit.source: If SQL_MODE does not have NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER set, then you can also create the user via GRANT. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有设置 SQL_MODE NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER ，则还可以通过 GRANT 创建用户。例如：

trans-unit.source: If innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit is set to 1 or 3, but sync_binlog=1 is not set, then it is possible after a crash to end up in a state where a transaction present in a server's InnoDB redo log is missing from the server's binary log. If the server is a replication master, then that also means that the server can become inconsistent with its slaves, since the server's slaves would not be able to replicate the missing transactions from the server's binary log.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit 设置为 1 或 3 ，但未设置 sync_binlog=1 ，则崩溃后有可能最终以服务器二进制日志中缺少服务器InnoDB重做日志中存在的事务的状态结束。如果服务器是复制主服务器，那么这也意味着服务器可能与其从属服务器不一致，因为服务器的从属服务器将无法从服务器的二进制日志中复制丢失的事务。

trans-unit.source: If innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 is set and the binary log is enabled, but sync_binlog=0 is set, then commits are not guaranteed durable inside InnoDB after commit. This is because if sync_binlog=0 is set and if the server crashes, then transactions that were not flushed to the binary log prior to the crash will be missing from the binary log.
trans-unit.target: 如果 innodb_flush_log_at_trx_commit=1 并启用了二进制日志，但是设置了 sync_binlog=0 ，则不能保证提交后在InnoDB内部持久提交。这是因为，如果设置了 sync_binlog=0 且服务器崩溃，则二进制日志中将丢失崩溃之前未刷新到二进制日志的事务。

trans-unit.source: If @@default_master_connection contains a non existing name, you will get a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果 @@default_master_connection 包含不存在的名称，则会收到警告。

trans-unit.source: If AES_DECRYPT() detects invalid data or incorrect padding, it returns NULL. However, it is possible for AES_DECRYPT() to return a non-NULL value (possibly garbage) if the input data or the key is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AES_DECRYPT() 检测到无效数据或不正确的填充，则返回 NULL 。但是，如果输入数据或密钥无效，则 AES_DECRYPT() 可能返回非 NULL 值（可能是垃圾）。

trans-unit.source: If ALGORITHM=COPY is specified, then the copy algorithm will be used even if it is not necessary. This can result in a lengthy table copy. If multiple ALTER TABLE operations are required that each require the table to be rebuilt, then it is best to specify all operations in a single ALTER TABLE statement, so that the table is only rebuilt once.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 ALGORITHM=COPY ，那么即使没有必要，也将使用复制算法。这可能会导致冗长的表副本。如果需要执行多个 ALTER TABLE 操作，每个操作都需要重建表，则最好在单个 ALTER TABLE 语句中指定所有操作，以便该表仅重建一次。

trans-unit.source: If ALGORITHM=INSTANT is specified for an ALTER TABLE operation that does not support ALGORITHM=INSTANT, then an error will be raised. In this case, raising an error is preferable, if the alternative is for the operation to modify data files, and perform unexpectedly slowly.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALGORITHM=INSTANT 用于指定 ALTER TABLE 不支持操作 ALGORITHM=INSTANT ，那么错误将被提高。在这种情况下，如果替代方法是修改数据文件并意外地缓慢执行操作，则引发错误是可取的。

trans-unit.source: If ALGORITHM=NOCOPY is specified for an ALTER TABLE operation that does not support ALGORITHM=NOCOPY, then an error will be raised. In this case, raising an error is preferable, if the alternative is for the operation to rebuild the clustered index, and perform unexpectedly slowly.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALGORITHM=NOCOPY 用于指定 ALTER TABLE 不支持操作 ALGORITHM=NOCOPY ，那么错误将被提高。在这种情况下，如果替代方法是重新生成聚簇索引并意外地缓慢执行操作，则最好提出错误。

trans-unit.source: If CHECK TABLE finds an error in an InnoDB table, MariaDB might shutdown to prevent the error propagation. In this case, the problem will be reported in the error log. Otherwise, since MariaDB 5.5, the table or an index might be marked as corrupted, to prevent use. This does not happen with some minor problems, like a wrong number of entries in a secondary index. Those problems are reported in the output of CHECK TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CHECK TABLE 在InnoDB 表中发现错误，MariaDB可能会关闭以防止错误传播。在这种情况下，该问题将在错误日志中报告。否则，从MariaDB 5.5开始，可能会将表或索引标记为已损坏，以防止使用。某些小问题不会发生这种情况，例如二级索引中的条目数错误。这些问题在 CHECK TABLE 的输出中报告。

trans-unit.source: If CYCLE is used then the sequence should start again from MINVALUE after it has run out of values. Default value is NOCYCLE.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 CYCLE ，则序列用完值后应从 MINVALUE 重新开始。默认值为 NOCYCLE 。

trans-unit.source: If CYCLE is used, first round and then next_value are compared to see if the value is bigger than the current value.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 CYCLE ，则 next_value 比较第一 round ，然后比较next_value，以查看该值是否大于当前值。

trans-unit.source: If EXISTS subquery is an AND-part of the WHERE clause:
trans-unit.target: 如果 EXISTS 子查询是 WHERE 子句的AND部分：

trans-unit.source: If FLUSH TABLES ... FOR EXPORT is in effect in the session, the following statements will produce an error if attempted:
trans-unit.target: 如果会话中的 FLUSH TABLES ... FOR EXPORT 有效，则尝试以下语句将产生错误：

trans-unit.source: If MyRocks is used, create rocksdb checkpoint via "set rocksdb_create_checkpoint=$rocksdb_data_dir/mariabackup_rocksdb_checkpoint " command. The result of it is a directory with hardlinks to MyRocks files. Copy the checkpoint directory to the backup (or create hardlinks in backup directory is on the same partition as data directory). Remove the checkpoint directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MyRocks 使用，创建rocksdb检查站通过“集rocksdb_create_checkpoint = $ rocksdb_data_dir / mariabackup_rocksdb_checkpoint”命令。其结果是一个目录，其中包含指向MyRocks文件的硬链接。将检查点目录复制到备份中（或在备份目录中与数据目录位于同一分区上创建硬链接）。删除检查点目录。

trans-unit.source: If N_or_S is a number, returns a string representation of the hexadecimal value of N, where N is a longlong (BIGINT) number. This is equivalent to CONV(N,10,16).
trans-unit.target: 如果 N_or_S 是一个数字，则返回 N 的十六进制值的字符串表示形式，其中 N 是一个 longlong （ BIGINT ）数字。这相当于 CONV(N,10,16) 。

trans-unit.source: If N_or_S is a string, returns a hexadecimal string representation of N_or_S where each byte of each character in N_or_S is converted to two hexadecimal digits. If N_or_S is NULL, returns NULL. The inverse of this operation is performed by the UNHEX() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果 N_or_S 是一个字符串，返回的十六进制字符串表示 N_or_S 其中每个字符的每个字节 N_or_S 被转换为两个十六进制数字。如果 N_or_S 为NULL，则返回NULL。此操作的逆过程由UNHEX（）函数执行。

trans-unit.source: If QUERY event logging is enabled, queries that are executed will be logged for defined users. The queries will be logged exactly as they are executed, in plain text. This is a security vulnerability: anyone who has access to the log files will be able to read the queries. So make sure that only trusted users have access to the log files and that the files are in a protected location. An alternative is not to use QUERY event logging, but to use only TABLE event logging.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了 QUERY 事件日志记录，则将为已定义的用户记录执行的查询。查询将完全以纯文本形式记录在执行时。这是一个安全漏洞：有权访问日志文件的任何人都可以读取查询。因此，请确保只有受信任的用户才能访问日志文件，并且文件位于受保护的位置。一种替代方法是不使用 QUERY 事件日志记录，而仅使用 TABLE 事件日志记录。

trans-unit.source: If RESTART option is used, NEXT VALUE will return the restart value.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 RESTART 选项，则 NEXT VALUE 将返回重启值。

trans-unit.source: If SHOW GRANTS FOR CURRENT_USER (or any of the equivalent syntaxes) is used in DEFINER context (such as within a stored procedure that is defined with SQL SECURITY DEFINER), the grants displayed are those of the definer and not the invoker.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 DEFINER 上下文中（例如，在用 SQL SECURITY DEFINER 定义的存储过程中）使用了 SHOW GRANTS FOR CURRENT_USER （或任何等效语法），则显示的授予是定义者的授予，而不是调用者的授予。

trans-unit.source: If SIGNED, or no attribute, is specified, a portion of the numeric type will be reserved for the sign (plus or minus). For example, a TINYINT SIGNED can range from -128 to 127.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 SIGNED 或没有属性，则数字类型的一部分将保留给符号（正号或负号）。例如，TINYINT SIGNED的范围可以从-128到127。

trans-unit.source: If START SLAVE succeeds in starting the slave threads, it returns without any error. However, even in that case, it might be that the slave threads start and then later stop (for example, because they do not manage to connect to the master or read its binary log, or some other problem). START SLAVE does not warn you about this. You must check the slave's error log for error messages generated by the slave threads, or check that they are running satisfactorily with SHOW SLAVE STATUS.
trans-unit.target: 如果 START SLAVE 成功启动了从属线程，它将返回而没有任何错误。但是，即使在那种情况下，从属线程也可能启动，然后又停止（例如，因为它们无法管理连接到主线程或读取其二进制日志或其他问题）。 START SLAVE 不会对此发出警告。您必须检查从服务器的错误日志中是否有从服务器线程生成的错误消息，或者使用 SHOW SLAVE STATUS 检查它们是否令人满意地运行。

trans-unit.source: If TO # is given, then the first new binary log file will start from number #.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 TO # ，则第一个新的二进制日志文件将从数字＃开始。

trans-unit.source: If TRANSACTIONAL was not specified at all, the row format will be whatever the user has specified (or PAGE, by default), and the table will be transactional if the row format will end up being PAGE and non-transactional otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果根本没有指定 TRANSACTIONAL ，则行格式将是用户指定的格式（默认情况下为PAGE），如果行格式最终以PAGE格式出现，则表将是事务性的，否则将变为非事务性的。

trans-unit.source: If TRANSACTIONAL=0 was specified, the table will be not transactional and the row format will be whatever the user has specified (or PAGE, by default).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 TRANSACTIONAL=0 ，则该表将不是事务性的，并且行格式将是用户指定的格式（默认为PAGE）。

trans-unit.source: If TRANSACTIONAL=1 was specified, the row format will be PAGE. If a user has specified some other row format, Aria issues a warning, but still forces the row format to be PAGE.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 TRANSACTIONAL=1 ，则行格式将为PAGE。如果用户指定了其他某种行格式，Aria会发出警告，但仍将行格式强制为PAGE。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE, the temporary table resides in a separate per-table tablespace. If FALSE, it resides in the shared temporary tablespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 TRUE ，则临时表位于每个表的单独表空间中。如果为 FALSE ，它将驻留在共享的临时表空间中。

trans-unit.source: If TRX_STATE is LOCK_WAIT, the INNODB_LOCKS.LOCK_ID value of the lock being waited on. NULL if any other state.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TRX_STATE 是 LOCK_WAIT ，该 INNODB_LOCKS.LOCK_ID 锁存在的价值一直在等待。如果有任何其他状态，则为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If TRX_STATE is LOCK_WAIT, the time the transaction started waiting for the lock, otherwise NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 TRX_STATE 是 LOCK_WAIT ，交易开始等待锁的时间，否则 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If UNSIGNED is specified, no portion of the numeric type is reserved for the sign, so for integer types range can be larger. For example, a TINYINT UNSIGNED can range from 0 to 255. Floating point and fixed-point types also can be UNSIGNED, but this only prevents negative values from being stored and doesn't alter the range.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 UNSIGNED ，则数字类型的任何部分都不会保留给符号，因此对于整数类型，范围可以更大。例如，TINYINT UNSIGNED的范围可以从0到255。浮点和定点类型也可以是 UNSIGNED ，但这仅防止存储负值，并且不会更改范围。

trans-unit.source: If USING is given and the result string is illegal for the given character set, a warning is issued. Also, if strict SQL mode is enabled, the result from CHAR() becomes NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 USING 并且结果字符串对于给定的字符集是非法的，则会发出警告。另外，如果启用了严格的SQL模式，则 CHAR() 的结果将变为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If X is NULL, this function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 X 为 NULL ，则此函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If ZEROFILL is specified, the column will be set to UNSIGNED and the spaces used by default to pad the field are replaced with zeros. ZEROFILL is ignored in expressions or as part of a UNION. ZEROFILL is a non-standard MySQL and MariaDB enhancement.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定 ZEROFILL ，则该列将设置为UNSIGNED，默认情况下用于填充该字段的空格将替换为零。 ZEROFILL 在表达式中或作为UNION的一部分被忽略。 ZEROFILL 是非标准的MySQL和MariaDB增强功能。

trans-unit.source: If autocommit is set to 1, the LOCK IN SHARE MODE and FOR UPDATE clauses have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 autocommit 设置为1，则LOCK IN SHARE MODE和 FOR UPDATE 子句无效。

trans-unit.source: If autocommit is set to 1, the LOCK IN SHARE MODE and FOR UPDATE clauses have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果 autocommit 设置为1，则LOCK IN SHARE MODE和FOR UPDATE子句无效。

trans-unit.source: If backup_type is full-backuped, then from_lsn has the value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 backup_type 是 full-backuped ，则 from_lsn 的值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If backup_type is incremental, then from_lsn has the value of the log sequence number (LSN) at which the backup started reading from the InnoDB redo log. This is internally used by Mariabackup when preparing incremental backups.
trans-unit.target: 如果 backup_type 是 incremental ，则 from_lsn 具有备份开始从InnoDB重做日志读取的日志序列号（LSN）的值。Mariabackup在准备增量备份时在内部使用它。

trans-unit.source: If expr1 is TRUE (expr1 <> 0 and expr1 <> NULL) then IF() returns expr2; otherwise it returns expr3. IF() returns a numeric or string value, depending on the context in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr1 为 TRUE （ expr1 <> 0 和 expr1 <> NULL ），则 IF() 返回 expr2 ; 否则返回 expr3 。 IF() 返回数字或字符串值，具体取决于使用它的上下文。

trans-unit.source: If hostname is not specified or hostname is localhost, then Unix sockets are used. Unused connection parameters (such as port) will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 hostname 没有被指定或 hostname 是 localhost ，使用再Unix套接字。未使用的连接参数（例如 port ）将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If innodb_ft_user_stopword_table is not set, the table set by innodb_ft_server_stopword_table is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 innodb_ft_user_stopword_table 没有设置，通过该表设定innodb_ft_server_stopword_table使用。

trans-unit.source: If join_cache_bka is off then BKA and BKAH join algorithms are not allowed. If join_cache_hashed is off then BNLH and BKAH join algorithms are not allowed. If join_cache_incremental is off then no incremental variants of the block-based join algorithms are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果 join_cache_bka 关闭，则不允许使用BKA和BKAH连接算法。如果 join_cache_hashed 关闭，则不允许BNLH和BKAH连接算法。如果 join_cache_incremental 关闭，则不允许使用基于块的联接算法的增量变体。

trans-unit.source: If minute or second are out of the range 0 to 60, NULL is returned. The hour can be in the range -838 to 838, outside of which the value is truncated with a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果 minute 或 second 不在0到60的范围内，则返回NULL。的 hour 可以在范围-838到838，其中外的值被截断与警告。

trans-unit.source: If mysql_install_db fails, you should examine the error log in the data directory, which is the directory specified with --datadir option. This should provide a clue about what went wrong.
trans-unit.target: 如果 mysql_install_db 失败，则应检查数据目录中的错误日志，该目录是使用 --datadir 选项指定的目录。这应该提供有关出了什么问题的线索。

trans-unit.source: If protocol is not specified, then the following happens:
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 protocol ，则会发生以下情况：

trans-unit.source: If round is used then it will set the round value (or the internal cycle count, starting at zero) for the sequence. If round is not used, it's assumed to be 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 round ，则它将设置序列的 round 值（或内部循环计数，从零开始）。如果不使用 round ，则假定为0。

trans-unit.source: If shared-memory-base-name is not specified and hostname is not specified or hostname is localhost, then the connection will happen through windows named pipes.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 shared-memory-base-name 且未指定 hostname 或 hostname 为 localhost ，则将通过Windows命名管道进行连接。

trans-unit.source: If shared-memory-base-name is specified and hostname is not specified or hostname is localhost, then the connection will happen through shared memory. Unused connection parameters (such as port) will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 shared-memory-base-name 被指定和 hostname 未指定或 hostname 是 localhost ，则连接将通过共享内存发生。未使用的连接参数（例如 port ）将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: If sql_error_log_rate is 0 the logging is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sql_error_log_rate 为 0 ，则禁用日志记录。

trans-unit.source: If str is NULL, UNHEX() returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 str 为 NULL ，则 UNHEX() 返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If str is a non-binary string (CHAR, VARCHAR or TEXT), WEIGHT_STRING returns the string's collation weight. If str is a binary string (BINARY, VARBINARY or BLOB), the return value is simply the input value, since the weight for each byte in a binary string is the byte value.
trans-unit.target: 如果 str 是非二进制字符串（CHAR，VARCHAR或TEXT），则WEIGHT_STRING返回字符串的排序规则权重。如果 str 是二进制字符串（BINARY，VARBINARY或BLOB），则返回值就是输入值，因为二进制字符串中每个字节的权重是字节值。

trans-unit.source: If str is not a string value, it is converted into a string. If str is NULL, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 str 不是字符串值，则将其转换为字符串。如果 str 为 NULL ，则函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If table_name was locked with LOCK TABLES it will continue to be locked after the statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果 table_name 被LOCK TABLES锁定，它将在语句后继续被锁定。

trans-unit.source: If expr1 is not NULL, IFNULL() returns expr1; otherwise it returns expr2. IFNULL() returns a numeric or string value, depending on the context in which it is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr1 不为NULL，则IFNULL（）返回 expr1 ; 否则返回 expr2 。IFNULL（）返回数字或字符串值，具体取决于使用它的上下文。

trans-unit.source: If expr is NULL, IN always returns NULL. If at least one of the values in the list is NULL, and one of the comparisons is true, the result is 1. If at least one of the values in the list is NULL and none of the comparisons is true, the result is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr 为NULL，则IN始终返回NULL。如果列表中的至少一个值是NULL，并且其中一个比较为true，则结果为1。如果列表中的至少一个值是NULL，并且没有一个比较结果为true，则结果为NULL。 。

trans-unit.source: If expr is NULL, ISNULL() returns 1, otherwise it returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr 为NULL，则ISNULL（）返回1，否则返回0。

trans-unit.source: If expr is a time with no microseconds, zero is returned, while if expr is a date with no time, zero with a warning is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果expr是没有微秒的时间，则返回零，而expr是没有时间的日期，则返回带警告的零。

trans-unit.source: If mysqlbinlog reads a binary log event that it does not recognize, it prints a warning, ignores the event, and continues. Without this option, mysqlbinlog stops if it reads such an event.
trans-unit.target: 如果mysqlbinlog读取了无法识别的二进制日志事件，它将打印警告，忽略该事件，然后继续。没有这个选项，如果mysqlbinlog读取了这样的事件，它将停止。

trans-unit.source: If x_remove() supported (defined) detected automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果自动检测到x_remove（）支持（定义）。

trans-unit.source: If Key is MUL, multiple occurrences of a given value are allowed within the column. The column is the first column of a non-unique index or a unique-valued index that can contain NULL values.
trans-unit.target: 如果Key为MUL，则允许在列中多次出现给定值。该列是可以包含 NULL 值的非唯一索引或唯一值索引的第一列。

trans-unit.source: If Key is PRI, the column is a PRIMARY KEY or is one of the columns in a multiple-column PRIMARY KEY.
trans-unit.target: 如果Key为PRI，则该列为 PRIMARY KEY 或为多列 PRIMARY KEY 中的列之一。

trans-unit.source: If Key is UNI, the column is the first column of a unique-valued index that cannot contain NULL values.
trans-unit.target: 如果Key为UNI，则该列是不能包含 NULL 值的唯一值索引的第一列。

trans-unit.source: If Key is empty, the column either is not indexed or is indexed only as a secondary column in a multiple-column, non-unique index.
trans-unit.target: 如果Key为空，则该列要么不被索引，要么仅被索引为多列非唯一索引中的第二列。

trans-unit.source: If Aria doesn't start or you have an unrecoverable table (shouldn't happen):
trans-unit.target: 如果Aria不启动或者你有一个不可恢复的表(不应该发生)。

trans-unit.source: If Aria is ever unable to obtain a lock, we might have a deadlock. There are two primary ways for detecting if a deadlock has actually occurred. First is to search a wait-for graph (see the wait-for graph on Wikipedia) and the second is to just wait and let the deadlock exhibit itself. Aria Two-step Deadlock Detection does a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: 如果Aria无法获得锁，我们可能会陷入僵局。有两种主要方法可以检测是否确实发生了死锁。首先是搜索等待图（请参阅Wikipedia上的等待图），第二是只是等待并让死锁显示出来。Aria两步死锁检测将两者结合起来。

trans-unit.source: If COMMIT or ROLLBACK is issued and no transaction was started, no error is reported.
trans-unit.target: 如果发出COMMIT或ROLLBACK而没有启动交易,则不报告错误。

trans-unit.source: If Cassandra's rowkey has an alias (or name), then MariaDB's column must have the same name.
trans-unit.target: 如果Cassandra的 rowkey 具有别名（或名称），则MariaDB的列必须具有相同的名称。

trans-unit.source: If GET DIAGNOSTICS produces an error condition (because the command is properly parsed but not correctly used), the diagnostics area is not emptied, and the new condition is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果GET DIAGNOSTICS产生了一个错误条件(因为命令被正确解析但没有被正确使用),诊断区不会被清空,而会添加新的条件。

trans-unit.source: If HTTP traffic requires a proxy in your environment, then you can specify the proxy by setting the feedback_http_proxy system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果HTTP通信在您的环境中需要代理，则可以通过设置 feedback_http_proxy 系统变量来指定代理。

trans-unit.source: If I look at the MySQL-site http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/de/datetime.html
trans-unit.target: 如果我查看MySQL网站http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.1/de/datetime.html

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB crashes the server after detecting data corruption, it writes a detailed message in the error log. The first lines are similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果InnoDB在检测到数据损坏后使服务器崩溃,它会在错误日志中写下详细的信息。第一行类似于下面的内容。

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB needs to restore an old version, it will simply replace the newer version with the older one. When a transaction inserts a new row, there is no older version. However, in that case, the restore can be done by deleting the inserted rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果InnoDB需要恢复旧版本,它将简单地用旧版本替换新版本。当一个事务插入一条新的行时,没有旧版本。但是,在这种情况下,可以通过删除插入的行来进行还原。

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB returns something like the following error:
trans-unit.target: 如果InnoDB返回类似下面的错误。

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB strict mode is enabled, and if a DDL statement is executed and invalid or conflicting table options are specified, then an error is raised. The error will only be a generic error that says the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了InnoDB严格模式，并且执行了DDL语句并且指定了无效或冲突的表选项，则会引发错误。该错误将仅是表示以下内容的一般性错误：

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB strict mode is enabled, and if a table exceeds its row format's maximum row size, then InnoDB will return an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了InnoDB严格模式，并且表超出了其行格式的最大行大小，则InnoDB将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If InnoDB strict mode is enabled, and if a table uses the COMPRESSED row format, and if the table's KEY_BLOCK_SIZE is too small to contain a row, then an error is returned by the statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了InnoDB严格模式，并且表使用 COMPRESSED 行格式，并且表的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 太小而无法包含行，那么该语句将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If MYSQL_ERRNO is out of range, you will get an error like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果MYSQL_ERRNO超出了范围,你会得到这样一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB Columnstore has ever before been installed on any of the planned hosts as a root user install, you must have the system administrator verify that no remnants of that installation exist. The non-root installation will not be successful if there are MariaDB Columnstore files owned by root on any of the hosts.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB Columnstore曾经作为root用户安装在任何一台计划中的主机上,你必须让系统管理员确认没有安装的残余。如果在任何主机上有root用户拥有的MariaDB Columnstore文件,那么非root用户的安装将不会成功。

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB Columnstore has ever before been installed on any of the planned hosts as a root user install, you must have the system administrator verify that no remnants of that installation exist. The unprivileged installation will not be successful if there are MariaDB Columnstore files owned by root on any of the hosts.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB Columnstore曾经作为root用户安装在任何一台计划中的主机上,你必须让系统管理员确认没有安装的残余。如果在任何主机上有root用户拥有的MariaDB Columnstore文件,那么非特权安装将不会成功。

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB encounters a full disk error while trying to write to a binary log file, then it will keep retrying the write every 60 seconds. Log messages will get written to the error log every 600 seconds. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB在尝试向二进制日志文件写入时遇到满盘错误,那么它将每60秒不断重试写入。日志信息将每600秒写入错误日志。比如说

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB is compiled for debugging, you can both use it in a debugger, an...
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB是为调试而编译的,你既可以在调试器中使用它,也可以在调试器中使用它。

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB is configured to access files under /home, /root, or /run/user, then the default systemd unit file will prevent access to these directories with a Permission Denied error. This happens because the unit file set ProtectHome=true. See Systemd: Configuring Access to Home Directories for information on how to work around this.
trans-unit.target: 如果将MariaDB配置为访问 /home ， /root 或 /run/user 下的文件，则默认的systemd单元文件将阻止访问这些目录，并显示 Permission Denied 错误。发生这种情况是因为单位文件设置了 ProtectHome=true 。有关如何解决此问题的信息，请参见Systemd：配置对家庭目录的访问。

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB needs to perform automatic crash recovery and if the binary log is not enabled, then the error log will contain messages like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB的需要进行自动崩溃恢复，如果二进制日志中没有启用，则错误日志将包含类似这样的消息：

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB needs to perform automatic crash recovery and if the binary log is enabled, then the error log will contain messages like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB需要执行自动崩溃恢复，并且启用了二进制日志，则错误日志将包含以下消息：

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB shuts down or crashes, xtstat will attempt to reconnect. xtstat can be terminated any time using the CTRL-C key cimbination.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB关闭或崩溃，则 xtstat 将尝试重新连接。 xtstat 可以使用被终止的任何时间 CTRL-C 键cimbination。

trans-unit.source: If MariaDB takes longer than 90 seconds to start, then the default systemd unit file will cause it to fail with an error. This happens because the default value for the TimeoutStartSec option is 90 seconds. See Systemd: Configuring the Systemd Service Timeout for information on how to work around this.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB的启动时间超过90秒，则默认的systemd单位文件将导致它失败并出现错误。发生这种情况是因为 TimeoutStartSec 选项的默认值为90秒。有关如何解决此问题的信息，请参见Systemd：配置Systemd服务超时。

trans-unit.source: If Mariabackup uses more file descriptors than the system is configured to allow, then users can see errors like the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果Mariabackup使用的文件描述符数量超过了系统配置允许的数量,那么用户就会看到如下错误。

trans-unit.source: If MySQL/MariaDB is already installed and running, you have two options:
trans-unit.target: 如果MySQL/MariaDB已经安装并运行,你有两个选择。

trans-unit.source: If OQGRAPH gets compiled properly, there should be a file like:
trans-unit.target: 如果OQGRAPH被正确编译,应该有一个类似的文件。

trans-unit.source: If P1 or P2 contains a two-digit year, values from 00 to 69 are converted to from 2000 to 2069, while values from 70 are converted to 1970 upwards.
trans-unit.target: 如果P1或P2包含一个两位数的年份,则00至69的值转换为2000至2069,而70的值则转换为1970以上。

trans-unit.source: If R > 1000 -- Batching may not work. Decide how long (S seconds) you can stall loading the data in order to collect a batch of rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果R> 1000-批处理可能无法进行。确定您可以暂停加载数据多长时间（S秒）以收集一批行。

trans-unit.source: If R < 10 (= 1M/day = 300M/year) -- single-row INSERTs would probably work fine (that is, batching is optional)
trans-unit.target: 如果R <10（= 1M /天= 300M /年）-单行INSERT可能会正常工作（也就是说，批处理是可选的）

trans-unit.source: If R < 100 (3B records per year) -- secondary indexes on Fact table may be ok
trans-unit.target: 如果R <100（每年3B条记录）-事实表上的二级索引可能没问题

trans-unit.source: If R < 1000 (100M records/day) -- avoid secondary indexes on Fact table.
trans-unit.target: 如果R <1000（每天100M条记录）-避免在事实表中使用二级索引。

trans-unit.source: If REVERSE is specified, the counter is decremented, and the upper bound value needs to be less than or equal for the loop to continue.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了REVERSE,则计数器被递减,且上界值需要小于或等于,循环才能继续。

trans-unit.source: If S < 0.1s -- May not be able to keep up
trans-unit.target: 如果S <0.1s-可能无法跟上

trans-unit.source: If SAVEPOINT is issued and no transaction was started, no error is reported but no savepoint is created. When ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT or RELEASE SAVEPOINT is called for a savepoint that does not exist, an error like this is issued:
trans-unit.target: 如果发出了SAVEPOINT,但没有启动事务,则不会报告错误,但不会创建保存点。当对不存在的保存点调用ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT或RELEASE SAVEPOINT时,会发出类似这样的错误。

trans-unit.source: If Spider does not appear in this list, you need to run the configuration script. This is installed with the MariaDB server in CentOS. Debian distributions need to install the mariadb-plugin-spider package first. The package is usually found in /usr/share/mysql.
trans-unit.target: 如果Spider没有出现在此列表中，则需要运行配置脚本。它与CentOS中的MariaDB服务器一起安装。Debian发行版需要首先安装 mariadb-plugin-spider 软件包。该软件包通常位于 /usr/share/mysql 中。

trans-unit.source: If Staging is 'big', an iteration will take longer, but run more efficiently. Hence, it is self-regulating.
trans-unit.target: 如果Staging很 "大",迭代时间会更长,但运行效率更高。因此,它是自我调节的。

trans-unit.source: If TRUE then the str will be reinitialized (not freed) before usage
trans-unit.target: 如果为TRUE，则在使用之前将对 str 进行重新初始化（不释放）

trans-unit.source: If True, Colist is a pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 如果是真的,科利斯特是一条管道。

trans-unit.source: If User Module #1 is disabled, run to enable it:
trans-unit.target: 如果用户模块#1被禁用,则运行以启用它。

trans-unit.source: If a binary log event is encountered in which the default database was db1, then apply the event in db3 instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到默认数据库为db1的二进制日志事件，请改为在db3中应用该事件。

trans-unit.source: If a binary log event is encountered in which the default database was db2, then apply the event in db4 instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果遇到默认数据库为db2的二进制日志事件，请改为在db4中应用该事件。

trans-unit.source: If a foreign key references this table, the table cannot be dropped. In this case, it is necessary to drop the foreign key first.
trans-unit.target: 如果外键引用该表，则不能删除该表。在这种情况下，必须先删除外键。

trans-unit.source: If a MyISAM table is fragmented, concurrent inserts will not be performed until an OPTIMIZE TABLE statement is executed on that table, unless the concurrent_insert server system variable is set to ALWAYS.
trans-unit.target: 如果MyISAM表是碎片化的，除非对该表执行 OPTIMIZE TABLE 语句，否则将不执行并发插入，除非将该并发服务器系统变量设置为 ALWAYS 。

trans-unit.source: If a stored procedure executes statements that change the value of LAST_INSERT_ID(), the new value will be seen by statements that follow the procedure call.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储过程执行的语句更改了LAST_INSERT_ID（）的值，则该过程调用之后的语句将看到新值。

trans-unit.source: If a DEFAULT clause is missing, the default value will be:
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少 DEFAULT 子句，则默认值为：

trans-unit.source: If a NOT NULL column having a DEFAULT value is not referenced, NULL will be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引用具有 DEFAULT 值的 NOT NULL 列，则将插入 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If a NULL column having a DEFAULT value is not referenced, its default value will be inserted. It is also possible to explicitly assign the default value using the DEFAULT keyword or the DEFAULT() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果未引用具有 DEFAULT 值的 NULL 列，则将插入其默认值。也可以使用 DEFAULT 关键字或 DEFAULT() 函数来显式分配默认值。

trans-unit.source: If a NULL is assigned to a VIRTUAL or PERSISTENT column, the default value is assigned instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 NULL 分配给 VIRTUAL 或 PERSISTENT 列，则改为分配默认值。

trans-unit.source: If a RENAME TABLE renames more than one table and one renaming fails, all renames executed by the same statement are rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个 RENAME TABLE 重命名了多个表并且一个重命名失败，则由同一条语句执行的所有重命名都将回滚。

trans-unit.source: If a SEQUENCE has been dropped and re-created then it's treated as a new SEQUENCE and PREVIOUS VALUE FOR will return NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SEQUENCE 已删除并重新创建，则将其视为新的 SEQUENCE ,并且 PREVIOUS VALUE FOR 将返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If a SIGNED generated column is based on the subtraction of an UNSIGNED value, the resulting value can vary depending on how large the value is and the NO_UNSIGNED_SUBTRACTION sql_mode flag. To make the value consistent, use CAST() to ensure that each UNSIGNED operand is SIGNED before the subtraction.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成的 SIGNED 列基于对 UNSIGNED 值的减法，则结果值可能会有所不同，具体取决于该值的大小和NO_UNSIGNED_SUBTRACTION sql_mode 标志。若要使值一致，请使用 CAST() 来确保每个 UNSIGNED 操作数在减法之前都经过 SIGNED 。

trans-unit.source: If a timeout value is specified, MASTER_POS_WAIT() stops waiting when timeout seconds have elapsed. timeout must be greater than 0; a zero or negative timeout means no timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 timeout 值，则在经过 timeout 秒数后， MASTER_POS_WAIT() 将停止等待。 timeout 必须大于0；零或负 timeout 表示没有 timeout 。

trans-unit.source: If a DYNAMIC table has some frequently-accessed fixed-length columns, it could be a good idea to move them into a separate FIXED table to avoid fragmentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果DYNAMIC表有一些经常访问的固定长度的列,那么可以把它们移到一个单独的FIXED表中,以避免碎片化。

trans-unit.source: If a Galera Cluster node is also a replication master, then some additional configuration may be needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果Galera Cluster节点也是复制主服务器，则可能需要一些其他配置。

trans-unit.source: If a Galera Cluster node is also a replication slave, then some additional configuration may be needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果Galera Cluster节点也是复制从属节点，则可能需要一些其他配置。

trans-unit.source: If a Galera Cluster node is also a replication slave, then that node's slave SQL thread will be applying transactions that it replicates from its replication master. If the node has log_slave_updates=ON set, then each transaction that the slave SQL thread applies will also generate a Galera Cluster write set that is replicated to the rest of the nodes in the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果Galera Cluster节点也是复制从属节点，则该节点的从属SQL线程将应用从复制主控复制的事务。如果节点设置了 log_slave_updates=ON ，则从属SQL线程应用的每个事务还将生成Galera Cluster写集，该写集将复制到集群中的其余节点。

trans-unit.source: If a NULL value is single-row inserted into a column declared as NOT NULL, an error will be returned. However, if the SQL mode is not strict (default until MariaDB 10.2.3), if a NULL value is multi-row inserted into a column declared as NOT NULL, the implicit default for the column type will be inserted (and NOT the default value in the table definition). The implicit defaults are an empty string for string types, and the zero value for numeric, date and time types.
trans-unit.target: 如果将NULL值单行插入声明为NOT NULL的列中，将返回错误。但是，如果SQL模式不是严格的（默认值是MariaDB 10.2.3之前的默认值），则如果将多行NULL值插入声明为NOT NULL的列中，则将插入该列类型的隐式默认值（并且不是默认值）表定义中的值）。隐式默认值是用于字符串类型的空字符串，对于数字，日期和时间类型为零。

trans-unit.source: If a UNION was interrupted during execution of one of its queries, the last step of the UNION is still executed in order to produce a partial result.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个UNION在执行它的一个查询过程中被中断,则UNION的最后一步仍会被执行,以产生一个部分结果。

trans-unit.source: If a USING clause specifies an index that's not permitted by the storage engine, the engine will instead use another available index type that can be applied without affecting results.
trans-unit.target: 如果USING子句指定的索引是存储引擎不允许的,那么引擎将改用另一种可用的索引类型,而不会影响结果。

trans-unit.source: If a UUID was provided by the --incremental-history-uuid option, then it will be saved here. Otherwise, this will be the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 --incremental-history-uuid 选项提供了UUID ，则它将保存在此处。否则，这将是空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a backup is a incremental backup, then Mariabackup will record that detail in the xtrabackup_info file.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是增量备份，则Mariabackup会将详细信息记录在 xtrabackup_info 文件中。

trans-unit.source: If a backup is a partial backup, then Mariabackup will record that detail in the xtrabackup_info file.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是部分备份，则Mariabackup会将详细信息记录在 xtrabackup_info 文件中。

trans-unit.source: If a backup is compressed, then Mariabackup will record that detail in the xtrabackup_info file.
trans-unit.target: 如果压缩了备份，则Mariabackup将在 xtrabackup_info 文件中记录该详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If a backup is streamed, then Mariabackup will record the format in the xtrabackup_info file.
trans-unit.target: 如果流式传输备份，则Mariabackup将在 xtrabackup_info 文件中记录该格式。

trans-unit.source: If a checked table is corrupted, automatically fix it. Repairing will be done after all tables have been checked.
trans-unit.target: 如果检查的表损坏了,就自动修复。在检查完所有表后,会进行修复。

trans-unit.source: If a client doesn't explicitly set the default client-side authentication plugin, then the client will determine which authentication plugin to use by checking the length of the scramble in the server's handshake packet.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端没有明确设置默认的客户端认证插件,那么客户端将通过检查服务器握手数据包中的扰动长度来决定使用哪个认证插件。

trans-unit.source: If a column has been set to ZEROFILL, all values will be prepended by zeros so that the BIGINT value contains a number of M digits.
trans-unit.target: 如果一列被设置为ZEROFILL,那么所有的值都会在前面加0,这样BIGINT值就会包含M个数字。

trans-unit.source: If a column has been set to ZEROFILL, all values will be prepended by zeros so that the SMALLINT value contains a number of M digits.
trans-unit.target: 如果一列被设置为ZEROFILL,那么所有的值都会在前面加0,这样SMALLINT的值就包含了M个数字。

trans-unit.source: If a column is chosen to be stored on overflow pages, then the entire value of the column is stored on overflow pages, and only a 20-byte pointer to the column's first overflow page is stored on the main page. Each overflow page is the size of innodb_page_size. If a column is too large to be stored on a single overflow page, then it is stored on multiple overflow pages. Each overflow page contains part of the data and a 20-byte pointer to the next overflow page, if a next page exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择将一列存储在溢出页面上，则该列的整个值将存储在溢出页面上，并且仅20字节的指针指向该列的第一个溢出页面被存储在主页上。每个溢出页面的大小为 innodb_page_size 。如果列太大而无法存储在单个溢出页面上，那么它将存储在多个溢出页面上。如果存在下一页，则每个溢出页都包含部分数据和指向下一个溢出页的20字节指针。

trans-unit.source: If a column is chosen to be stored on overflow pages, then the first 767 bytes of the column's value and a 20-byte pointer to the column's first overflow page are stored on the main page. Each overflow page is the size of innodb_page_size. If a column is too large to be stored on a single overflow page, then it is stored on multiple overflow pages. Each overflow page contains part of the data and a 20-byte pointer to the next overflow page, if a next page exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择将一列存储在溢出页面上，则该列值的前767个字节和指向该列的第一个溢出页面的20个字节的指针将存储在主页上。每个溢出页面的大小为 innodb_page_size 。如果列太大而无法存储在单个溢出页面上，那么它将存储在多个溢出页面上。如果存在下一页，则每个溢出页都包含部分数据和指向下一个溢出页的20字节指针。

trans-unit.source: If a column is dropped, old records will contain garbage in that column's former position, and new records will be written with NULL values, empty strings, or dummy values.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除了列，则旧记录将在该列的先前位置包含垃圾，而新记录将使用 NULL 值，空字符串或伪值写入。

trans-unit.source: If a column uses the DATETIME data type, then any inserted values are stored as-is, so no automatic time zone conversions are performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果列使用 DATETIME 数据类型，则所有插入的值均按原样存储，因此不会执行自动时区转换。

trans-unit.source: If a column uses the TIMESTAMP data type, then any inserted values are converted from the session's time zone to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) when stored, and converted back to the session's time zone when retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 如果列使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型，则在存储时所有插入的值都将从会话的时区转换为协调世界时（UTC），并在检索时转换回会话的时区。

trans-unit.source: If a composite query (such as UNION, or query with derived tables or with subqueries) contains more than one LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED, the last one parsed is taken into account. In this manner either the last or the outermost one is taken into account. For instance, in the query:
trans-unit.target: 如果组合查询（例如 UNION 或具有派生表或子查询的查询）包含多个 LIMIT ROWS EXAMINED ，那么将考虑最后一个已解析的查询。以这种方式，考虑了最后一个或最外面的一个。例如，在查询中：

trans-unit.source: If a condition consists of a number, it makes a condition with a subpattern reference. Such a condition is true if a capturing subpattern corresponding to the number has previously matched.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个条件由一个数字组成,它就会做出一个有子模式参考的条件。如果与数字相对应的捕获子模式之前已经匹配,那么这样的条件为真。

trans-unit.source: If a condition occurs for which no handler has been declared, the default action is EXIT.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生未声明任何处理程序的条件，则默认操作为 EXIT 。

trans-unit.source: If a connection is terminated that has an active transaction, the transaction will be rolled back. If only a query is killed, the current transaction will stay active. See also idle_transaction_timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果终止了具有活动事务的连接，则该事务将被回滚。如果仅杀死一个查询，则当前事务将保持活动状态。另请参见idle_transaction_timeout。

trans-unit.source: If a constant is compared to a TIMESTAMP or DATETIME, the constant is converted to a timestamp, unless used as an argument to the IN function.
trans-unit.target: 如果将常量与TIMESTAMP或DATETIME进行比较，则除非将该常量用作IN函数的参数，否则该常量将转换为时间戳。

trans-unit.source: If a derived table cannot be merged into its parent SELECT, it will be materialized in a temporary table, and then parent select will treat it as a regular base table.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个派生表不能合并到它的父select中,它将被物化在一个临时表中,然后父select会把它当作一个普通的基表。

trans-unit.source: If a different result is desired, Create Table options are available to change the defaults used by Pivot. For instance if we want to display the average expense for each person and product, spread in columns for each week, use the following statement:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要不同的结果,可以使用 "创建表 "选项来改变Pivot使用的默认值。例如,如果我们想显示每个人和产品的平均费用,并以列的形式分布在每个星期,使用以下语句。

trans-unit.source: If a file-per-tablespace file contains columns that use one or more of these temporal data types and if the tablespace file's original table was created with a certain storage format for these columns, then the tablespace file can only be imported into tables that were also created with the same storage format for these columns as the original table. Otherwise, you will see errors like the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个文件-每个表空间文件包含使用这些时间数据类型中的一种或多种的列,并且如果表空间文件的原始表是以这些列的某种存储格式创建的,那么只能将表空间文件导入到同样以与原始表相同的这些列的存储格式创建的表中。否则,你会看到如下的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a file-per-tablespace file was created with a certain row format, then the tablespace file can only be imported into tables that were created with the same row format as the original table. Otherwise, you will see errors like the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果每个表空间文件是以某种行格式创建的,那么该表空间文件只能导入到以与原表相同的行格式创建的表中。否则,你会看到如下错误。

trans-unit.source: If a foreign keys exists, each row in the child table must match a row in the parent table. Multiple child rows can match the same parent row. A child row matches a parent row if all its foreign key values are identical to a parent row's values in the parent table. However, if at least one of the foreign key values is NULL, the row has no parents, but it is still allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在外键，则子表中的每一行必须与父表中的每一行匹配。多个子行可以匹配同一父行。如果子行的所有外键值都与父表中父行的值相同，则该子行与父行匹配。但是，如果外键值中至少有一个为 NULL ，则该行没有父级，但仍然允许。

trans-unit.source: If a hexadecimal argument is not compared to a number, it is treated as a binary string.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个十六进制的参数没有与数字进行比较,它将被视为二进制字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a join buffer is used for a simple left outer join of tables t1 and t1 t1 LEFT JOIN t2 ON P(t1,t2) then each record r1 stored in the buffer is provided with a match flag. Initially this flag is set off. As soon as the first match for r1 is found this flag is set on. When all matching candidates from t2 have been check, the record the join buffer are scanned and for those of them that still have there match flags off null-complemented rows are generated. The same match flag is used for any record in the join buffer is a semi-join operation t1 SEMI JOIN t2 ON P(t1,t2) is performed with a block based join algorithm. When this match flag is set to on for a record r1 in the buffer no matches from table t2 for record r1 are looked for anymore.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接缓冲区用于表t1和t1的简单左外连接t1 LEFT JOIN t2 ON P(t1,t2),那么存储在缓冲区中的每条记录r1都会被提供一个匹配标志。最初这个标志被设置为关闭。一旦找到r1的第一条匹配记录,这个标志就会被设置为on。当来自t2的所有匹配候选记录都被检查过后,连接缓冲区中的记录被扫描,对于那些匹配标志仍然关闭的记录,将生成空补记录。同样的匹配标志用于加入缓冲区中的任何记录都是半加入操作t1 SEMI JOIN t2 ON P(t1,t2)是用基于块的加入算法进行的。当这个匹配标志对缓冲区中的记录r1设置为on时,不再从表t2中查找记录r1的匹配。

trans-unit.source: If a listed table is a view, an error like the following will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果列出的表是一个视图,就会产生类似下面的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a more complex definition is desired, you can ask CONNECT to analyse the XPATH up to a given level using the level option in the option list. The level value is the number of nodes that are taken in the XPATH. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更复杂的定义,您可以要求CONNECT使用选项列表中的级别选项对XPATH进行分析,直至给定级别。级别值是指XPATH中所取的节点数。例如

trans-unit.source: If a more complex definition is desired, you can ask CONNECT to analyze the JPATH up to a given level using the level option in the option list. The level value is the number of sub-objects that are taken in the JPATH. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 如果需要更复杂的定义,您可以使用选项列表中的级别选项要求CONNECT分析JPATH,直至给定级别。级别值是指JPATH中所取的子对象的数量。例如

trans-unit.source: If a name was provided by the --history or the ---incremental-history-name options, then it will be saved here. Otherwise, this will be the empty string.
trans-unit.target: 如果 --history 或 ---incremental-history-name 选项提供了名称，则将其保存在此处。否则，这将是空字符串。

trans-unit.source: If a new module has been added or if a module was previously disable, use this command to enable the module. The command alterSystem-EnableModule will restart the system as part of its functionality to bring the new module into use. So there will be some down time during this process.
trans-unit.target: 如果增加了一个新的模块,或者之前已经禁用了一个模块,则使用该命令来启用该模块。alterSystem-EnableModule命令会重新启动系统,作为其功能的一部分,使新模块投入使用。所以在这个过程中会有一些停机时间。

trans-unit.source: If a node has only been out of a cluster for a little while, then an IST is generally faster than an SST.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个节点只离开集群一小段时间,那么IST一般比SST快。

trans-unit.source: If a non-deterministic function is used for a PERSISTENT generated column, then any changes made to this table should be logged to the binary log in the row-based logging format when the binlog_format system variable is set to MIXED. However, this does not always happen. Therefore, it is recommended to set the binlog_format system variable to ROW. See MDEV-10436 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果将非确定性函数用于 PERSISTENT 生成的列，则将 binlog_format 系统变量设置为 MIXED 时，对该表所做的任何更改都应以基于行的日志记录格式记录到二进制日志中。但是，这并不总是发生。因此，建议将 binlog_format 系统变量设置为 ROW 。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-10436。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin is installed with one of these options, then a record will not be added to the mysql.plugins table for the plugin. This means that if the server is restarted without the same option set, then the plugin will not automatically be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果插件安装与其中一个选项，然后记录将不会被添加到 mysql.plugins 表插件。这意味着，如果在未设置相同选项的情况下重新启动服务器，则不会自动加载插件。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin is installed with one of these statements, then a record will be added to the mysql.plugins table for the plugin. This means that the plugin will automatically be loaded every time the server restarts, unless specifically uninstalled or deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用以下语句之一安装了插件，则将在该插件的 mysql.plugins 表中添加一条记录。这意味着该插件将在每次服务器重新启动时自动加载，除非专门卸载或停用了该插件。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin is installed with this utility, then a record will be added to the mysql.plugins table for the plugin. This means that the plugin will automatically be loaded every time the server restarts, unless specifically uninstalled or deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此实用程序安装了插件，则将在该插件的 mysql.plugins 表中添加一条记录。这意味着该插件将在每次服务器重新启动时自动加载，除非专门卸载或停用了该插件。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin's Library column has the NULL value, then the plugin is built-in, and it cannot be uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 如果插件的“ Library 列具有 NULL 值，则表明该插件是内置的，因此无法卸载。

trans-unit.source: If a plugin's PLUGIN_LIBRARY column has the NULL value, then the plugin is built-in, and it cannot be uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 如果插件的 PLUGIN_LIBRARY 列的值为 NULL ，则表明该插件是内置的，因此无法卸载。

trans-unit.source: If a prepared statement with the given name already exists, it is deallocated implicitly before the new statement is prepared. This means that if the new statement contains an error and cannot be prepared, an error is returned and no statement with the given name exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果已准备好的带有给定名称的语句已经存在,那么在准备新语句之前,它将被隐式地deallocated。这意味着,如果新语句包含一个错误,无法准备,则返回一个错误,并且不存在给定名称的语句。

trans-unit.source: If a property is specified more than once, an error like this will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个属性被指定了一次以上,就会产生类似这样的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a qualifier is composed by more than one identifier, a dot (.) must be used as a separator. All identifiers can be quoted individually. Extra spacing (including new lines and tabs) is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个限定符由一个以上的标识符组成,则必须使用点(.)作为分隔符。所有的标识符都可以单独引用。允许额外的间距(包括新行和制表符)。

trans-unit.source: If a query does not involve the "multiple" column, no row multiplication will be done. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 如果查询中不涉及 "多列",则不进行行乘。例如:

trans-unit.source: If a query is EXPLAIN-ed.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询是 EXPLAIN -ed。

trans-unit.source: If a query uses a derived table (or a view), the first action that the que...
trans-unit.target: 如果查询使用了派生表(或视图),那么查询的第一个操作就是使用派生表。

trans-unit.source: If a query uses a derived table (or a view), the first action that the query optimizer will attempt is to apply the derived-table-merge-optimization and merge the derived table into its parent select. However, that optimization is only applicable when the select inside the derived table has a join as the top-level operation. If it has a GROUP-BY, DISTINCT, or uses window functions, then derived-table-merge-optimization is not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询使用派生表（或视图），则查询优化器将尝试的第一个操作是应用派生表合并优化并将派生表合并到其父选择中。但是，仅当派生表中的select具有联接作为顶级操作时，该优化才适用。如果它具有GROUP-BY，DISTINCT或使用窗口函数，则派生表合并优化不适用。

trans-unit.source: If a role that doesn't exist, or to which the user has not been assigned, is specified, an ERROR 1959 (OP000): Invalid role specification error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了不存在的角色或尚未分配用户的 ERROR 1959 (OP000): Invalid role specification 则将发生错误1959（OP000）：无效的角色指定错误。

trans-unit.source: If a row in the table matches a new foreground thread's client and host, the matching INSTRUMENTED column in the threads table is set to either YES or NO, which allows selective application of instrumenting by host, by user, or combination thereof.
trans-unit.target: 如果表中的行与新的前台线程的客户端和主机匹配，则线程表中匹配的 INSTRUMENTED 列设置为 YES 或 NO ，这允许按主机，用户或其组合选择性地应用检测。

trans-unit.source: If a row is rejected because of the CHECK OPTION, an error similar to the following is produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果一条记录因为CHECK OPTION而被拒绝,就会产生一个类似于下面的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a row with the GROUP BY key exists in the temporary table, add the new result row to it. If not, create a new row.
trans-unit.target: 如果临时表中存在带有GROUP BY键的行，则向其添加新的结果行。如果没有，请创建一个新行。

trans-unit.source: If a row's last InnoDB undo log record is purged, this can obviously effect the value of the row's DB_ROLL_PTR column, because there would no longer be any InnoDB undo log record for the pointer to reference.
trans-unit.target: 如果清除了行的最后一个InnoDB撤消日志记录，这显然可以影响该行的 DB_ROLL_PTR 列的值，因为不再有任何InnoDB撤消日志记录供引用指针使用。

trans-unit.source: If a search string matches multiple items, MariaDB shows a list of matching topics:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个搜索字符串匹配了多个项目,MariaDB会显示一个匹配主题的列表。

trans-unit.source: If a secondary index is bigger than can be cached in RAM, and if the column(s) being indexed is random, then each row inserted may cause a disk hit to update the index. This limits insert speed to something like 100 rows per second (on ordinary disks). Multiple random indexes slow down insertion further. RAID striping and/or SSDs speed up insertion. Write caching helps, but only for bursts.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个二级索引的大小超过了RAM中的缓存,而且如果被索引的列是随机的,那么每插入一行都可能会导致更新索引的磁盘冲击。这就将插入速度限制在每秒100行左右(在普通磁盘上)。多个随机索引会进一步降低插入速度。RAID条带和/或SSD可以加快插入速度。写入缓存有帮助,但只适用于突发情况。

trans-unit.source: If a sent command causes warnings to be issued, it is useless to resend a “show warnings” command because the MariaDB server is opened and closed when sending commands. Therefore, getting warnings requires a specific (and tricky) way.
trans-unit.target: 如果已发送的命令导致发出警告，则重新发送“ show warnings”命令毫无用处，因为在发送命令时，MariaDB服务器已打开和关闭。因此，获得警告需要一种特定的（且棘手的）方式。

trans-unit.source: If a server has the lc_messages system variable set to the fr_CA locale like the above example, then error messages would be in French. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器像上面的示例一样将 lc_messages 系统变量设置为 fr_CA 语言环境，则错误消息将为法语。例如：

trans-unit.source: If a server needs to be able to switch between acting as a master and a slave, then you can enable both the master and slave system variables on the server. For example, you might need to do this if MariaDB MaxScale is being used to enable auto-failover or switchover with MariaDB Monitor.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器需要能够在充当主服务器和从服务器之间进行切换，则可以在服务器上同时启用主系统和从系统变量。例如，如果使用MariaDB MaxScale通过MariaDB Monitor启用自动故障转移或切换，则可能需要执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: If a service principal name is not provided, then the plugin will try to use mariadb/host.domain.com@REALM by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供服务主体名称，则该插件将默认尝试使用 mariadb/host.domain.com@REALM 。

trans-unit.source: If a situation as described above exists when you try to install MariaDB you will get an error like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果你在尝试安装MariaDB时存在上述情况,你会得到这样的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a slave is active but has yet to read from a binary log file you attempt to delete, the statement will fail with an error. However, if the slave is not connected and has yet to read from a log file you delete, the file will be deleted, but the slave will be unable to continue replicating once it connects again.
trans-unit.target: 如果从机处于活动状态,但尚未从您试图删除的二进制日志文件中读取,则该语句将以错误方式失败。但是,如果从机没有连接,并且尚未从您删除的日志文件中读取,则该文件将被删除,但从机一旦再次连接,将无法继续复制。

trans-unit.source: If a slave is configured with the binlog disabled, current_pos and slave_pos are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 如果从站配置为禁用二进制日志，则 current_pos 和 slave_pos 是等效的。

trans-unit.source: If a slave server tries to replicate a GTID with a sequence number lower than what is already in the binlog for that replication domain, the SQL thread stops with an error (this indicates an extra transaction in the slave binlog not present on the master).
trans-unit.target: 如果从属服务器试图复制一个GTID,其序列号低于该复制域的binlog中已有的序列号,则SQL线程会因错误而停止(这表明从属binlog中存在一个额外的事务,而主服务器上不存在)。

trans-unit.source: If a statement may potentially have an effect, but doesn't, such as an UPDATE or DELETE that returns no rows, it will still be logged (this applies to the default statement-based logging, not to row-based logging - see Binary Log Formats).
trans-unit.target: 如果一条语句可能会产生影响，但没有效果，例如UPDATE或DELETE不返回任何行，则该语句仍将被记录（这适用于默认的基于语句的记录，不适用于基于行的记录-请参阅Binary日志格式）。

trans-unit.source: If a statement uses all the columns of a unique index to search for unique row, gap locking is not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果一条语句使用唯一索引的所有列来搜索唯一行,则不使用间隙锁定。

trans-unit.source: If a storage engine does not support FLUSH TABLES FOR EXPORT, a 1031 error (SQLSTATE 'HY000') is produced.
trans-unit.target: 如果存储引擎不支持 FLUSH TABLES FOR EXPORT ，则会产生1031错误（SQLSTATE'HY000 '）。

trans-unit.source: If a string argument is added, it specifies the Json path to the array to be modified. For instance:
trans-unit.target: 如果添加了一个字符串参数,则指定要修改的数组的Json路径。例如

trans-unit.source: If a subquery is used in this way, you must also use an AS clause to name the result of the subquery.
trans-unit.target: 如果以这种方式使用子查询,还必须使用AS子句来命名子查询的结果。

trans-unit.source: If a table does not exist, an error like the following will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表不存在,就会产生类似下面的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a table exists when the backup starts, but it is dropped before the backup copies it, then the tablespace file can't be copied, so the backup would fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份开始时表存在,但在备份复制之前就被删除了,那么表空间文件就无法复制,所以备份会失败。

trans-unit.source: If a table has a FULLTEXT index, then it cannot be rebuilt by any ALTER TABLE operations when the LOCK clause is set to NONE.
trans-unit.target: 如果表具有 FULLTEXT 索引，则当 LOCK 子句设置为 NONE 时，任何 ALTER TABLE 操作都无法重建该表。

trans-unit.source: If a table has a SPATIAL index, then it cannot be rebuilt by any ALTER TABLE operations when the LOCK clause is set to NONE.
trans-unit.target: 如果表具有 SPATIAL 索引，则当 LOCK 子句设置为 NONE 时，任何 ALTER TABLE 操作都无法重建该表。

trans-unit.source: If a table has more than one FULLTEXT index, then it cannot be rebuilt by any ALTER TABLE operations when ALGORITHM is set to INPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表具有多个 FULLTEXT 索引，则当 ALGORITHM 设置为 INPLACE 时，任何 ALTER TABLE 操作都无法重建该表。

trans-unit.source: If a table identifier is prefixed with a dot (.), the default database is assumed. This syntax is supported for ODBC compliance, but has no practical effect on MariaDB. These qualifiers are equivalent:
trans-unit.target: 如果表的标识符前加一个点(.),则假定为默认数据库。这种语法是为了符合ODBC的要求而支持的,但对MariaDB没有实际影响。这些限定符是等价的。

trans-unit.source: If a table is a view, an error like the following will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表是一个视图,就会产生类似下面的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a table is based on only one zip file containing several entries, this will be indicated by placing the ‘%s’ part in the entry option value.
trans-unit.target: 如果表仅基于一个包含多个条目的zip文件，则将'％s'部分放置在条目选项值中来表明这一点。

trans-unit.source: If a table is based on several zipped files, portioning is done the standard way as above. This is the file_name option specifying the name of the zip files that shall contain the ‘%s’ part used to generate the file names.
trans-unit.target: 如果表基于多个压缩文件，则按上述标准方法进行分割。这是file_name选项，用于指定zip文件的名称，该文件应包含用于生成文件名的'％s'部分。

trans-unit.source: If a table is created during the backup, then it might not exist in the backup after prepare.
trans-unit.target: 如果在备份期间创建了表,那么在准备后,表可能不存在于备份中。

trans-unit.source: If a table is dropped and created under the same name during the backup after the tablespace file was copied, then the table will have the wrong tablespace ID when the backup is prepared.
trans-unit.target: 如果在复制表空间文件后,在备份过程中以相同的名称丢弃和创建了一个表,那么在准备备份时,该表的表空间ID将是错误的。

trans-unit.source: If a table is dropped during the backup, then it might still exists after the backup is prepared.
trans-unit.target: 如果在备份过程中丢弃了一张表,那么在准备备份后,它可能仍然存在。

trans-unit.source: If a table is renamed during the backup after the tablespace file was copied, then the table may not exist after the backup is prepared.
trans-unit.target: 如果在复制表空间文件后,在备份过程中对表进行了重命名,那么在准备备份后,该表可能不存在。

trans-unit.source: If a table was modified by an external application that does not handle indexing, the indexes must be reconstructed to prevent returning false or incomplete results. To do this, use the OPTIMIZE TABLE command.
trans-unit.target: 如果表是由不处理索引的外部应用程序修改的，则必须重建索引以防止返回错误或不完整的结果。为此，请使用OPTIMIZE TABLE命令。

trans-unit.source: If a table with the same name exists, error 1050 results. Use IF NOT EXISTS to suppress this error and issue a note instead. Use SHOW WARNINGS to see notes.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在具有相同名称的表，则会导致错误1050。使用 IF NOT EXISTS 可以消除此错误，并发出注释。使用 SHOW WARNINGS 来查看注释。

trans-unit.source: If a table's definition can allow rows that the table's InnoDB row format can't actually store, then InnoDB will raise errors or warnings in certain scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表的定义可以允许表的InnoDB行格式实际不能存储的行,那么InnoDB会在某些情况下引发错误或警告。

trans-unit.source: If a table's index structure is changed, index statistics recorded in this table may also be reset.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个表的索引结构发生了变化,那么记录在这个表中的索引统计也可能被重置。

trans-unit.source: If a test fails, it is retried up to a maximum of N runs (default 1). Retries are also limited by the maximum number of failures before stopping, set with the --retry-failure option. This option has no effect unless --force is also used; without it, test execution will terminate after the first failure. The --retry and --retry-failure options do not affect how many times a test repeated with --repeat may fail in total, as each repetition is considered a new test case, which may in turn be retried if it fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果测试失败，则最多重试N次（默认值为1）。重试也受停止前失败的最大次数限制，可以通过 --retry-failure 选项设置。除非也使用 --force ,否则该选项无效。没有它，测试执行将在第一次失败后终止。该 --retry 和 --retry-failure 选项不影响多少次反复测试 --repeat 可以在总失败，因为每次重复被认为是一个新的测试情况下，这可能反过来如果失败重审。

trans-unit.source: If a transaction log has been read (i.e. the log is offline), it will be recycled for writing again, unless it must be deleted because the number of logs on disk exceeds this threshold. Recycling logs is an optimization because the writing a pre-allocated file is faster then writing to the end of a file.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个事务日志已经被读取(即日志处于离线状态),它将被回收再次写入,除非因为磁盘上的日志数量超过这个阈值而必须删除。回收日志是一种优化,因为写一个预先分配的文件比写到文件末尾要快。

trans-unit.source: If a trigger contains an error and the engine is transactional, or it is a BEFORE trigger, the trigger will not run, and will prevent the original statement from running as well. If the engine is non-transactional, and it is an AFTER trigger, the trigger will not run, but the original statement will.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个触发器包含一个错误,并且引擎是事务性的,或者是一个BEFORE触发器,那么触发器将不会运行,并且也会阻止原始语句的运行。如果引擎是非事务性的,并且是一个AFTER触发器,那么触发器不会运行,但是原始语句会运行。

trans-unit.source: If a trigger is loaded into cache, it is not automatically reloaded when the table metadata changes. In this case a trigger can operate using the outdated metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个触发器被加载到缓存中,当表元数据改变时,它不会自动重新加载。在这种情况下,触发器可以使用过时的元数据进行操作。

trans-unit.source: If a unique index consists of a column where trailing pad characters are stripped or ignored, inserts into that column where values differ only by the number of trailing pad characters will result in a duplicate-key error.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个唯一的索引包含一个列,其中的尾部垫字符被剥离或被忽略,那么插入到该列中的值仅因尾部垫字符的数量而不同,将导致重复键错误。

trans-unit.source: If a user has been granted a role, they do not automatically obtain all permissions associated with that role. These permissions are only in use when the user activates the role with the SET ROLE statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果已向用户授予角色，则他们不会自动获取与该角色关联的所有权限。仅当用户使用SET ROLE语句激活角色时，才使用这些权限。

trans-unit.source: If a user has the SUPER privilege but not the DELETE HISTORY privilege, running mysql_upgrade will grant DELETE HISTORY as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户具有SUPER特权但没有 DELETE HISTORY 特权，则运行mysql_upgrade也会授予 DELETE HISTORY 。

trans-unit.source: If a user sets the value of the gtid_slave_pos system variable, and gtid_binlog_pos contains later GTIDs for certain replication domains, then gtid_current_pos will contain the GTIDs from gtid_binlog_pos for those replication domains. To protect users in this scenario, if a user sets tthe gtid_slave_pos system variable to a GTID position that is behind the GTID position in gtid_binlog_pos, then the server will give the user a warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户设置了 gtid_slave_pos 系统变量的值，并且 gtid_binlog_pos 包含更高版本的某些复制域的 gtid_current_pos ，则gtid_current_pos将包含来自 gtid_binlog_pos 的那些复制域的GTID。为了在这种情况下保护用户，如果用户将 gtid_slave_pos 系统变量设置为GTid位置，该位置在 gtid_binlog_pos 中的GTID位置之后，则服务器将向用户发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If a user value is given for the DEFINER clause, it should be a MariaDB account in 'user_name'@'host_name' format (the same format used in the GRANT statement). The user_name and host_name values both are required. The definer can also be given as CURRENT_USER or CURRENT_USER(). The default DEFINER value is the user who executes the CREATE VIEW statement. This is the same as specifying DEFINER = CURRENT_USER explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 如果为DEFINER子句提供了用户值,那么它应该是一个MariaDB账户,格式为'user_name'@'host_name'(与GRANT语句中使用的格式相同)。user_name和host_name的值都是必须的。定义器也可以给出CURRENT_USER或CURRENT_USER()。默认的DEFINER值是执行CREATE VIEW语句的用户。这与显式指定 DEFINER=CURRENT_USER 是一样的。

trans-unit.source: If a variable has not been used yet, its value is NULL:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个变量还没有被使用,它的值是NULL。

trans-unit.source: If a view references another view, it will be possible to drop the referenced view. However, the other view will reference a view which does not exist any more. Thus, querying it will produce an error similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果一个视图引用了另一个视图,则可以放弃引用的视图。然而,另一个视图将引用一个不再存在的视图。因此,查询它将产生类似于以下的错误。

trans-unit.source: If a warning is issued with the SIGNAL or RESIGNAL statement (that is, an error with an SQLSTATE starting with '01'), it will be treated like an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果用SIGNAL或RESIGNAL语句发出警告(即SQLSTATE以'01'开头的错误),将被当作错误处理。

trans-unit.source: If all goes well, it will run in O(M) where M is the number of output rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果一切顺利,它将在O(M)中运行,其中M是输出行数。

trans-unit.source: If all the servers are in the same 'vulnerability zone' -- eg, rack or data center -- Have an odd number (at least 3) of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有的服务器都在同一个 "脆弱区"--例如,机架或数据中心--拥有奇数(至少3个)的节点。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation supports the INPLACE algorithm, then it can be performed using optimizations by the underlying storage engine, but it may rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALTER TABLE 操作支持 INPLACE 算法，则可以通过基础存储引擎的优化来执行它，但是可以重新构建它。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation supports the INSTANT algorithm, then it can be performed without modifying any data files.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALTER TABLE 操作支持 INSTANT 算法，则无需修改任何数据文件即可执行该算法。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation supports the NOCOPY algorithm, then it can be performed without rebuilding the clustered index.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALTER TABLE 操作支持 NOCOPY 算法，则可以在不重建聚簇索引的情况下执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation supports ALGORITHM=INPLACE, then it can be performed using optimizations by the underlying storage engine, but it may rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALTER TABLE 操作支持 ALGORITHM=INPLACE ，则可以通过基础存储引擎的优化来执行该操作，但是可以重新构建它。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation is being performed and the connection is killed, the changes will be rolled back in a controlled manner. The rollback can be a slow operation as the time it takes is relative to how far the operation has progressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果正在执行 ALTER TABLE 操作并终止了连接，则更改将以受控方式回滚。回滚可能是一个缓慢的操作，因为它花费的时间与操作进行的时间有关。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation supports ALGORITHM=INSTANT, then it can be performed without modifying any data files.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALTER TABLE 操作支持 ALGORITHM=INSTANT ，则可以在不修改任何数据文件的情况下执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: If an ALTER TABLE operation supports ALGORITHM=NOCOPY, then it can be performed without rebuilding the clustered index.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ALTER TABLE 操作支持 ALGORITHM=NOCOPY ，则可以在不重建聚簇索引的情况下执行该操作。

trans-unit.source: If an INSERT statement contain the HIGH_PRIORITY clause, concurrent inserts cannot be used. INSERT ... DELAYED is usually unneeded if concurrent inserts are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 INSERT 语句包含 HIGH_PRIORITY 子句，则不能使用并发插入。如果启用了并发插入，则通常不需要 INSERT ... DELAYED 。

trans-unit.source: If an InnoDB page compression algorithm does not support compression levels, then it ignores any provided compression level value.
trans-unit.target: 如果InnoDB页面压缩算法不支持压缩级别,那么它将忽略任何提供的压缩级别值。

trans-unit.source: If an array, expand it if under an expanded object or take the first value of it.
trans-unit.target: 如果是一个数组,如果在一个扩展对象下扩展它,或者取其中的第一个值。

trans-unit.source: If an array, the number of elements in the array.
trans-unit.target: 如果是数组,则表示数组中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: If an error in processing dependencies is encountered, a user can fix it manually
trans-unit.target: 如果在处理依赖关系的过程中遇到错误,用户可以手动修复。

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs during the query, the table will not be created at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果在查询过程中发生错误,表将根本不会被创建。

trans-unit.source: If an event is currently being executed, it can be seen by querying the Information Schema PROCESSLIST table, or with the SHOW PROCESSLIST statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在执行事件，则可以通过查询Information Schema PROCESSLIST表或使用SHOW PROCESSLIST语句来查看它。

trans-unit.source: If an event is recurring, you can specify when the first execution must happen via the STARTS clause and a maximum time for the last execution via the ENDS clause. STARTS and ENDS clauses are followed by a timestamp and, optionally, one or more intervals. The ENDS clause can specify a timestamp in the past, so that the event is stored but not executed until you modify it via ALTER EVENT.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件重复发生，则可以通过 STARTS 子句指定第一次执行的时间，而通过 ENDS 子句指定最后一次执行的最长时间。 STARTS 和 ENDS 子句后跟一个时间戳记，以及一个或多个间隔（可选）。该 ENDS 子句可以指定在过去的时间戳，因此该事件被保存，但要等到通过修改它不执行ALTER EVENT。

trans-unit.source: If an index is defined on a generated column, then the optimizer considers using it in the same way as indexes based on "real" columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果在生成的列上定义了一个索引,那么优化器就会考虑以与基于 "真实 "列的索引相同的方式使用它。

trans-unit.source: If an index is rarely used (or not used at all) then remove it to increase INSERT, and UPDATE performance.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个索引很少使用(或者根本不用),那么就把它删除,以提高INSERT,和UPDATE的性能。

trans-unit.source: If an instrument creates multiple instances, each instance has a unique OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN value to allow for grouping by instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果工具创建多个实例，则每个实例都具有唯一的 OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN 值，以允许按实例进行分组。

trans-unit.source: If an item is inserted or deleted between the time you look at one page and the next, you could miss an item, or see an item duplicated.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个项目在你查看一个页面和下一个页面之间被插入或删除,你可能会错过一个项目,或者看到一个项目被重复。

trans-unit.source: If an object, the number of members in the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果是对象,则表示该对象中的成员数。

trans-unit.source: If an option is not explicitly set, then the server or client will simply use the default value for that option.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确设置一个选项,那么服务器或客户端将简单地使用该选项的默认值。

trans-unit.source: If an option is set outside of subpattern parentheses, the option applies to the remainder of the pattern that follows the option. If an option is set inside a subpattern, it applies to the part of this subpattern that follows the option.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个选项设置在子模式括号外,则该选项适用于该选项后面的模式的剩余部分。如果一个选项设置在子模式内,它适用于该选项后面的子模式部分。
