trans-unit.source: If an option or system variable is not explicitly set, then it will be set to its default value. See Server System Variables for a full list of all server system variables and their default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置选项或系统变量，则它将被设置为其默认值。有关所有服务器系统变量及其默认值的完整列表，请参见服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If an unknown option is provided to mysqld_safe on the command-line, then it is passed to mysqld_safe.
trans-unit.target: 如果在命令行上为 mysqld_safe 提供了未知选项，则将其传递给 mysqld_safe 。

trans-unit.source: If another connection is using the sequence, a metadata lock is active, and this statement will wait until the lock is released. This is also true for non-transactional tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个连接正在使用该序列,则元数据锁处于活动状态,该语句将等待直到锁被释放。对于非事务性表也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If another connection is using the table, a metadata lock is active, and this statement will wait until the lock is released. This is also true for non-transactional tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一个连接正在使用该表，则元数据锁处于活动状态，并且该语句将等待直到锁被释放。对于非事务处理表也是如此。

trans-unit.source: If any MariaDB files are in /home/
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何MariaDB文件在/home/。

trans-unit.source: If any MariaDB storage references raw block devices
trans-unit.target: 如果任何MariaDB存储引用原始块设备

trans-unit.source: If any MariaDB write any files to anywhere under /boot, /usr or /etc
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB在/boot、/usr或/etc下的任何地方写入任何文件。

trans-unit.source: If any argument is NULL, returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数为 NULL ，则返回 NULL.

trans-unit.source: If any argument is NULL, returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数为 NULL ，则返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If any argument is NULL, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数为 NULL ，则函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If any argument is a case-sensitive string, the arguments are compared as case-sensitive strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何参数是区分大小写的字符串,则将参数作为区分大小写的字符串进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If any of the arguments are set as NULL, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果将任何参数设置为 NULL ，则该函数返回 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If any of the following functions are present in a query, it will not be cached. Queries with these functions are sometimes called 'non-deterministic' - don't get confused with the use of this term in other contexts.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个查询中存在以下任何一个函数,它将不会被缓存。带有这些函数的查询有时被称为 "非确定性"--不要与这个术语在其他情况下的使用相混淆。

trans-unit.source: If any of the following statements is in effect in the session, attempting FLUSH TABLES ... FOR EXPORT will produce an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果会话中以下任何语句有效，则尝试 FLUSH TABLES ... FOR EXPORT 将产生错误。

trans-unit.source: If any of the old user accounts do not exist or any of the new user accounts already exist, ERROR 1396 (HY000) results. If an error occurs, RENAME USER will still rename the accounts that do not result in an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何旧用户帐户不存在或任何新用户帐户已经存在，则将导致 ERROR 1396 (HY000) 。如果发生错误， RENAME USER 仍将重命名不会导致错误的帐户。

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified accounts, or any permissions for the specified accounts, already exist, then the server returns ERROR 1396 (HY000). If an error occurs, CREATE USER will still create the accounts that do not result in an error. Only one error is produced for all users which have not been created:
trans-unit.target: 如果已经存在任何指定帐户或指定帐户的任何权限，则服务器将返回 ERROR 1396 (HY000) 。如果发生错误，则 CREATE USER 仍将创建不会导致错误的帐户。对于尚未创建的所有用户，只会产生一个错误：

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified roles already exist, ERROR 1396 (HY000) results. If an error occurs, CREATE ROLE will still create the roles that do not result in an error. The maximum length for a role is 128 characters. Role names can be quoted, as explained in the Identifier names page. Only one error is produced for all roles which have not been created:
trans-unit.target: 如果任何指定的角色已经存在，将导致 ERROR 1396 (HY000) 。如果发生错误，则 CREATE ROLE 仍将创建不会导致错误的角色。角色的最大长度为128个字符。可以引用角色名称，如“ 标识符名称”页面中所述。对于所有尚未创建的角色，只会产生一个错误：

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified user accounts do not exist, ERROR 1396 (HY000) results. If an error occurs, DROP ROLE will still drop the roles that do not result in an error. Only one error is produced for all roles which have not been dropped:
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何指定的用户帐户，将导致 ERROR 1396 (HY000) 。如果发生错误， DROP ROLE 仍将删除不会导致错误的角色。对于所有尚未删除的角色，只会产生一个错误：

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified user accounts do not exist, ERROR 1396 (HY000) results. If an error occurs, DROP USER will still drop the accounts that do not result in an error. Only one error is produced for all users which have not been dropped:
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在任何指定的用户帐户，将导致 ERROR 1396 (HY000) 。如果发生错误， DROP USER 仍将删除不会导致错误的帐户。对于尚未删除的所有用户，只会产生一个错误：

trans-unit.source: If any of the specified user accounts do not yet exist, an error results. If an error occurs, ALTER USER will still modify the accounts that do not result in an error. Only one error is produced for all users which have not been modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何指定的用户帐户尚不存在，则会导致错误。如果发生错误， ALTER USER 仍将修改不会导致错误的帐户。对于所有未修改的用户，只会产生一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If any of these limits are set to 0, then there is no limit for that resource for that user.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些限制中的任何一个设置为 0 ，那么该用户的资源将没有限制。

trans-unit.source: If any of these options are set for a specific user account, then any client who tries to connect with that user account will have to be configured to connect with TLS.
trans-unit.target: 如果这些选项中的任何一个被设置为特定的用户账户,那么任何试图与该用户账户连接的客户端都必须被配置为使用TLS连接。

trans-unit.source: If any user logs in for a query while User 1 and User 2 are running queries, these new users (i.e., User 3,4 and 5) get only the remaining 30% of the CPU Resources."
trans-unit.target: 如果在用户1和用户2运行查询时,有任何用户登录查询,这些新用户(即用户3、4、5)只能获得剩余30%的CPU资源。"

trans-unit.source: If batching seems viable, then design the batching layer to gather for S seconds or 100-1000 rows, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 如果批处理似乎可行,那么设计批处理层收集S秒或100-1000行,以先到者为准。

trans-unit.source: If binary logging is enabled, when a stored function is created, it must be declared as either DETERMINISTIC, NO SQL or READS SQL DATA, or else an error will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了二进制日志记录，则在创建存储函数时，必须将其声明为 DETERMINISTIC ， NO SQL 或 READS SQL DATA ，否则将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: If both arguments are integer numbers (tinyint, smallint, mediumint, bigint), the result may vary between int, int unsigned, bigint or bigint unsigned, depending of the exact data types and their signs.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个参数都是整数(tinyint、smallint、mediumint、bigint),结果可能在int、int unsigned、bigint或bigint unsigned之间变化,这取决于具体的数据类型和它们的符号。

trans-unit.source: If both arguments are integers, they are compared as integers.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个参数都是整数,则作为整数进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If both arguments are strings, they are compared as strings.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个参数都是字符串,则将其作为字符串进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If both operands are integers, the result is calculated with BIGINT precision. If either integer is unsigned, the result is also an unsigned integer, unless the NO_UNSIGNED_SUBTRACTION SQL_MODE is enabled, in which case the result is always signed.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个操作数均为整数，则以BIGINT精度计算结果。如果任何一个整数都是无符号的，则结果也是一个无符号的整数，除非启用了NO_UNSIGNED_SUBTRACTION SQL_MODE，在这种情况下，结果始终是有符号的。

trans-unit.source: If both operands are integers, the result is calculated with BIGINT precision. If either integer is unsigned, the result is also an unsigned integer.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个操作数均为整数，则以BIGINT精度计算结果。如果任一整数是无符号的，则结果也是无符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: If called with no argument, returns a Unix timestamp (seconds since '1970-01-01 00:00:00' UTC) as an unsigned integer. If UNIX_TIMESTAMP() is called with a date argument, it returns the value of the argument as seconds since '1970-01-01 00:00:00' UTC. date may be a DATE string, a DATETIME string, a TIMESTAMP, or a number in the format YYMMDD or YYYYMMDD. The server interprets date as a value in the current time zone and converts it to an internal value in UTC. Clients can set their time zone as described in time zones.
trans-unit.target: 如果不带任何参数调用，则返回Unix时间戳（自'1970-01-01 00:00: 00'UTC以来的秒数），为无符号整数。如果使用日期参数调用 UNIX_TIMESTAMP() ，则它将返回自1970年1月1日00:00:00 UTC以来的参数值，以秒为单位。 date可以是 DATE 字符串， DATETIME 字符串， TIMESTAMP 或YYMMDD或YYYYMMDD格式的数字。服务器将日期解释为当前时区中的值，并将其转换为UTC中的内部值。客户可以按照时区中的说明设置时区。

trans-unit.source: If called with one parameter, this function returns the natural logarithm of X. If X is less than or equal to 0, then NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用一个参数,该函数返回X的自然对数,如果X小于或等于0,则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If called with two parameters, it returns the logarithm of X to the base B. If B is <= 1 or X <= 0, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用两个参数调用，它将X的对数返回到基数B。如果B <= 1或X <= 0，则该函数返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If compression (COMPRESSION_ALGORITHM=zlib) is used, then all index blocks and data blocks are compressed. The .frm file and Aria definition header (first page/pages in the index file) are not compressed as these are used by discovery/open.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用压缩（ COMPRESSION_ALGORITHM=zlib ），则所有索引块和数据块都将被压缩。该 .frm 文件和咏叹调定义页眉（第一页/索引文件页）不会被压缩，因为这些被发现/开放使用。

trans-unit.source: If compression is used, then the local block size is S3_BLOCK_SIZE, but the block stored in S3 will be the size of the compressed block.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用压缩，则本地块大小为 S3_BLOCK_SIZE ，但存储在S3中的块将为压缩块的大小。

trans-unit.source: If distinct optimization (remove duplicates) was used. This is marked only for the last table in the SELECT.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了独特的优化（删除重复项）。这仅在 SELECT 中的最后一个表中标记。

trans-unit.source: If duplicate unique key was found, keep old row.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现重复的唯一键,则保留旧行。

trans-unit.source: If duplicate unique key was found, replace old row.
trans-unit.target: 如果发现重复的唯一键,则替换旧行。

trans-unit.source: If either argument is NULL, the result of the comparison is NULL unless the NULL-safe <=> equality comparison operator is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何一个参数为NULL，则除非使用了NULL安全的<=>相等比较运算符，否则比较的结果为NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If either clause is omitted, the default behavior for the omitted clause is RESTRICT.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略任何一个子句，则省略子句的默认行为是 RESTRICT 。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a decimal number, the result is decimal.
trans-unit.target: 如果任何一个参数是十进制数,结果就是十进制数。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is a string (char, varchar, text), the result is double.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中的任何一个是字符串(char,varchar,text),结果是double。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is an approximate number (float, double), the result is double.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中的任何一个是近似数(float,double),结果就是double。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is of a temporal type with a non-zero fractional second precision (time(N), datetime(N), timestamp(N)), the result is decimal.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中的任何一个是精度为非零小数秒的时间类型(time(N),datetime(N),timestamp(N)),结果为十进制。

trans-unit.source: If either of the arguments is of a temporal type with a zero fractional second precision (time(0), date, datetime(0), timestamp(0)), the result may vary between int, int unsigned, bigint or bigint unsigned, depending on the exact data type combination.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数中的任何一个是精度为零小数秒的时间类型(time(0)、date、datetime(0)、timestamp(0)),结果可能在int、int unsigned、bigint或bigint unsigned之间变化,这取决于确切的数据类型组合。

trans-unit.source: If either of the previously mentioned system variables is set to ON, then OPTIMIZE TABLE will optimize some data without rebuilding the table. However, the file size will not be reduced.
trans-unit.target: 如果前面提到的系统变量中的任何一个设置为 ON ，那么 OPTIMIZE TABLE 都会优化某些数据，而无需重建表。但是，文件大小不会减小。

trans-unit.source: If either the expression or the pattern is NULL, the result is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式或模式为 NULL ，则结果为 NULL 。

trans-unit.source: If errors like this occur, then critical system tables are either missing or are in the wrong location. The above error is quite common after an upgrade if the option files set the basedir or datadir to a non-standard location, but the new server is using the default location. Therefore, make sure that the basedir and datadir variables are correctly set.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生此类错误，则关键系统表可能丢失或放置在错误的位置。如果选项文件将 basedir 或 datadir 设置为非标准位置，则在升级后会出现上述错误，但是新服务器使用的是默认位置。因此，请确保正确设置了 basedir 和 datadir 变量。

trans-unit.source: If expr is greater than or equal to min and expr is less than or equal to max, BETWEEN returns 1, otherwise it returns 0. This is equivalent to the expression (min <= expr AND expr <= max) if all the arguments are of the same type. Otherwise type conversion takes place according to the rules described at Type Conversion, but applied to all the three arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果expr大于或等于min并且expr小于或等于max，则BETWEEN返回1，否则返回0。如果所有参数均为相同类型的。否则，类型转换将根据“ 类型转换”中描述的规则进行，但将应用于所有三个参数。

trans-unit.source: If expr1 is TRUE, returns expr2; otherwise it returns expr3.
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr1 为 TRUE,则返回 expr2;否则返回 expr3。

trans-unit.source: If expr1 is TRUE, returns expr2; otherwise returns expr3
trans-unit.target: 如果 expr1 为 TRUE,则返回 expr2;否则返回 expr3。

trans-unit.source: If format is given, the result is formatted according to the format string, which is used the same way as listed in the entry for the DATE_FORMAT() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了format，则将根据格式字符串对结果进行格式化，该格式字符串的使用方式与DATE_FORMAT（）函数的条目中列出的方式相同。

trans-unit.source: If group_concat_max_len <= 512, the return type is VARBINARY or VARCHAR; otherwise, the return type is BLOB or TEXT. The choice between binary or non-binary types depends from the input.
trans-unit.target: 如果group_concat_max_len <= 512，则返回类型为VARBINARY或VARCHAR；否则，返回类型为BLOB或TEXT。二进制或非二进制类型之间的选择取决于输入。

trans-unit.source: If hard commit and aria_group_commit_interval > 0
trans-unit.target: 如果硬提交且aria_group_commit_interval> 0

trans-unit.source: If hard commit and aria_group_commit_interval=0
trans-unit.target: 如果硬提交且 aria_group_commit_interval=0。

trans-unit.source: If hard group commit is enabled (aria_group_commit="hard")
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了硬组提交 (aria_group_commit="hard")

trans-unit.source: If innodb_buffer_pool_size is set to more than 1GB, innodb_buffer_pool_instances divides the InnoDB buffer pool into a specific number of instances. The default was 1 in MariaDB 5.5, but for large systems with buffer pools of many gigabytes, many instances can help reduce contention concurrency. The default is 8 in MariaDB 10.0, with the exception of 32-bit Windows, where it depends on the value of innodb_buffer_pool_size. Each instance manages its own data structures and takes an equal portion of the total buffer pool size, so for example if innodb_buffer_pool_size is 4GB and innodb_buffer_pool_instances is set to 4, each instance will be 1GB. Each instance should ideally be at least 1GB in size.
trans-unit.target: 如果将innodb_buffer_pool_size设置为大于1GB，innodb_buffer_pool_instances会将InnoDB缓冲池划分为特定数量的实例。在MariaDB 5.5中，默认值为1 ，但是对于具有多个千兆字节缓冲池的大型系统，许多实例可以帮助减少争用并发。在MariaDB 10.0中，默认值为8，但32位Windows除外，它取决于innodb_buffer_pool_size的值。每个实例管理自己的数据结构，并占用总缓冲池大小的相等部分，因此，例如，如果innodb_buffer_pool_size为4GB且innodb_buffer_pool_instances设置为4，则每个实例将为1GB。理想情况下，每个实例的大小至少应为1GB。

trans-unit.source: If installing a single combined functionality server with no plans to add additional servers, Single Node should be chosen.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装的是单台组合功能服务器,没有增加服务器的计划,应选择Single Node。

trans-unit.source: If installing a single combined functionality server with no plans to add additional servers, Single Node should be chosen. Going from single server to multi-server configuration to another will require a re-installation of the MariaDB ColumnStore software.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装的是单一的组合功能服务器,没有计划增加额外的服务器,应该选择Single Node。从单服务器到多服务器配置,需要重新安装MariaDB ColumnStore软件。

trans-unit.source: If installing on a system where there is a need to multi servers initially planned in the future, you would be a multi server install instead of a single server install.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装在一个系统上,最初计划将来需要多服务器,你将是一个多服务器安装而不是单服务器安装。

trans-unit.source: If it doesn't already exist, you can use the sample configuration file, sphinx.conf.dist. There is also sample data supplied that we can use for testing. Load the sample data (which creates two tables, documents and tags in the test database), for example:
trans-unit.target: 如果尚不存在，则可以使用示例配置文件 sphinx.conf.dist 。还提供了可用于测试的样本数据。加载示例数据（在 test 数据库中创建两个表， documents 和 tags ），例如：

trans-unit.source: If it has been correctly installed, SHOW ENGINES will list the Sequence storage engine as supported:
trans-unit.target: 如果已正确安装，则SHOW ENGINES将列出受支持的Sequence存储引擎：

trans-unit.source: If it is DISABLED, then the server was compiled with TLS support, but TLS is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 DISABLED ，则服务器使用TLS支持进行编译，但未启用TLS。

trans-unit.source: If it is NO, then the server was not compiled with TLS support.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 NO ，则服务器未使用TLS支持进行编译。

trans-unit.source: If it is YES, then the server was compiled with TLS support, and TLS is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 YES ，则服务器使用TLS支持进行编译，并且启用TLS。

trans-unit.source: If it is InnoDB, the query should be rolled back. (Exceptions??)
trans-unit.target: 如果是InnoDB,应该回滚查询。(例外吗?)。

trans-unit.source: If it is a crawler ('spider') that read all the pages, then it actually touched about 125,000,000 items to read all 5,000 pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果是爬虫('蜘蛛')读完所有的页面,那么它实际接触了大约125,000,000个项目,才能读完5000页。

trans-unit.source: If it is a relative path, then the general_log_file is relative to the datadir directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是相对路径，则 general_log_file 是相对于 datadir 目录的。

trans-unit.source: If it is a relative path, then the log_error is relative to the datadir directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是相对路径，则 log_error 相对于 datadir 目录。

trans-unit.source: If it is a relative path, then the slow_query_log_file is relative to the datadir directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是相对路径，则 slow_query_log_file 相对于 datadir 目录。

trans-unit.source: If it is prefixed with FILE:, then it can be a path to a file that contains the plain-text encryption password.
trans-unit.target: 如果以 FILE: 为前缀，则它可以是包含纯文本加密密码的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: If it is undesirable that changes to the binlog on the slave affects the GTID replication position, then master_use_gtid=slave_pos should be used. Then the slave will always connect to the master at the position of the last replicated GTID. This may avoid some surprises for users that expect behaviour consistent with traditional replication, where the replication position is never changed by local changes done on a server.
trans-unit.target: 如果不希望更改从属服务器上的binlog会影响GTID复制位置，则应使用 master_use_gtid=slave_pos 。然后，从站将始终在最后复制的GTID位置连接到主站。对于期望与传统复制保持一致行为的用户而言，这可以避免一些意外，因为复制位置永远不会因服务器上进行的本地更改而改变。

trans-unit.source: If it's UNDEFINED (or the ALGORITHM clause is not used), MariaDB will choose what it thinks is the best algorithm. An algorithm can also be UNDEFINED if its defined as MERGE, but the view requires a temporary table.
trans-unit.target: 如果是UNDEFINED(或者没有使用ALGORITHM子句),MariaDB会选择它认为最好的算法。如果算法定义为MERGE,也可以是UNDEFINED,但视图需要一个临时表。

trans-unit.source: If it's set to 0, then heartbeats are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果将其设置为 0 ，则禁用心跳。

trans-unit.source: If its a multi-server system and ssh-keys are not configured between the servers, you will be required to provide the user password for the other servers. If ssh-keys are configured, then password parameter isn't required
trans-unit.target: 如果它是一个多服务器系统,并且服务器之间没有配置ssh-keys,你将需要为其他服务器提供用户密码。如果配置了ssh-keys,则不需要密码参数。

trans-unit.source: If its failing in the remote server install section, go via the install logs in /tmp to see why the failure occurred. It could be related to these issues:
trans-unit.target: 如果其在远程服务器安装部分失败,请通过/tmp中的安装日志去查看失败的原因。可能与这些问题有关。

trans-unit.source: If left out, the DEFINER is treated as the account that created the stored routine or view. If the account creating the routine has the SUPER privilege, another account can be specified as the DEFINER.
trans-unit.target: 如果忽略，则将 DEFINER 视为创建存储的例程或视图的帐户。如果创建例程的帐户具有 SUPER 特权，则可以将另一个帐户指定为 DEFINER 。

trans-unit.source: If less than rate microseconds has passed since the last sync, then after buffers have been sent to disk, wait until rate microseconds has passed since last sync, do sync and return. This ensures that if we call sync infrequently we don't do any waits.
trans-unit.target: 如果距离上次同步的时间小于速率微秒,那么在缓冲区被发送到磁盘后,等待到距离上次同步的速率微秒,做同步并返回。这样可以保证如果我们不经常调用同步,就不会做任何等待。

trans-unit.source: If lock-ddl-per-table is not done, then Mariabackup would have to know all tables that were created or altered during the backup. See MDEV-16791.
trans-unit.target: 如果未完成lock-ddl-per-table，则Mariabackup将必须知道在备份期间创建或更改的所有表。参见MDEV-16791。

trans-unit.source: If log tables exists:
trans-unit.target: 如果存在日志表。

trans-unit.source: If more than one of the Key values applies to a given column of a table, Key displays the one with the highest priority, in the order PRI, UNI, MUL.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个键值应用于表的给定列，则键会以PRI，UNI，MUL的顺序显示优先级最高的键。

trans-unit.source: If more than one unique index is matched, only the first is updated. It is not recommended to use this statement on tables with more than one unique index.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个唯一索引被匹配,则只更新第一个索引。不建议在有多个唯一索引的表上使用此语句。

trans-unit.source: If multi-source replication is used, this statement applies to the default connection. It could be necessary to change the value of the default_master_connection server system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用多源复制，则此语句适用于默认连接。可能需要更改 default_master_connection 服务器系统变量的值。

trans-unit.source: If multiple GTIDs are specified, then they must be with distinct replication domain ID, for example:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了多个GTID,那么它们必须具有不同的复制域ID,例如。

trans-unit.source: If multiple MariaDB Server process are running on the same server, then at minimum, you will need to ensure that the different instances do not use the same datadir, port, and socket. The following example shows these options set in an option file:
trans-unit.target: 如果多个MariaDB Server进程在同一服务器上运行，则至少需要确保不同的实例不使用相同的 datadir ， port 和 socket 。以下示例显示了在选项文件中设置的这些选项：

trans-unit.source: If my.cnf says type=ON and you later turn it OFF, it is not fully OFF. Ref: https://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=60696
trans-unit.target: 如果my.cnf说的是type = ON，然后又将其关闭，则它不是完全关闭。参考：https : //bugs.mysql.com/bug.php? id =60696

trans-unit.source: If mysql-test-run.pl is started with the --ssl option, it sets up a secure connection for all test cases. In this case, if mysqld does not support TLS, mysql-test-run.pl exits with an error message: Couldn´t find support for SSL.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 --ssl 选项启动mysql-test-run.pl ，它将为所有测试用例建立安全连接。在这种情况下，如果mysqld不支持TLS，则mysql-test-run.pl退出并显示错误消息： Couldn´t find support for SSL 。

trans-unit.source: If mysqld_safe cannot find the server, use this option to indicate the path name to the directory where the server is located.
trans-unit.target: 如果mysqld_safe找不到服务器,用这个选项来表示服务器所在目录的路径名。

trans-unit.source: If mysqldump was utilized then the backup script is run:
trans-unit.target: 如果利用了mysqldump,那么就会运行备份脚本。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, you can remove found MySQL packages before installing MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果有必要,可以在安装MariaDB之前,将发现的MySQL包删除。

trans-unit.source: If neither QUICK nor EXTENDED is specified, MariaDB returns a live checksum if the table storage engine supports it and scans the table otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 QUICK 或 EXTENDED ，则MariaDB将返回实时校验和（如果表存储引擎支持它），否则将扫描该表。

trans-unit.source: If neither character set nor collation is provided, the database default will be used. If only the character set is provided, the default collation for that character set will be used . If only the collation is provided, the associated character set will be used. See Supported Character Sets and Collations.
trans-unit.target: 如果既未提供字符集也未提供排序规则，则将使用数据库默认值。如果仅提供字符集，则将使用该字符集的默认排序规则。如果仅提供排序规则，则将使用关联的字符集。请参阅支持的字符集和排序规则。

trans-unit.source: If neither collation nor character set is provided, the table default is used. If only the character set is specified, that character set's default collation is used, while if only the collation is specified, the associated character set is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果既没有提供校对也没有提供字符集,则使用表的默认值。如果只指定了字符集,则使用该字符集的默认校对,如果只指定了校对,则使用相关的字符集。

trans-unit.source: If neither of the above is true, you have to do this step manually:
trans-unit.target: 如果以上两种情况都不存在,你就必须手动完成这一步。

trans-unit.source: If neither variable is set, the built-in list is used, which can be viewed by querying the INNODB_FT_DEFAULT_STOPWORD table in the Information Schema.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有变量被设置，内置列表时，可以通过查询来查看INNODB_FT_DEFAULT_STOPWORD表中的信息模式。

trans-unit.source: If no key_str argument is given, DES_DECRYPT() examines the first byte of the encrypted string to determine the DES key number that was used to encrypt the original string, and then reads the key from the DES key file to decrypt the message. For this to work, the user must have the SUPER privilege. The key file can be specified with the --des-key-file server option.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出 key_str 参数，则 DES_DECRYPT() 检查加密字符串的第一个字节，以确定用于加密原始字符串的DES密钥号，然后从DES密钥文件中读取密钥以解密消息。为此，用户必须具有SUPER特权。可以使用 --des-key-file 服务器选项指定密钥文件。

trans-unit.source: If no special_characters parameter is provided, by default +-<>*()": are escaped.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供 special_characters 参数，则默认情况下 +-<>*()": 被转义。

trans-unit.source: If no collation is provided, the collation will be set to the default collation for that character set. See Supported Character Sets and Collations.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供排序规则，则该排序规则将设置为该字符集的默认排序规则。请参阅支持的字符集和排序规则。

trans-unit.source: If no database is given then all matching databases are shown. If no table is given, then all matching tables in database are shown. If no column is given, then all matching columns and column types in table are shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有给定数据库,那么将显示所有匹配的数据库。如果没有给定表,那么将显示数据库中所有匹配的表。如果没有给列,那么将显示表中所有匹配的列和列类型。

trans-unit.source: If no more rows are available, a No Data condition occurs with SQLSTATE value 02000. To detect this condition, you can set up a handler for it (or for a NOT FOUND condition).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有更多行可用，则会发生 SQLSTATE 值为 02000 的No Data条件。要检测这种情况，您可以为此设置一个处理程序（或为 NOT FOUND 条件）。

trans-unit.source: If no option is provided, myisamchk will perform a check table. It is possible to check MyISAM tables without shutting down or restricting access to the server by using CHECK TABLE instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供任何选项，myisamchk将执行检查表。通过使用CHECK TABLE可以检查MyISAM表而无需关闭或限制对服务器的访问。

trans-unit.source: If no rows were successfully inserted, LAST_INSERT_ID() returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有成功插入记录,LAST_INSERT_ID()返回0。

trans-unit.source: If no schema is indicated as part of event_name, the default (current) schema is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在event_name中没有指定模式,则假定为默认(当前)模式。

trans-unit.source: If no service name is specified, then the plugin will use mysql as the default PAM service name.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定服务名称，则插件将使用 mysql 作为默认PAM服务名称。

trans-unit.source: If no when_value or search_condition matches the value tested and the CASE statement contains no ELSE clause, a Case not found for CASE statement error results.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有when_value或search_condition与测试的值匹配并且 CASE 语句不包含 ELSE 子句，则 CASE 语句错误结果找不到Case 。

trans-unit.source: If non-zero, how long queries can run before being killed automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果为非零,则表示查询在被自动杀死之前可以运行多长时间。

trans-unit.source: If none of these options is provided, then the default is --skip-syslog.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供这些选项，则默认值为 --skip-syslog 。

trans-unit.source: If not closed explicitly, a cursor is closed at the end of the compound statement in which it was declared.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有明确地关闭游标,那么游标就会在声明它的复合语句结束时被关闭。

trans-unit.source: If not enough, repeat, doubling the width of the square.
trans-unit.target: 如果不够,重复,将正方形的宽度增加一倍。

trans-unit.source: If not set, division by zero returns NULL. If set returns an error if one tries to update a column with 1/0 and returns a warning as well. Also see MDEV-8319. Default since MariaDB 10.2.4.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则除以零将返回NULL。如果设置为1/0来更新一列，并且如果返回警告，则如果置位则返回错误。另请参阅MDEV-8319。自MariaDB 10.2.4起默认。

trans-unit.source: If not set, if the available storage engine specified by a CREATE TABLE is not available, a warning is given and the default storage engine is used instead. If set, generate a 1286 error when creating a table if the specified storage engine is not available. See also enforce_storage_engine. Default since MariaDB 10.1.7.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，则如果CREATE TABLE指定的可用存储引擎不可用，则会发出警告，并使用默认存储引擎。如果设置了该选项，则在指定的存储引擎不可用时，在创建表时会产生1286错误。另请参见force_storage_engine。自MariaDB 10.1.7起默认。

trans-unit.source: If omitted, the default is ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略,则默认为 UNBOUNDED PRECEDING 和 CURRENT ROWS 之间的行数。

trans-unit.source: If one argument is decimal and the other argument is a floating point, they are compared as floating point values.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个参数是十进制,另一个参数是浮点,则将它们作为浮点值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If one argument is decimal and the other argument is decimal or integer, they are compared as decimals.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个参数是小数,而另一个参数是小数或整数,则将它们作为小数进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If one doesn't use any connection name prefix for a replicate.. variable, then the value will be used as the default value for all connections that don't have a value set for this variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个 replicate.. 变量不使用任何连接名前缀，则该值将用作所有未为此变量设置值的连接的默认值。

trans-unit.source: If one gives an argument to LAST_INSERT_ID(), then it will return the value of the expression and the next call to LAST_INSERT_ID() will return the same value. The value will also be sent to the client and can be accessed by the mysql_insert_id function.
trans-unit.target: 如果给LAST_INSERT_ID（）提供了一个参数，则它将返回表达式的值，而对LAST_INSERT_ID（）的下一次调用将返回相同的值。该值还将发送到客户端，并可以通过mysql_insert_id函数进行访问。

trans-unit.source: If one master connection or replication domain is currently processing a long-running query, it is possible that it will allocate all the worker threads in the pool, only to have them wait for the long-running query to complete, stalling any other master connection or replication domain, which will have to wait for a worker thread to become free.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个主连接或复制域当前正在处理一个长期运行的查询,它有可能会分配池中所有的工作线程,只是让它们等待长期运行的查询完成,使任何其他主连接或复制域停滞,而其他主连接或复制域将不得不等待一个工作线程变得空闲。

trans-unit.source: If one master fails, replication stops.
trans-unit.target: 如果一个主站失败,复制就会停止。

trans-unit.source: If one of the specified tables cannot be locked, none of the tables will be locked.
trans-unit.target: 如果其中一个指定的表不能被锁定,则所有的表都不会被锁定。

trans-unit.target: 如果在MySQL 5.1-5.6或MariaDB 5.1 -5.2中为上述查询运行 EXPLAIN ，他们将获得以下计划：

trans-unit.source: If one runs the same query in MariaDB 5.3, they will get this plan:
trans-unit.target: 如果在MariaDB 5.3中运行相同的查询，他们将获得此计划：

trans-unit.source: If one runs this query in MariaDB/MySQL 5.6, they get this:
trans-unit.target: 如果在MariaDB/MySQL 5.6中运行这个查询,会得到这样的结果。

trans-unit.source: If one tries to insert into a sequence table, the single row will be updated. This allows mysqldump to work but also gives the additional benefit that one can change all properties of a sequence with a single insert. New applications should of course also use ALTER SEQUENCE.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试插入序列表，则将更新单行。这使mysqldump可以工作，但还带来了额外的好处，即可以通过一次插入更改序列的所有属性。新的应用程序当然也应该使用 ALTER SEQUENCE 。

trans-unit.source: If one updates the SEQUENCE with SETVAL() or ALTER SEQUENCE ... RESTART, NEXT VALUE FOR will notice this and start from the next requested value.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用SETVAL（）或ALTER SEQUENCE ... RESTART更新 SEQUENCE ，则 NEXT VALUE FOR 将注意到这一点，并从下一个请求的值开始。

trans-unit.source: If one uses statement-based replication, they can just create the required triggers on the slave. The slave will run the statements from the binary log, which will cause the triggers to be invoked.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用基于语句的复制,他们可以只在从机上创建所需的触发器。从机将运行二进制日志中的语句,这将导致触发器被调用。

trans-unit.source: If one wants to distribute a table to a user that doesn't need write access to the table and one wants to minimize the storage size of the table, the recommended engine to use is Aria or MyISAM as one can pack the table with aria_pack or myisampack respectively to make it notablly smaller. MyISAM is the most portable format as it's not dependent on whether the server settings are different. Aria and InnoDB require the same block size on both servers.
trans-unit.target: 如果有人希望将表分发给不需要对该表具有写访问权的用户，并且希望将表的存储空间最小化，则推荐使用的引擎是Aria或MyISAM，因为可以使用aria_pack或myisampack分别使其明显变小。MyISAM是最可移植的格式，因为它不依赖于服务器设置是否不同。Aria和InnoDB在两台服务器上需要相同的块大小。

trans-unit.source: If one wants to use Sequences in a master-master setup or with Galera one should use INCREMENT=0. This will tell the Sequence to use auto_increment_increment and auto_increment_offset to generate unique values for each server.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在主从设置中或在Galera中使用序列，则应使用 INCREMENT=0 。这将告诉序列使用auto_increment_increment和auto_increment_offset为每个服务器生成唯一值。

trans-unit.source: If only using MyISAM, set key_buffer_size to 20% of available RAM. (Plus innodb_buffer_pool_size=0)
trans-unit.target: 如果仅使用MyISAM，请将key_buffer_size设置为可用 RAM的20％。（加上innodb_buffer_pool_size = 0）

trans-unit.source: If only using InnoDB, set innodb_buffer_pool_size to 70% of available RAM. (Plus key_buffer_size = 10M, small, but not zero.)
trans-unit.target: 如果仅使用InnoDB，请将innodb_buffer_pool_size设置为可用 RAM的70％。（加上key_buffer_size = 10M，很小，但不为零。）

trans-unit.source: If our system does not have logrotate 3.8.9 or later, which is needed to support the createolddir directive, then we will also need to create the relevant directory specified by the olddir directive:
trans-unit.target: 如果我们的系统没有支持 createolddir 指令所需的 logrotate 3.8.9或更高版本，则我们还需要创建由 olddir 指令指定的相关目录：

trans-unit.source: If parentheses are used, any number of spaces, tab characters and new line characters is allowed between the procedure's name and the open parenthesis.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了括号,那么在存储过程的名称和打开的括号之间允许使用任意数量的空格、制表符和新行字符。

trans-unit.source: If partition is listed as DISABLED:
trans-unit.target: 如果分区被列为DISABLED。

trans-unit.source: If password validation fails, then the original CrackLib error message can be viewed by executing SHOW WARNINGS.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码验证失败，则可以通过执行 SHOW WARNINGS 查看原始的CrackLib错误消息。

trans-unit.source: If performing the MariaDB ColumnStore Multi-node Distributed Installation, the binary package only needs to be installed on Performance Module #1 (pm1). If performing Non-Distributed installs, the binary package is required to install the MariaDB ColumnStore on all the nodes in the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行MariaDB ColumnStore多节点分布式安装,二进制包只需要安装在性能模块#1(pm1)上。如果执行非分布式安装,则需要在系统中的所有节点上安装MariaDB ColumnStore的二进制包。

trans-unit.source: If performing the MariaDB ColumnStore Multi-node Distributed Installation, the post-install only needs to be run on Performance Module #1 (pm1). If performing Non-Distributed installs, the post-install needs to be run the MariaDB ColumnStore on all the nodes in the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行MariaDB ColumnStore多节点分布式安装,安装后只需要在性能模块#1(pm1)上运行MariaDB ColumnStore。如果执行非分布式安装,安装后需要在系统中的所有节点上运行MariaDB ColumnStore。

trans-unit.source: If performing the MariaDB ColumnStore Multi-node Non-Distributed installs, the 'columnstore' service needs to be started on all the nodes in the system except Performance Module #1 (pm1). postConfigure is run from pm1, which is documented in the next section
trans-unit.target: 如果执行MariaDB ColumnStore多节点非分布式安装,则需要在系统中除Performance Module #1 (pm1)以外的所有节点上启动 "columnstore "服务,postConfigure从pm1运行,这将在下一节中进行说明。

trans-unit.source: If performing the distributed-mode installation across multiple node, the binary package only needs to be installed on Performance Module #1 (pm1). If performing a non-distributed installation, the binary package is required to install the MariaDB ColumnStore on all the nodes in the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果在多个节点上执行分布式安装,二进制包只需要安装在Performance Module #1(pm1)上。如果执行非分布式安装,二进制包需要在系统中的所有节点上安装MariaDB ColumnStore。

trans-unit.source: If performing the distributed-mode installation, post-install only needs to be run on Performance Module #1 (pm1). If performing non-distributed installations, post-install needs to be run on all the nodes in the system.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行分布式安装,则只需要在性能模块#1 (pm1)上运行post-install。如果执行非分布式安装,安装后需要在系统中的所有节点上运行。

trans-unit.source: If performing the non-distributed installation mode, the 'columnstore' service needs to be started on all nodes in the system except Performance Module #1 (pm1). postConfigure is on pm1, which is documented in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行非分布式安装模式,则需要在系统中除Performance Module #1(pm1)以外的所有节点上启动'columnstore'服务。"postConfigure "在pm1上,这一点将在下一节中进行说明。

trans-unit.source: If purge operations are lagging on a busy server, then this can be a tough situation to recover from. As a solution, InnoDB allows you to set the max purge lag. The max purge lag is defined as the maximum number of InnoDB undo log that can be waiting to be purged from the history until InnoDB begins delaying DML statements.
trans-unit.target: 如果清除操作在繁忙的服务器上滞后，则可能很难恢复。作为解决方案，InnoDB允许您设置最大清除滞后时间。最大清除滞后时间定义为在InnoDB开始延迟DML语句之前可以等待从历史记录中清除的InnoDB撤消日志的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: If query processing was interrupted during filesort, an error is returned in addition to the warning.
trans-unit.target: 如果在filesort过程中中断了查询处理,除了警告之外,还会返回一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If read statements have a higher priority, the priority of an INSERT can be changed via the HIGH_PRIORITY attribute. However, the priority of other write statements cannot be raised individually.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取的语句具有更高的优先级，则可以通过 HIGH_PRIORITY 属性更改 INSERT 的优先级。但是，不能单独提高其他写语句的优先级。

trans-unit.source: If reference to a view causes execution of a stored function, privilege checking for statements executed within the function depend on whether the function is defined with a SQL SECURITY characteristic of DEFINER or INVOKER. If the security characteristic is DEFINER, the function runs with the privileges of its creator. If the characteristic is INVOKER, the function runs with the privileges determined by the view's SQL SECURITY characteristic.
trans-unit.target: 如果对视图的引用导致存储函数的执行,那么在函数中执行的语句的权限检查取决于函数的定义是否具有DEFINER或INVOKER的SQL SECURITY特性。如果安全特性是DEFINER,则函数以其创建者的权限运行。如果特性是INVOKER,则函数以视图的SQL SECURITY特性决定的权限运行。

trans-unit.source: If replication is currently running, reset the master so you can update its configuration:
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在运行复制,请重置主站,以便更新其配置。

trans-unit.source: If replication is working correctly, both the values of Slave_IO_Running and Slave_SQL_Running should be Yes:
trans-unit.target: 如果复制工作正常，则 Slave_IO_Running 和 Slave_SQL_Running 的值都应为 Yes ：

trans-unit.source: If row-based logging is used for a statement, and the session executing the statement has any temporary tables, row-based logging is used for the remaining statements until the temporary table is dropped. This is because temporary tables can't use row-based logging, so if it is used due to one of the above conditions, all subsequent statements using that table are unsafe. The server deals with this situation by treating all statements in the session as unsafe for statement-based logging until the temporary table is dropped.
trans-unit.target: 如果某条语句使用了基于行的日志记录,而执行该语句的会话中有任何临时表,则其余语句将使用基于行的日志记录,直到临时表被删除。这是因为临时表不能使用基于行的日志记录,所以如果由于上述情况之一而使用了它,那么所有使用该表的后续语句都是不安全的。服务器处理这种情况的方法是将会话中的所有语句都视为不安全的基于语句的日志记录,直到临时表被删除。

trans-unit.source: If running on an alternative system, or the commands are available, the following packages are required. You will need to check the repositories for the correct package names on your distribution - these may differ between distributions, or require additional packages:
trans-unit.target: 如果在其他系统上运行,或者命令可用,则需要以下软件包。你需要在你的发行版上检查软件库中正确的软件包名称--不同的发行版可能会有所不同,或者需要额外的软件包。

trans-unit.source: If semisynchronous replication is enabled on a server when slave threads were already running, the slave I/O thread will need to be restarted to enable the slave to register as a semisynchronous slave when it connects to the master. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果在从属线程已在运行的情况下在服务器上启用了半同步复制，则将需要重新启动从属I / O线程，以使从属服务器在连接到主服务器时能够注册为半同步从属服务器。例如：

trans-unit.source: If set don't generate an AUTO_INCREMENT on INSERT of zero in an AUTO_INCREMENT column. Normally both zero and NULL generate new AUTO_INCREMENT values.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置不产生 AUTO_INCREMENT 的 INSERT 在零 AUTO_INCREMENT 列。通常， zero 和 NULL 都会生成新的 AUTO_INCREMENT 值。

trans-unit.source: If set to 1 (0 is default), MariaDB reverts to using the mysql_old_password authentication plugin by default for newly created users and passwords, instead of the mysql_native_password authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 1 （默认 0 ），则对于新创建的用户和密码，MariaDB默认恢复使用 mysql_old_password 认证插件，而不是 mysql_native_password 认证插件。

trans-unit.source: If set to normal, it creates a root@localhost account that authenticates with the mysql_native_password authentication plugin and that has no initial password set, which can be insecure. If set to socket, it creates a root@localhost account that authenticates with the unix_socket authentication plugin. Set to normal by default. Available since MariaDB 10.1.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 normal ，它将创建一个 root@localhost 帐户，该帐户使用 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件进行身份验证，并且未设置初始密码，该密码可能是不安全的。如果设置为 socket ，它将创建一个 root@localhost 帐户，该帐户使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件进行身份验证。默认设置为 normal 。自MariaDB 10.1起可用。

trans-unit.source: If set to normal, it creates a root@localhost account that authenticates with the mysql_native_password authentication plugin and that has no initial password set, which can be insecure. If set to socket, it creates a root@localhost account that authenticates with the unix_socket authentication plugin. Set to socket by default from MariaDB 10.4 (see Authentication from MariaDB 10.4), or normal by default in earlier versions. Available since MariaDB 10.1.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 normal ，它将创建一个 root@localhost 帐户，该帐户使用 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件进行身份验证，并且未设置初始密码，该密码可能是不安全的。如果设置为 socket ，它将创建一个 root@localhost 帐户，该帐户使用 unix_socket 身份验证插件进行身份验证。默认情况下，从MariaDB 10.4（请参阅MariaDB 10.4的身份验证）设置为 socket ，或者在早期版本中默认为 normal 。自MariaDB 10.1起可用。

trans-unit.source: If set to salvage, read access is permitted, but corrupted pages are ignored. innodb_file_per_table must be enabled for this option. Previously named innodb_pass_corrupt_table.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 salvage ，则允许读取访问，但损坏的页面将被忽略。必须为此选项启用innodb_file_per_table。以前名为 innodb_pass_corrupt_table 。

trans-unit.source: If so, then logging is now working...
trans-unit.target: 如果是这样的话,那么现在记录工作......

trans-unit.source: If soft group commit is enabled (aria_group_commit="soft")
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了软组提交 (aria_group_commit="soft")

trans-unit.source: If some of the "Handler" numbers look like the number of rows in the table, then there was a table scan.
trans-unit.target: 如果一些 "处理者 "的数字看起来像表中的行数,那么就有一个表扫描。

trans-unit.source: If some of the tables are using an index for which we have changed sort order.
trans-unit.target: 如果有些表使用的是我们改变了排序顺序的索引。

trans-unit.source: If spanning a pole or the dateline, a more complex SELECT is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果跨越极点或数据线,则使用更复杂的SELECT。

trans-unit.source: If specified, the third integer argument set the depth to search in the document. This means the maximum items in the paths (until MariaDB 10.2.7, the number of ‘:’ separator characters in them plus one). This value defaults to 10 but can be increased for complex documents or reduced to set the maximum wanted depth of the returned paths.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定，则第三个整数参数设置要在文档中搜索的深度。这意味着路径中的最大项（直到MariaDB 10.2.7为止，路径中的'：'分隔符字符数加1）。该值默认为10，但是对于复杂的文档可以增加或减小以设置返回路径的最大所需深度。

trans-unit.source: If strict SQL mode is not enabled, a VARCHAR column longer than 65535 become TEXT, and a VARBINARY columns longer than 65535 becomes a BLOB. If strict mode is enabled the silent changes will not be made, and an error will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果未启用严格的SQL模式，则长度大于65535 的VARCHAR列将成为TEXT，而长度大于65535 的VARBINARY列将成为BLOB。如果启用了严格模式，则不会进行静默更改，并且会发生错误。

trans-unit.source: If symbolic links are disabled with the --symbolic-links option and the skipoption prefix (i.e. --skip-symbolic-links), then the value will be DISABLED.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 --symbolic-links 选项和 skip 选项前缀（即--skip-symbolic-links） DISABLED 符号链接，则该值将为DISABLED。

trans-unit.source: If symbolic links are not supported, then the value will be NO.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支持符号链接，则该值为 NO 。

trans-unit.source: If symbolic links are supported, then the value will be YES.
trans-unit.target: 如果符号链接的支持，则该值将是 YES 。

trans-unit.source: If table is locked, wait instead of returning an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果表被锁定,则等待而不是返回一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If that SELECT returns no rows, then you still need to install the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SELECT 不返回任何行，那么您仍然需要安装插件。

trans-unit.source: If that does not work, then you can work around this problem by giving the user that runs mysqld access to /etc/shadow. For example, if the mysql user runs mysqld, then you could do the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果这不起作用，则可以通过为运行 mysqld 的用户提供对 /etc/shadow 的访问权限来解决此问题。例如，如果 mysql 用户运行 mysqld ，则可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: If that leads to swapping, cut both settings back. Suggest cutting them down proportionately.
trans-unit.target: 如果导致交换,就把这两个设置都减下来。建议按比例削减。

trans-unit.source: If that solved the problem, then it means that the current SELinux policy is the culprit. You need to adjust the SELinux policy or labels for MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样就解决了问题,那么说明当前的SELinux策略是罪魁祸首。你需要调整SELinux策略或MariaDB的标签。

trans-unit.source: If the binary log is enabled on a server, then the server will use the binary log-based transaction coordinator log. Otherwise, it will use the memory-mapped file-based transaction coordinator log.
trans-unit.target: 如果在服务器上启用了二进制日志，则服务器将使用基于二进制日志的事务协调器日志。否则，它将使用基于内存映射的基于文件的事务协调器日志。

trans-unit.source: If the binary log is used, CREATE TABLE ... SELECT and INSERT ... SELECT statements cannot use concurrent inserts. These statements acquire a read lock on the table, so concurrent inserts will need to wait. This way the log can be safely used to restore data.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用二进制日志，则 CREATE TABLE ... SELECT 和 INSERT ... SELECT 语句不能使用并发插入。这些语句在表上获得了读取锁，因此并发插入将需要等待。这样，可以安全地使用日志还原数据。

trans-unit.source: If the metadata_lock_info plugin is installed, locks acquired with this function are visible in the Information SchemaMETADATA_LOCK_INFO table.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了metadata_lock_info插件，则在Information Schema METADATA_LOCK_INFO表中可见使用此功能获取的锁。

trans-unit.source: If the metadata_lock_info plugin is installed, the Information Schemametadata_lock_info table stores information about existing metadata locks.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了metadata_lock_info插件，则信息架构 metadata_lock_info 表存储有关现有元数据锁的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the metadata_lock_info plugin is installed, the Information Schemametadata_lock_info table contains information about locks of this kind (as well as metadata locks).
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了metadata_lock_info插件，则信息架构metadata_lock_info表包含有关此类锁（以及元数据锁）的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the slave threads are currently running, you first need to stop them by executing the STOP SLAVE statement. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果从属线程当前正在运行，则首先需要通过执行 STOP SLAVE 语句来停止它们。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the expire_logs_days server system variable is not set to 0, the server automatically deletes binary log files after the given number of days.
trans-unit.target: 如果expire_logs_days服务器系统变量未设置为0，则服务器将在给定天数后自动删除二进制日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If the have_crypt system variable is set to NO (because the crypt() system call is not available), the ENCRYPT function will always return NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果have_crypt系统变量设置为 NO （因为crypt（）系统调用不可用），则ENCRYPT函数将始终返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If the max_join_size variable (also called sql_max_join_size) is set, then it will limit any SELECT statements that probably need to examine more than MAX_JOIN_SIZE rows.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了max_join_size变量（也称为 sql_max_join_size ），则它将限制可能需要检查超过 MAX_JOIN_SIZE 行的所有SELECT语句。

trans-unit.source: If the max_statement_time variable is set, any query (excluding stored procedures) taking longer than the value of max_statement_time (specified in seconds) to execute will be aborted. This can be set globally, by session, as well as per user and per query. See Aborting statements that take longer than a certain time to execute.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了max_statement_time变量，则执行时间超过 max_statement_time 值（以秒为单位）的任何查询（不包括存储过程）都将被中止。可以在全局，会话，每个用户和每个查询中进行设置。请参阅中止执行时间超过特定时间的语句。

trans-unit.source: If the query_cache_type system variable is set to 2 or DEMAND, and the current statement is cacheable, SQL_CACHE causes the query to be cached and SQL_NO_CACHE causes the query not to be cached. For UNIONs, SQL_CACHE or SQL_NO_CACHE should be specified for the first query. See also The Query Cache for more detail and a list of the types of statements that aren't cacheable.
trans-unit.target: 如果将query_cache_type系统变量设置为2或 DEMAND ，并且当前语句是可缓存的，则 SQL_CACHE 导致查询被缓存，而 SQL_NO_CACHE 导致查询不被缓存。对于 UNION ，应为第一个查询指定 SQL_CACHE 或 SQL_NO_CACHE 。另请参阅查询缓存以获取更多详细信息和不可缓存的语句类型列表。

trans-unit.source: If the sql_safe_updates variable is set, one can't execute an UPDATE or DELETE statement unless one specifies a key constraint in the WHERE clause or provide a LIMIT clause (or both).
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了sql_safe_updates变量，则除非执行 WHERE 子句中指定键约束或提供 LIMIT 子句（或同时提供两者），否则无法执行UPDATE或DELETE语句。

trans-unit.source: If the server_audit_output_type variable is set to syslog instead of the default, file, the audit log file format will be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果将server_audit_output_type变量设置为 syslog 而不是默认的 file ，则审核日志文件格式将如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If the slow query log is enabled and the log_queries_not_using_indexes server system variable is ON, the queries which do not use indexes are logged.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了慢查询日志，并且 log_queries_not_using_indexes 服务器系统变量为 ON ，则会记录不使用索引的查询。

trans-unit.source: If the Sphinx Storage Engine is installed, the following is also supported:
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了Sphinx存储引擎，则还支持以下内容：

trans-unit.source: If the SQL_MODE is set to MAXDB, TIMESTAMP fields will be silently converted to DATETIME.
trans-unit.target: 如果SQL_MODE设置为 MAXDB ，则TIMESTAMP字段将被静默转换为DATETIME。

trans-unit.source: If the strict mode is enabled, setting the query cache size to an invalid value will cause an error. Otherwise, it will be set to the nearest permitted value, and a warning will be triggered.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了严格模式，则将查询缓存大小设置为无效值将导致错误。否则，它将被设置为最接近的允许值，并且将触发警告。

trans-unit.source: If the system tables really do not exist, then you may need to create them with mysql_install_db. See Installing System Tables (mysql_install_db) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统表确实不存在，则可能需要使用 mysql_install_db 创建它们。有关更多信息，请参见安装系统表（mysql_install_db）。

trans-unit.source: If the innodb_ft_user_stopword_table system variable is set, that table is used as a stopword list.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了innodb_ft_user_stopword_table系统变量，则该表将用作停用词列表。

trans-unit.source: If the innodb_status_output_locks system variable is set to 1, extended lock information will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果将innodb_status_output_locks系统变量设置为 1 ，那么将显示扩展锁信息。

trans-unit.source: If the -- option is not given, replace reads standard input and writes to standard output.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 -- 选项，则replace会读取标准输入并写入标准输出。

trans-unit.source: If the --comments option and this option are given, mysqldump produces a comment at the end of the dump of the following form:
trans-unit.target: 如果给出了 --comments 选项和此选项，则 mysqldump 会在转储末尾以以下形式生成注释：

trans-unit.source: If the feedback_url system variable is not set to an empty string, then the plugin will automatically send a report to all URLs in the list a few minutes after the server starts up and then once a week after that.
trans-unit.target: 如果 feedback_url 系统变量未设置为空字符串，则该插件将在服务器启动后几分钟后自动发送报告到列表中的所有URL，然后每周一次。

trans-unit.source: If the feedback_url system variable is set to an empty string, then the plugin will not automatically send any data. This may be necessary if outbound HTTP communication from your database server is not permitted. In this case, you can still upload the data manually, if you'd like.
trans-unit.target: 如果 feedback_url 系统变量设置为空字符串，则该插件将不会自动发送任何数据。如果不允许来自数据库服务器的出站HTTP通信，则可能有必要。在这种情况下，您仍然可以根据需要手动上传数据。

trans-unit.source: If the LOCK clause is not explicitly set, then the operation uses LOCK=DEFAULT.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置 LOCK 子句，则该操作使用 LOCK=DEFAULT 。

trans-unit.source: If the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option is not set for a table that uses manually enabled encryption, then it will inherit the value from the innodb_default_encryption_key_id system variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果未为使用手动启用的加密的表设置 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项，则它将从 innodb_default_encryption_key_id 系统变量继承该值。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option is not specified, then the table will be encrypted with the key identified by the innodb_default_encryption_key_id system variable. For example, you might create a table using a statement like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项，则将使用由 innodb_default_encryption_key_id 系统变量标识的密钥对表进行加密。例如，您可以使用如下语句创建表：

trans-unit.source: If the ROW_FORMAT table option for this table is set to COMPRESSED, then this field contains the value of the compressed page size.
trans-unit.target: 如果此表的 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 COMPRESSED ，则此字段包含压缩页面大小的值。

trans-unit.source: If the LOW_PRIORITY keyword is used, insertions are delayed until no other clients are reading from the table. The CONCURRENT keyword allowes the use of concurrent inserts. These clauses cannot be specified together.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 LOW_PRIORITY 关键字，则插入将延迟，直到没有其他客户端从表中读取。在 CONCURRENT 关键字allowes使用并行插入。这些子句不能一起指定。

trans-unit.source: If the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE table option is not set to some value, but the ROW_FORMAT table option is set to COMPRESSED in a CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statement, then InnoDB uses a default value of 8 for the KEY_BLOCK_SIZE table option. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 表选项未设置为某个值，但 ROW_FORMAT 表选项设置为 COMPRESSED 在 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句，那么InnoDB使用的默认值 8 的 KEY_BLOCK_SIZE 表选项。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the --compress option was provided, then this value will be compressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 --compress 选项，则此值将被 compressed 。

trans-unit.source: If the --extra-lsndir option is provided, then an extra copy of this file will be saved in that directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 --extra-lsndir 选项，则该文件的额外副本将保存在该目录中。

trans-unit.source: If the --galera-info option is provided, then this file contains information about a Galera Cluster node's state.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 --galera-info 选项，则此文件包含有关Galera Cluster节点状态的信息。

trans-unit.source: If the --slave-info option is provided, then this file contains the CHANGE MASTER command that can be used to set up a new server as a slave of the original server's master after the backup has been restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 --slave-info 选项，则此文件包含 CHANGE MASTER 命令，可用于在还原备份后将新服务器设置为原始服务器的主服务器的从服务器。

trans-unit.source: If the --stream option was not provided, then this value will be file.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供 --stream 选项，则此值为 file 。

trans-unit.source: If the --stream option was set to xbstream, then this value will be xbstream.
trans-unit.target: 如果 --stream 选项设置为 xbstream ，则该值为 xbstream 。

trans-unit.source: If the --plugin-load option is specified after the --plugin-load-add option, then it will also reset the changes made by that option. For example, in the following case, the --plugin-load-add option does not do anything, because the subsequent --plugin-load option resets the plugin load list:
trans-unit.target: 如果在 --plugin-load --plugin-load-add 选项之后指定了--plugin-load选项，则它还将重置该选项所做的更改。例如，在以下情况下，-- --plugin-load-add 选项不执行任何操作，因为随后的 --plugin-load 选项将重置插件加载列表：

trans-unit.source: If the --plugin-load option is specified multiple times, then only the last instance will have any effect. For example, in the following case, the first instance of the option is reset:
trans-unit.target: 如果多次指定 --plugin-load 选项，则仅最后一个实例有效。例如，在以下情况下，该选项的第一个实例被重置：

trans-unit.source: If the slave_net_timeout system variable is set to a value that is lower than the current heartbeat interval, then a warning will be issued.
trans-unit.target: 如果 slave_net_timeout 系统变量设置为小于当前心跳间隔的值，则将发出警告。

trans-unit.source: If the RESET SLAVE statement is executed, then the heartbeat interval is reset to the default.
trans-unit.target: 如果执行 RESET SLAVE 语句，则心跳间隔将重置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: If the lc_messages system variable is set to a valid locale name, but the server can't find an error message file for the language associated with the locale, then the default language will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果 lc_messages 系统变量设置为有效的语言环境名称，但是服务器找不到与语言环境关联的语言的错误消息文件，则将使用默认语言。

trans-unit.source: If the log_error system variable was set in an option file or on the command-line, then it can still be unset by specifying --skip-log-error.
trans-unit.target: 如果 log_error 系统变量是在选项文件或命令行中设置的，则仍可以通过指定 --skip-log-error 来取消设置。

trans-unit.source: If the query_cache_type system variable is set to 1, or ON, all queries fitting the size constraints will be stored in the cache unless they contain a SQL_NO_CACHE clause, or are of a nature that caching makes no sense, for example making use of a function that returns the current time. Check that SQL_NO_CACHE will force server to don't use query cache locks.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 query_cache_type 系统变量设置为 1 或 ON ，则所有满足大小限制的查询都将存储在缓存中，除非它们包含 SQL_NO_CACHE 子句，或者具有不考虑缓存的性质（例如，使用函数）返回当前时间。检查 SQL_NO_CACHE 是否将强制服务器不使用查询缓存锁。

trans-unit.source: If the sql_notes server variable is set to 1, Notes are included in the output of SHOW WARNINGS; if it is set to 0, this statement will not show (or count) Notes.
trans-unit.target: 如果 sql_notes 服务器变量设置为1，则在 SHOW WARNINGS 的输出中包括Notes ；如果将其设置为0，则此语句将不会显示（或计数）注释。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL_MODE contains STRICT_TRANS_TABLES and you are inserting into a transactional table (like InnoDB), or if the SQL_MODE contains STRICT_ALL_TABLES, all NOT NULL columns which does not have a DEFAULT value (and is not AUTO_INCREMENT) must be explicitly referenced in INSERT statements. If not, an error like this is produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL_MODE 包含 STRICT_TRANS_TABLES 并且您要插入事务表（如InnoDB），或者SQL_MODE包含 STRICT_ALL_TABLES ，则必须在 INSERT 语句中显式引用所有不具有 DEFAULT 值（并且不是AUTO_INCREMENT）的 NOT NULL 列。如果没有，将产生如下错误：

trans-unit.source: If the innodb_defragment system variable is set to OFF, and if the innodb_optimize_fulltext_only system variable is also set to OFF, then OPTIMIZE TABLE will be equivalent to ALTER TABLE … FORCE.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 innodb_defragment 系统变量设置为 OFF ，并且如果将 innodb_optimize_fulltext_only 系统变量也设置为 OFF ，则 OPTIMIZE TABLE 将等效于 ALTER TABLE … FORCE 。

trans-unit.source: If the ALLOW_INVALID_DATES flag is set, the invalid dates (for example, 30th February) are allowed. If not, if the NO_ZERO_DATE is set, an error is produced; otherwise, a zero-date is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 ALLOW_INVALID_DATES 标志，则允许使用无效日期（例如2月30日）。如果未设置，则设置 NO_ZERO_DATE 会产生错误。否则，返回零日期。

trans-unit.source: If the CLIENT_MULTI_RESULTS API flag is set, CALL can return any number of resultsets and the called stored procedure can execute prepared statements. If it is not set, at most one resultset can be returned and prepared statements cannot be used within procedures.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 CLIENT_MULTI_RESULTS API标志，则 CALL 可以返回任意数量的结果集，并且被调用的存储过程可以执行准备好的语句。如果未设置，则最多可以返回一个结果集，并且不能在过程中使用准备好的语句。

trans-unit.source: If the COPY algorithm is specified with the ALGORITHM clause or with the alter_algorithm system variable, then the COPY algorithm will be used even if it is not necessary. This can result in a lengthy table copy. If multiple ALTER TABLE operations are required that each require the table to be rebuilt, then it is best to specify all operations in a single ALTER TABLE statement, so that the table is only rebuilt once.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ALGORITHM 子句或系统变量 alter_algorithm 指定了 COPY 算法，那么即使没有必要，也将使用 COPY 算法。这可能会导致冗长的表副本。如果需要执行多个 ALTER TABLE 操作，每个操作都需要重建表，则最好在单个 ALTER TABLE 语句中指定所有操作，以便该表仅重建一次。

trans-unit.source: If the COPY algorithm is used with an InnoDB table, then the following statements apply:
trans-unit.target: 如果 COPY 算法与InnoDB表一起使用，则以下语句适用：

trans-unit.source: If the DEFAULT keyword is used but the column does not have a DEFAULT value, an error like this is produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了 DEFAULT 关键字，但该列没有 DEFAULT 值，则会产生如下错误：

trans-unit.source: If the ERROR_ON_DIVISION_BY_ZEROSQL_MODE is used, a division by zero produces an error. Otherwise, it returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ERROR_ON_DIVISION_BY_ZERO SQL_MODE，则被零除会产生错误。否则，它返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If the ERROR_ON_DIVISION_BY_ZEROSQL_MODE is used, any number modulus zero produces an error. Otherwise, it returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ERROR_ON_DIVISION_BY_ZERO SQL_MODE，则任何数字模数为零都会产生错误。否则，它返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If the FOR SYSTEM_TIME clause is not used, the table will show the current data, as if one had specified FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF CURRENT_TIMESTAMP.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 FOR SYSTEM_TIME 子句，则该表将显示当前数据，就像已指定 FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF CURRENT_TIMESTAMP 一样。

trans-unit.source: If the HIGH_NOT_PRECEDENCESQL_MODE is set, NOT has the same precedence as !.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 HIGH_NOT_PRECEDENCE SQL_MODE，则 NOT 的优先级与 ! 。

trans-unit.source: If the IF EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a note instead of an error if the plugin does not exist. See SHOW WARNINGS.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF EXISTS 子句，则如果插件不存在，MariaDB将返回一个注释而不是错误。请参阅显示警告。

trans-unit.source: If the IF EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a note instead of an error if the plugin library does not exist. See SHOW WARNINGS.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF EXISTS 子句，则如果插件库不存在，MariaDB将返回一个注释而不是错误。请参阅显示警告。

trans-unit.source: If the IF EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a note instead of an error if the user does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF EXISTS 子句，如果用户不存在，MariaDB将返回一个注释而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If the IF EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a warning instead of an error if the role does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF EXISTS 子句，则该角色不存在时，MariaDB将返回警告而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If the IF EXISTS clause is used, then MariaDB will return a warning instead of an error if the index does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF EXISTS 子句，那么如果索引不存在，MariaDB将返回警告而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If the IF NOT EXISTS clause is used and the table exists, a note will be produced instead of an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF NOT EXISTS 子句并且该表存在，则将生成注释而不是错误。

trans-unit.source: If the IF NOT EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a warning instead of an error if the event already exists. Cannot be used together with OR REPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF NOT EXISTS 子句，则该事件已经存在时，MariaDB将返回警告而不是错误。不能与OR REPLACE一起使用。

trans-unit.source: If the IF NOT EXISTS clause is used, the trigger will only be created if a trigger of the same name does not exist. If the trigger already exists, by default a warning will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF NOT EXISTS 子句，则仅当不存在相同名称的触发器时才创建触发器。如果触发器已经存在，则默认情况下将返回警告。

trans-unit.source: If the IF NOT EXISTS clause is used, then the index will only be created if an index with the same name does not already exist. If the index already exists, then a warning will be triggered by default.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 IF NOT EXISTS 子句，则仅当尚不存在具有相同名称的索引时，才创建索引。如果索引已经存在，则默认情况下将触发警告。

trans-unit.source: If the IGNORE_BAD_TABLE_OPTIONSSQL_MODE is enabled, wrong table options generate a warning; otherwise, they generate an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果 IGNORE_BAD_TABLE_OPTIONS SQL_MODE启用，错误的表选项生成一个警告; 否则，它们会产生错误。

trans-unit.source: If the IGNORE_SPACESQL_MODE flag is set, function names become reserved words.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 IGNORE_SPACE SQL_MODE标志，则函数名称将成为保留字。

trans-unit.source: If the INPLACE algorithm is specified with the ALGORITHM clause or with the alter_algorithm system variable and if the ALTER TABLE operation does not support the INPLACE algorithm, then an error will be raised. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ALGORITHM 子句或系统变量 alter_algorithm 指定了 INPLACE 算法，并且 ALTER TABLE 操作不支持 INPLACE 算法，则将引发错误。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the INPLACE algorithm is used with an InnoDB table, then the following statements apply:
trans-unit.target: 如果 INPLACE 算法与InnoDB表一起使用，则以下语句适用：

trans-unit.source: If the INSTANT algorithm is specified with the ALGORITHM clause or with the alter_algorithm system variable and if the ALTER TABLE operation does not support the INSTANT algorithm, then an error will be raised. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ALGORITHM 子句或系统变量 alter_algorithm 指定了 INSTANT 算法，并且 ALTER TABLE 操作不支持 INSTANT 算法，则将引发错误。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE statement is disabled by either the server or the client and if the user attempts to execute it, then the server will cause the statement to fail with the following error message:
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器或客户端禁用了 LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE 语句，并且用户尝试执行该语句，则服务器将导致该语句失败，并显示以下错误消息：

trans-unit.source: If the LOCK clause is not explicitly set, then the operation uses LOCK=DEFAULT.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置 LOCK 子句，则该操作使用 LOCK=DEFAULT 。

trans-unit.source: If the NOCOPY algorithm is specified with the ALGORITHM clause or with the alter_algorithm system variable and if the ALTER TABLE operation does not support the NOCOPY algorithm, then an error will be raised. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 ALGORITHM 子句或系统变量 alter_algorithm 指定了 NOCOPY 算法，并且 ALTER TABLE 操作不支持 NOCOPY 算法，则会引发错误。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the NO_AUTO_CREATE_USERSQL_MODE is set, then accounts can only be created if authentication information is specified, or with a CREATE USER statement. If no authentication information is provided, GRANT will produce an error when the specified account does not exist, for example:
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 NO_AUTO_CREATE_USER SQL_MODE ，则只有在指定了身份验证信息或使用 CREATE USER 语句的情况下，才能创建帐户。如果未提供身份验证信息，则当指定的帐户不存在时， GRANT 将产生错误，例如：

trans-unit.source: If the OR REPLACE clause is used and if the index already exists, then instead of returning an error, the server will drop the existing index and replace it with the newly defined index.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 OR REPLACE 子句，并且索引已经存在，则服务器将丢弃现有索引并将其替换为新定义的索引，而不是返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If the OR REPLACE clause is used and if the table already exists, then instead of returning an error, the server will drop the existing table and replace it with the newly defined table.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 OR REPLACE 子句，并且该表已经存在，则服务器将丢弃现有表并将其替换为新定义的表，而不是返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If the PARTITION BY clause is used, the table will be partitioned. A partition method must be explicitly indicated for partitions and subpartitions. Partition methods are:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 PARTITION BY 子句，则表将被分区。必须为分区和子分区明确指定分区方法。分区方法是：

trans-unit.source: If the ROW_FORMAT table option is set to FIXED for an InnoDB table, then the server will either return an error or a warning depending on the value of the innodb_strict_mode system variable. If the innodb_strict_mode system variable is set to OFF, then a warning is issued, and MariaDB will create the table using the default row format for the specific MariaDB server version. If the innodb_strict_mode system variable is set to ON, then an error will be raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 ROW_FORMAT 表的ROW_FORMAT表选项设置为 FIXED ，则服务器将根据 innodb_strict_mode 系统变量的值返回错误或警告。如果将 innodb_strict_mode 系统变量设置为 OFF ，则会发出警告，并且MariaDB将使用特定MariaDB服务器版本的默认行格式创建表。如果将 innodb_strict_mode 系统变量设置为 ON ，则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: If the SECURITY_TYPE is DEFINER, this value indicates which user defined this routine.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SECURITY_TYPE 为 DEFINER ，则此值指示哪个用户定义了此例程。

trans-unit.source: If the ZEROFILL clause is specified, it should be placed directly after the type definition, before the AS (<expression>):
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了 ZEROFILL 子句，则应将其直接放置在类型定义之后， AS (<expression>) ：

trans-unit.source: If the ZEROFILL column option is specified for a column using a numeric data type, then the column will be set to UNSIGNED and the spaces used by default to pad the field are replaced with zeros. ZEROFILL is ignored in expressions or as part of a UNION. ZEROFILL is a non-standard MySQL and MariaDB enhancement.
trans-unit.target: 如果为使用数字数据类型的列指定了 ZEROFILL 列选项，则该列将设置为 UNSIGNED ,并且默认情况下用于填充该字段的空格将替换为零。 ZEROFILL 在表达式中或作为UNION的一部分被忽略。 ZEROFILL 是非标准的MySQL和MariaDB增强功能。

trans-unit.source: If the crypt_str argument does not appear to be an encrypted string, MariaDB returns the given crypt_str.
trans-unit.target: 如果 crypt_str 参数似乎不是加密的字符串，则MariaDB返回给定的crypt_str。

trans-unit.source: If the is_used argument is not given or is 1 or true, then the next used value will one after the given value. If is_used is 0 or false then the next generated value will be the given value.
trans-unit.target: 如果未给出 is_used 自变量，或者为 1 或 true ，则下一个使用的值将在给定值之后一个。如果 is_used 为 0 或 false ,则下一个生成的值将为给定值。

trans-unit.source: If the json_doc is not a valid JSON document, or if any of the paths are not valid, or contain a * or ** wildcard, an error is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果 json_doc 不是有效的JSON文档，或者任何路径无效，或者包含 * 或 ** 通配符，则返回错误。

trans-unit.source: If the mysql database is edited indirectly, statement logging is used regardless of binlog_format setting. Statements editing the mysql database indirectly include GRANT, REVOKE, SET PASSWORD, RENAME USER, ALTER, DROP and CREATE (except for the situation described below).
trans-unit.target: 如果 mysql 数据库是间接编辑的，则无论binlog_format设置如何，都会使用语句日志记录。间接编辑 mysql 数据库的语句包括GRANT，REVOKE，SET PASSWORD，RENAME USER，ALTER，DROP和CREATE（以下情况除外）。

trans-unit.source: If the mysql user is running mysqld, then we can do that by executing the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果 mysql 用户正在运行 mysqld ，那么我们可以通过执行以下操作来做到这一点：

trans-unit.source: If the security_type is DEFINER, this value indicates which user defined this routine.
trans-unit.target: 如果 security_type 为 DEFINER ，则此值指示哪个用户定义了此例程。

trans-unit.source: If the -signal option is given, it specifies the name or number of the signal to send to each process. Otherwise, mysql_zap tries first with TERM (signal 15) and then with KILL (signal 9).
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了-signal选项，则它指定要发送到每个进程的信号的名称或编号。否则，mysql_zap首先尝试使用TERM（信号15），然后尝试使用KILL（信号9）。

trans-unit.source: If the id column of the remote table addressed by the cnc_tab MYSQL table is indexed (which is likely if it is a key) you should also index the id column of the MYSQL cnc_tab table. If so, using “remote” indexing as does FEDERATED, only the useful rows of the remote table will be retrieved during the join process. However, because these rows are retrieved by separate SELECT statements, this will be useful only when retrieving a few rows of a big table.
trans-unit.target: 如果cnc_tab MYSQL 表寻址的远程表的id列已建立索引（如果它是键，则很可能会索引），您还应该索引MYSQL cnc_tab表的id列。如果是这样，则像FEDERATED一样使用“远程”索引，则在连接过程中将仅检索远程表的有用行。但是，由于这些行是通过单独的SELECT语句检索的，因此仅在检索大表的几行时才有用。

trans-unit.source: If the people table is indexed on num, indexing will be used on the remote server. This, in all cases, will limit the amount of data to retrieve on the network.
trans-unit.target: 如果人员表在num上建立了索引，则将在远程服务器上使用索引。在所有情况下，这都会限制在网络上检索的数据量。

trans-unit.source: If the timer thread were to detect a stall in a thread group, then it would either wake up a sleeping worker thread or create a new worker thread in that thread group. At that point, the thread group would have multiple active worker threads. In other words, the thread group would be oversubscribed.
trans-unit.target: 如果计时器线程要检测线程组中的停顿，则它将唤醒正在睡眠的工作线程或在该线程组中创建新的工作线程。此时，线程组将具有多个活动工作线程。换句话说，线程组将被超额预订。

trans-unit.source: If the Audit Plugin has been configured to log connect events, it will log connects, disconnects, and failed connects. For a failed connection, the log includes the error code.
trans-unit.target: 如果审计插件已配置为记录连接事件,则将记录连接、断开连接和失败连接。对于失败的连接,日志中会包含错误代码。

trans-unit.source: If the CHARACTER SET binary attribute is specified, the column is created as the matching binary data type. A TEXT becomes a BLOB, CHAR a BINARY and VARCHAR a VARBINARY. ENUMs and SETs are created as defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了CHARACTER SET二进制属性,那么列就会被创建为匹配的二进制数据类型,TEXT变成BLOB,CHAR变成BINARY,VARCHAR变成VARBINARY。TEXT变成BLOB,CHAR变成BINARY,VARCHAR变成VARBINARY。ENUMs和SETs的创建是按照定义的。

trans-unit.source: If the CLASSPATH variable actually exists and if it is available inside MariaDB, so far so good. You can check this using an UDF function provided by CONNECT that returns environment variable values:
trans-unit.target: 如果CLASSPATH变量确实存在,并且在MariaDB内部是可用的,到目前为止一切正常。你可以使用CONNECT提供的一个返回环境变量值的UDF函数来检查。

trans-unit.source: If the CSV file first record is the list of column names, specifying the HEADER=1 option will skip the first record on reading. On writing, if the file is empty, the column names record is automatically written.
trans-unit.target: 如果CSV文件的第一条记录是列名列表，则指定 HEADER=1 选项将在读取时跳过第一条记录。写入时，如果文件为空，则会自动写入列名称记录。

trans-unit.source: If the CSV file is included in a ZIP file, the CREATE TABLE becomes:
trans-unit.target: 如果CSV文件包含在ZIP文件中,CREATE TABLE就变成了。

trans-unit.source: If the ColumnStore server was configured as a single server deployment, then the Columnstore.xml file will need the IP addresses updated from 127.0.0.1 to the actual ip / hostname of the ColumnStore server in order to be used on a remote SDK server. A simple sed statement should suffice for updating:
trans-unit.target: 如果ColumnStore服务器被配置为单服务器部署,那么Columnstore.xml文件需要将IP地址从127.0.0.1更新为ColumnStore服务器的实际ip/主机名,以便在远程SDK服务器上使用。一个简单的sed语句就足够更新了。

trans-unit.source: If the IF EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will not return an error if the server does not exist. Unlike all other statements, DROP SERVER IF EXISTS does not issue a note if the server does not exist. See MDEV-9400.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用IF EXISTS子句，则如果服务器不存在，MariaDB将不会返回错误。与所有其他语句不同，如果服务器不存在，则DROP SERVER IF EXISTS不会发出注释。请参阅MDEV-9400。

trans-unit.source: If the IF NOT EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a warning instead of an error if the function already exists. Cannot be used together with OR REPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用IF NOT EXISTS子句,如果函数已经存在,MariaDB将返回一个警告而不是错误。不能和OR REPLACE一起使用。

trans-unit.source: If the IF NOT EXISTS clause is used, MariaDB will return a warning instead of an error if the server already exists. Cannot be used together with OR REPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用IF NOT EXISTS子句,如果服务器已经存在,MariaDB将返回一个警告而不是错误。不能和OR REPLACE一起使用。

trans-unit.source: If the JAVA_HOME variable was exported as explained above, CONNECT can sometimes find it using this information. Otherwise, its search path can be added to the LD_LIBRARY_PATH environment variable. But all this is complicated because making environment variables permanent on Linux is painful (many different methods must be used depending on the Linux version and the used shell).
trans-unit.target: 如果JAVA_HOME变量是按照上面的解释导出的,CONNECT有时可以利用这个信息找到它。否则,可以将其搜索路径添加到LD_LIBRARY_PATH环境变量中。但这一切都很复杂,因为在Linux上使环境变量永久化是很痛苦的(根据Linux版本和使用的shell,必须使用许多不同的方法)。

trans-unit.source: If the JVM library (jvm.dll on Windows, libjvm.so on Linux) was not placed in the standard library load path, CONNECT cannot find it and must be told where to search for it. This happens in particular on Linux when the Oracle Javapackage was installed in a private location.
trans-unit.target: 如果JVM库(Windows上的jvm.dll,Linux上的libjvm.so)没有放在标准库加载路径中,CONNECT就找不到它,必须告诉它在哪里搜索。当Oracle Javapackage安装在私人位置时,这种情况在Linux上尤其会发生。

trans-unit.source: If the LEVEL clause is no provided, a default of 1 to the maximum for the collation is assumed.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供LEVEL子句,则假设整理的最大值为1。

trans-unit.source: If the LEVEL is specified without using a range, an optional modifier is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定LEVEL而不使用范围,则允许使用可选的修饰符。

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB Client is is running on an external Server, then it would be the IP Address of that server.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB客户端是在外部服务器上运行,那么它将是该服务器的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB server is running on Unix, then some additional configuration steps will need to be implemented in order to use the plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器是在Unix上运行的,那么为了使用该插件就需要执行一些额外的配置步骤。

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB server is running on Unix, then the KDC server will need to create a keytab file for the MariaDB server. The keytab file contains the service principal name, which is the identity that the MariaDB server will use to communicate with the KDC server. The keytab will need to be transferred to the MariaDB server, and the mysqld server process will need read access to this keytab file.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器在Unix上运行，则KDC服务器将需要为MariaDB服务器创建密钥表文件。密钥表文件包含服务主体名称，这是MariaDB服务器将用于与KDC服务器通信的标识。密钥表将需要转移到MariaDB服务器，并且 mysqld 服务器进程将需要对该密钥表文件的读取访问权限。

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB server is running on Unix, then the path to the keytab file that was previously created can be set by configuring the gssapi_keytab_path system variable. This can be specified as a command-line argument to mysqld or it can be specified in a relevant server option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器在Unix上运行，则可以通过配置 gssapi_keytab_path 系统变量来设置先前创建的keytab文件的路径。可以将其指定为 mysqld 的命令行参数，也可以在选项文件中的相关服务器选项组中指定。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB server is running on Unix, then the plugin needs a service principal name in order to function.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器运行在Unix上,那么插件需要一个服务委托人名称才能发挥作用。

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB server is running on Windows, then no special configuration steps will need to be implemented in order to use the plugin, as long as the following is true:
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器是在Windows上运行的,那么为了使用该插件,不需要执行任何特殊的配置步骤,只要以下几点为真。

trans-unit.source: If the MariaDB server is running on Windows, then the plugin does not usually need a service principal in order to function. However, if you want to use one anyway, then one can be created with the setspn utility.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器在Windows上运行，则该插件通常不需要服务主体即可起作用。但是，如果仍然要使用一个，则可以使用 setspn 实用程序创建一个。

trans-unit.source: If the PAM service requires challenge-responses, multiple questions, or other similar complicated authentication schemes, then the PAM service is not compatible with mysql_clear_password client authentication plugin. In that case, the dialog client authentication plugin will have to be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果PAM服务需要质询响应，多个问题或其他类似的复杂身份验证方案，则PAM服务与 mysql_clear_password 客户端身份验证插件不兼容。在这种情况下，将必须使用 dialog 客户端身份验证插件。

trans-unit.source: If the SDK is being installed to a server that is not part of a MariaDB ColumnStore server then it requires a local copy of the ColumnStore.xml file in order to determine how to connect to ColumnStore. The simplest approach is to copy this file from one of the ColumnStore servers to one of the following 2 locations on the SDK server ensuring read privileges for the OS user being used:
trans-unit.target: 如果SDK被安装到一个不属于MariaDB ColumnStore服务器的服务器上,那么它需要ColumnStore.xml文件的本地副本,以确定如何连接到ColumnStore。最简单的方法是把这个文件从ColumnStore服务器复制到SDK服务器上的以下两个位置之一,确保使用的操作系统用户有读取权限。

trans-unit.source: If the SEQUENCE storage engine is installed, it is not possible to create a table with a name which follows the SEQUENCE pattern:
trans-unit.target: 如果安装了SEQUENCE存储引擎,则无法创建名称为SEQUENCE模式的表。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL SECURITY value is DEFINER but the definer account does not exist when the view is referenced, an error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果SQL SECURITY值是DEFINER,但在引用视图时,定义者账户不存在,就会发生错误。

trans-unit.source: If the SQLSTATE is not valid, the following error like this will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果SQLSTATE无效,就会产生下面这样的错误。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL_MODE is strict (STRICT_ALL_TABLES or STRICT_TRANS_TABLES flags are specified), a 1366 error will be produced.
trans-unit.target: 如果SQL_MODE是严格的(指定了STRICT_ALL_TABLES或STRICT_TRANS_TABLES标志),将产生一个1366错误。

trans-unit.source: If the Spider table is partitioned, the name must be of the format table_name#P#partition_name. The partition name can be viewed in the mysql.spider_tables table, for example:
