trans-unit.target: 如果Spider表已分区，则名称的格式必须为 table_name#P#partition_name 。可以在 mysql.spider_tables 表中查看分区名称，例如：

trans-unit.source: If the Spider table is partitioned, you must set "Spider table name" with a part name such as "table_name#P#part_name".
trans-unit.target: 如果Spider表是分区的,则必须将 "Spider表名 "设置为部分名称,如 "table_name#P#part_name"。

trans-unit.source: If the WHERE does a lot of filtering, the ORDER BY is wasting a lot of time fetching rows only to filter them out. Using an INDEX matching the WHERE clause is better.
trans-unit.target: 如果WHERE做了大量的过滤,ORDER BY就会浪费大量的时间去获取行,只为过滤掉。使用与WHERE子句匹配的INDEX更好。

trans-unit.source: If the WHERE does very little filtering, fetching the rows in ORDER BY order avoids a sort and has little wasted effort (because of 'little filtering'). Using the INDEX matching the ORDER BY is better in this case.
trans-unit.target: 如果WHERE做的过滤很少,按ORDER BY的顺序取行可以避免排序,而且浪费的精力也很少(因为 "过滤很少")。在这种情况下,使用与ORDER BY相匹配的INDEX会更好。

trans-unit.source: If the above test doesn't pass, check the logs in the 'var' directory. If there is a problem with the sphinx installation, the reason can probably be found in the log file at: var/log/sphinx.sphinx/searchd/sphinx.log.
trans-unit.target: 如果上述测试未通过，请检查 'var' 目录中的日志。如果sphinx安装存在问题，则可能可以在日志文件中找到原因： var/log/sphinx.sphinx/searchd/sphinx.log 。

trans-unit.source: If the account does not yet exist, then GRANT can implicitly create it. To implicitly create an account with GRANT, a user is required to have the same privileges that would be required to explicitly create the account with the CREATE USER statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果该帐户尚不存在，则 GRANT 可以隐式创建它。要使用 GRANT 隐式创建帐户，要求用户具有与使用 CREATE USER 语句显式创建帐户相同的特权。

trans-unit.source: If the alias is prefixed by ‘json_’ (to prevent escaping) the key name is stripped from that prefix.
trans-unit.target: 如果别名以“ json_”作为前缀（以防止转义），则密钥名称将从该前缀中剥离。

trans-unit.source: If the answer that came back had been something other than a MariaDB package, then it is likely there would have been issues with running the MariaDB mysql client application.
trans-unit.target: 如果得到的答案是MariaDB包以外的东西,那么很可能在运行MariaDB mysql客户端应用时出现问题。

trans-unit.source: If the argument is not a string value, it is converted into a string.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数不是字符串值,则将其转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: If the argument is used in the WHERE clause, it can be be compared to a constant with < or <= in case of MAX() and with > or >= in case of MIN().
trans-unit.target: 如果参数在中使用 WHERE 子句，可以进行比较，以具有恒定 < 或 <= 在的情况下， MAX() ，并用 > 或 >= 在的情况下， MIN() 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup has already been prepared, then backup_type is set to log-applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经准备好备份，则将 backup_type 设置为 log-applied 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is a full backup, then innodb_from_lsn has the value of 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是完全备份，则 innodb_from_lsn 的值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is a partial backup, then this value will be Y.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是部分备份，那么这个值将是 Y 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is a non-prepared full backup or a non-prepared partial backup, then backup_type is set to full-backuped.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是未经准备的完整备份或未经准备的部分备份，则将 backup_type 设置为 full-backuped 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is a non-prepared incremental backup, then backup_type is set to incremental.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是非准备的增量备份，则将 backup_type 设置为 incremental 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is an incremental backup, then innodb_from_lsn has the value of the log sequence number (LSN) at which the backup started reading from the InnoDB redo log.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是增量备份，则 innodb_from_lsn 具有日志序列号（LSN）的值，从该序列开始备份从InnoDB重做日志中读取。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is an incremental backup, then this file contains changed pages for the table.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是增量备份，则此文件包含表的已更改页面。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is an incremental backup, then this file contains metadata about <table>.delta files. The fields in this file are listed below.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是增量备份，则此文件包含有关 <table>.delta 文件的元数据。此文件中的字段在下面列出。

trans-unit.source: If the backup is an incremental backup, then this value will be Y.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份的增量备份，那么这个值将是 Y 。

trans-unit.source: If the backup noticed concurrent DDL, then it might fail with "ALTER TABLE or OPTIMIZE TABLE was executed during backup".
trans-unit.target: 如果备份注意到并发的DDL,那么可能会以 "ALTER TABLE或OPTIMIZE TABLE was executed during backup "失败。

trans-unit.source: If the backup was taken of an existing slave server, then the new slave should already have the correct GTID position stored in the mysql.gtid_slave_pos table. This is assuming that this table was backed up and that it was backed up in a consistent manner with changes to other tables. In this case, there is no need to explicitly look up the GTID position on the old server and set it on the new slave - it will be already correctly loaded from the mysql.gtid_slave_pos table. This however does not work if the backup was taken from the master - because then the current GTID position is contained in the binary log, not in the mysql.gtid_slave_pos table or any other table.
trans-unit.target: 如果备份是从现有的从属服务器进行的，则新的从属服务器应该已经在 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表中存储了正确的GTID位置。这是假设已备份该表，并且已通过与其他表的更改一致的方式备份了该表。在这种情况下，无需在旧服务器上显式查找GTID位置并将其设置在新的从属服务器上-它将已经从 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表中正确加载。但是，如果备份是从主服务器上进行的，则无法使用-因为当前GTID位置包含在二进制日志中，而不是在 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表或任何其他表中。

trans-unit.source: If the binaries are already built, you can generate a binary tarball with
trans-unit.target: 如果二进制文件已经生成,你可以用

trans-unit.source: If the binary log index file has been removed, or incorrectly manually edited, all of the above forms of purging log files will fail. The .index file is a plain text file, and can be manually recreated or edited so that it lists only the binary log files that are present, in numeric/age order.
trans-unit.target: 如果二进制日志索引文件已被删除,或手动编辑不正确,则上述所有清除日志文件的形式都将失败。.index文件是一个纯文本文件,可以手动重新创建或编辑,使其仅按数字/年龄顺序列出存在的二进制日志文件。

trans-unit.source: If the binary log is enabled, all SQL statements will be logged as usual, and replicated to any slave servers. However, since rows are not stored, it is important to use statement-based rather than the row or mixed format, as UPDATE and DELETE statements are neither logged nor replicated. See Binary Log Formats.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了二进制日志，则所有SQL语句将照常记录，并复制到任何从属服务器。但是，由于未存储行，因此重要的是使用基于语句的而不是行或混合的格式，因为UPDATE和DELETE语句既不记录也不复制。请参阅二进制日志格式。

trans-unit.source: If the binary logging format is mixed (the default from MariaDB 10.2.4), unsafe statements are logged using the row-based format, while safe statements use the statement-based format.
trans-unit.target: 如果混合使用二进制日志记录格式（MariaDB 10.2.4中的默认设置），则不安全语句将使用基于行的格式记录，而安全语句将使用基于语句的格式。

trans-unit.source: If the binary logging format is row-based, all statements are logged normally, and the distinction between safe and unsafe is not made.
trans-unit.target: 如果二进制日志记录格式是基于行的，则所有语句都将正常记录，并且不会区分安全和不安全。

trans-unit.source: If the binary logging format is statement-based (the default until MariaDB 10.2.3), unsafe statements generate a warning and are logged normally.
trans-unit.target: 如果二进制日志记录格式是基于语句的（MariaDB 10.2.3之前的默认设置），则不安全的语句会生成警告并正常记录。

trans-unit.source: If the calculated value for redo log occupancy is too close to 1.0, then the InnoDB redo log capacity may be too small for the current workload.
trans-unit.target: 如果重做日志占用的计算值太接近 1.0 ，那么对于当前工作负载，InnoDB重做日志容量可能太小。

trans-unit.source: If the character set and collation are not specifically set in the statement, the database defaults at the time of creation will be used. If the database defaults change at a later stage, the stored function character set/collation will not be changed at the same time; the stored function needs to be dropped and recreated to ensure the same character set/collation as the database is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果语句中没有特别设置字符集和整理,将使用创建时的数据库默认值。如果后期数据库默认值发生变化,存储函数的字符集/整理方式不会同时发生变化,需要放弃存储函数并重新创建,以保证使用与数据库相同的字符集/整理方式。

trans-unit.source: If the client does not use either the libmysqlclient or MariaDB Connector/C library, then you will have to determine which authentication plugins are supported by the specific client library used by the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端不请使用 libmysqlclient 或MariaDB的连接器/ C库，那么你将不得不确定哪种验证插件是由客户端使用的特定客户端库支持。

trans-unit.source: If the client uses either the libmysqlclient or MariaDB Connector/C library, but the client is not bundled with either library's optional client authentication plugins, then you can only use the conventional authentication plugins (like mysql_native_password and mysql_old_password) and the non-conventional authentication plugins that don't require special client-side authentication plugins (like unix_socket and named_pipe).
trans-unit.target: 如果客户端使用 libmysqlclient 或MariaDB Connector / C库，但客户端未与该库的可选客户端身份验证插件捆绑在一起，则只能使用常规身份验证插件（例如 mysql_native_password 和 mysql_old_password ）和非常规身份验证插件不需要特殊的客户端身份验证插件（例如 unix_socket 和 named_pipe ）。

trans-unit.source: If the cluster is not bootstrapped and mysqld on the first node is just started normally, then the node willl try to connect to at least one of the nodes listed in the wsrep_cluster_address option. If no nodes are currently running, then this will fail. Bootstrapping the first node solves this problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果集群未启动，并且第一个节点上的 mysqld 正常启动，则该节点将尝试连接到 wsrep_cluster_address 选项中列出的至少一个节点。如果当前没有节点在运行，则此操作将失败。自举第一个节点可解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: If the column is not defined with NOT NULL, AUTO_INCREMENT or TIMESTAMP, an explicit DEFAULT NULL will be added. Note that in MySQL and in MariaDB before 10.1.6, you may get an explicit DEFAULT for primary key parts, if not specified with NOT NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果未使用 NOT NULL ， AUTO_INCREMENT 或 TIMESTAMP 定义列，则将添加显式的 DEFAULT NULL 。请注意，在MySQL和10.1.6之前的MariaDB中，如果未使用NOT NULL进行指定，则可能会获得主键部分的显式 DEFAULT 。

trans-unit.source: If the column is not found NULL returned as a value of the column.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有找到该列,则返回NULL作为该列的值。

trans-unit.source: If the column name starts with rev:, the column family is reverse-ordered.
trans-unit.target: 如果列名以 rev: 开头，则列族的顺序是相反的。

trans-unit.source: If the columns in the new table are more than the rows returned by the query, the columns populated by the query will be placed after other columns. Note that if the strict SQL_MODE is on, and the columns that are not names in the query do not have a DEFAULT value, an error will raise and no rows will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果新表中的列多于查询返回的行，则查询填充的列将放置在其他列之后。请注意，如果 SQL_MODE 了严格的SQL_MODE，并且查询中非名称的列没有 DEFAULT 值，则会引发错误，并且不会复制任何行。

trans-unit.source: If the command does not return any results, then either your mysqld is statically linked to the TLS and cryptography library on your system or your mysqld is not built with TLS and cryptography support at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果该命令未返回任何结果，则说明您的 mysqld 静态链接至系统上的TLS和加密库，或者您的 mysqld 根本不支持TLS和加密。

trans-unit.source: If the commands above fail, you can enable more compilation information by doing:
trans-unit.target: 如果上面的命令失败,你可以通过以下方式启用更多的编译信息。

trans-unit.source: If the connection cannot be established, wait and retry instead of aborting.
trans-unit.target: 如果不能建立连接,请等待并重试,而不是中止。

trans-unit.source: If the connection cannot be established, wait and retry instead of aborting. If a count value is given, it indicates the number of times to retry. The default is one time.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法建立连接，请等待并重试，而不是中止。如果给出计数值，则表示重试的次数。默认值为一次。

trans-unit.source: If the container doesn't start, or is not working properly, we can investigate with the following command:
trans-unit.target: 如果容器没有启动,或者工作不正常,我们可以用下面的命令进行调查。

trans-unit.source: If the data contains a time or (time correlated ascending value) column then significant performance gains will be achieved if the data is sorted by this field and also typically queried with a where clause on that column. This is because the system records a minimum and maximum value for each extent providing for a system maintained range partitioning scheme. This allows the system to completely eliminate scanning an extent map if the query includes a where clause for that field limiting the results to a subset of extent maps.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据中包含一个时间或(时间相关的升值)列,那么如果按这个字段对数据进行排序,并且还通常用该列上的where子句进行查询,那么将获得显著的性能提升。这是因为系统为每个范围记录了一个最小值和最大值,提供了一个系统维护的范围分割方案。这样,如果查询中包含该字段的where子句,将结果限制在范围图的子集上,系统就可以完全不用扫描范围图。

trans-unit.source: If the data types differ from what you expect them to be based on a CREATE TABLE statement, note that MariaDB sometimes changes data types when you create or alter a table. The conditions under which this occurs are described in the Silent Column Changes article.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据类型与您期望的基于 CREATE TABLE 语句的数据类型不同，请注意，MariaDB在创建或更改表时有时会更改数据类型。“ 无声列更改”一文中描述了发生这种情况的条件。

trans-unit.source: If the default mode is set to use cpimport internally any output error files will be written to /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/mysql/db directory (or equivalent directory for non root install). These can be consulted for troubleshooting any errors reported.
trans-unit.target: 如果默认模式被设置为在内部使用cpimport,那么任何输出的错误文件都会被写入/usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/mysql/db目录(或非root安装的同等目录)。这些文件可以被用来排除任何错误报告。

trans-unit.source: If the dense_rank function is used the rank values would be 1,2,3,3,4 and for the row_number function the values would be 1,2,3,4,5.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用dense_rank函数,排名值将是1,2,3,3,4,对于row_number函数,其值将是1,2,3,4,5。

trans-unit.source: If the engine condition pushdown is OFF, it is necessary to set it ON with the optimizer_switch setting, for instance by:
trans-unit.target: 如果引擎状态下推为OFF，则必须使用optimizer_switch设置将其设置为ON ，例如：

trans-unit.source: If the engine is file-based, that is, it has non-empty list in the tablefile_extensions, this method is optional. For any file-based engine that does not implement discover_table_names(), MariaDB will automatically discover the list of all tables of this engine, by looking for files with the extension tablefile_extensions[0].
trans-unit.target: 如果引擎是基于文件的，即在 tablefile_extensions 中具有非空列表，则此方法是可选的。对于任何未实现 discover_table_names() 的基于文件的引擎，MariaDB将通过查找扩展名为 tablefile_extensions[0] 文件来自动发现该引擎所有表的列表。

trans-unit.source: If the event does not exist, the error ERROR 1517 (HY000): Unknown event 'event_name' results. You can override this and cause the statement to generate a NOTE for non-existent events instead by using IF EXISTS. See SHOW WARNINGS.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件不存在，则会 ERROR 1517 (HY000): Unknown event 'event_name' 错误ERROR 1517（HY000）：未知事件'event_name'。您可以覆盖它，并使该语句为不存在的事件生成一个 NOTE ，而不是使用 IF EXISTS 。请参阅 SHOW WARNINGS 。

trans-unit.source: If the event scheduler is not running and event_scheduler has been set to OFF, use:
trans-unit.target: 如果事件调度程序未运行并且 event_scheduler 已设置为 OFF ，请使用：

trans-unit.source: If the expression is a valid IPv4 address, returns 1, otherwise returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果表达式是一个有效的IPv4地址,则返回1,否则返回0。

trans-unit.source: If the facility is not compiled in, the system variable does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果该设施没有被编译进来,系统变量就不存在。

trans-unit.source: If the file does not exist or cannot be read because one of the preceding conditions is not satisfied, the function returns NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件不存在或者因为不满足前面的一个条件而无法读取,函数返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If the file system permissions for some MariaDB directory look fine, but the MariaDB error log still has errors that look similar to the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果某些MariaDB目录的文件系统权限看起来不错，但MariaDB 错误日志仍然具有类似于以下内容的错误：

trans-unit.source: If the following error is received, most likely with a transaction LOAD DATA INFILE or INSERT INTO SELECT then it is recommended to break up the load into multiple smaller chunks, increase the VersionBufferFileSize setting, or consider a non transactional LOAD DATA INFILE or to use cpimport.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到以下错误,很可能是事务性的LOAD DATA INFILE或INSERT INTO SELECT,那么建议将负载分解成多个更小的块,增加VersionBufferFileSize设置,或者考虑非事务性的LOAD DATA INFILE或使用cpimport。

trans-unit.source: If the format contains elements DDD or DDDD, the day of week name is skipped on input and ignored to calculate the internal date value. On output, the correct day of week name is generated and displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果格式中包含DDD或DDDD元素,则在输入时跳过星期名称,并在计算内部日期值时予以忽略。在输出时,将生成并显示正确的星期名称。

trans-unit.source: If the given decimal position is 0, it rounds to return no decimal point or fractional part. You can optionally specify a locale value to format numbers to the pattern appropriate for the given region.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的小数位是 0 ，则四舍五入不返回小数点或小数部分。您可以选择指定语言环境值，以将数字格式化为适合给定区域的模式。

trans-unit.source: If the given pattern occurs more than once, the FIELD() function only returns the index of the first instance. If the given pattern is NULL, the function returns 0, as a NULL pattern always fails to match.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定的模式出现多次，则 FIELD() 函数仅返回第一个实例的索引。如果给定的模式为 NULL ，则该函数返回 0 ，因为 NULL 模式始终不匹配。

trans-unit.source: If the host name is not provided, it is assumed to be '%'.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供主机名，则假定为 '%' 。

trans-unit.source: If the identical query is not found in the cache, the query will be processed normally and then stored, along with its result set, in the query cache. If the query is found in the cache, the results will be pulled from the cache, which is much quicker than processing it normally.
trans-unit.target: 如果在缓存中没有找到相同的查询,则会正常处理该查询,然后连同其结果集一起存储在查询缓存中。如果在缓存中找到了查询,则会从缓存中提取结果,这比正常处理要快得多。

trans-unit.source: If the index file should have a different name, for instance because several tables are created on the same data file with different indexes, specify the base index file name with the XFILE_NAME option.
trans-unit.target: 如果索引文件应该有一个不同的名字,例如因为在同一个数据文件上创建了几个具有不同索引的表,那么就用XFILE_NAME选项指定基础索引文件的名字。

trans-unit.source: If the integer part is zero, it can be omitted, but the literal must begin with a dot.
trans-unit.target: 如果整数部分为零,可以省略,但文字必须以点开始。

trans-unit.source: If the isolation level is set to SERIALIZABLE, all plain SELECT statements are converted to SELECT ... LOCK IN SHARE MODE.
trans-unit.target: 如果隔离级别设置为SERIALIZABLE，则所有普通 SELECT 语句都将转换为 SELECT ... LOCK IN SHARE MODE 。

trans-unit.source: If the json document is large, this can take up a large amount of time and storage space. It is all right when one simple json function is called – it must be done anyway – but is a waste of time and memory when json functions are used as parameters to other json functions.
trans-unit.target: 如果json文档很大，这会占用大量时间和存储空间。只需调用一个简单的json函数就可以了（无论如何都必须这样做），但是当将json函数用作其他json函数的参数时，则浪费时间和内存。

trans-unit.source: If the key file is encrypted, then the File Key Management plugin requires both the file_key_management_filename and the file_key_management_filekey system variables to be configured.
trans-unit.target: 如果密钥文件已加密，则文件密钥管理插件需要同时配置 file_key_management_filename 和 file_key_management_filekey 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If the key file is unencrypted, then the File Key Management plugin only requires the file_key_management_filename system variable to be configured.
trans-unit.target: 如果密钥文件未加密，则文件密钥管理插件仅需要配置 file_key_management_filename 系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If the last argument contains a shell or SQL wildcard (*,?,% or _) then only what's matched by the wildcard is shown. If a database name contains any underscores, those should be escaped with a backslash (some Unix shells require two) to get a list of the proper tables or columns. “*” and “?” characters are converted into SQL “%” and “_” wildcard characters. This might cause some confusion when you try to display the columns for a table with a “_” in the name, because in this case, mysqlshow shows you only the table names that match the pattern. This is easily fixed by adding an extra “%” last on the command line as a separate argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个参数包含shell或SQL通配符（*，？，％或_），则仅显示通配符匹配的内容。如果数据库名称包含任何下划线，则应使用反斜杠对其进行转义（某些Unix shell需要两个下划线）以获取适当的表或列的列表。“ *”和“？” 字符将转换为SQL“％”和“ _”通配符。当您尝试显示名称中带有“ _”的表的列时，这可能会引起一些混淆，因为在这种情况下，mysqlshow仅显示与模式匹配的表名。通过在命令行的最后添加一个额外的“％”作为单独的参数，可以轻松解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: If the last field has fixed length, the table should be referred as having the type FIX. For instance, to create a table on the file boys.txt:
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一个字段的长度固定，则该表应称为 FIX 类型。例如，要在文件boy.txt上创建表：

trans-unit.source: If the left argument of IN is the row: (7, NULL, 9) , and the result of the right subquery operand of IN is the table:
trans-unit.target: 如果IN的左参数是行： (7, NULL, 9) ，则IN的右子查询操作数的结果是表：

trans-unit.source: If the leftmost character is not a multi-byte character, ORD() returns the same value as the ASCII() function.
trans-unit.target: 如果最左边的字符不是多字节字符，则ORD（）返回与ASCII（）函数相同的值。

trans-unit.source: If the leftmost character of the string str is a multi-byte character, returns the code for that character, calculated from the numeric values of its constituent bytes using this formula:
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串 str 的最左边的字符是多字节字符，则返回该字符的代码，该代码使用以下公式根据其组成字节的数值计算得出：

trans-unit.source: If the library that the system tries to use is not from a MariaDB package, the remedy is to remove the offending package (and possibly install or re-install the correct package) so that the correct library can be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统试图使用的库不是来自MariaDB包,补救措施是删除违规的包(并可能安装或重新安装正确的包),这样就可以使用正确的库。

trans-unit.source: If the master crashes, then failover may involve some data loss, because the master may have committed transactions that had not yet been acknowledged by the slaves.
trans-unit.target: 如果主站崩溃,那么故障切换可能会涉及一些数据损失,因为主站可能已经进行了尚未被从站承认的交易。

trans-unit.source: If the master crashes, then failover should be lossless, because all transactions committed on the master would have been replicated to the slave.
trans-unit.target: 如果主站崩溃,那么故障转移应该是无损的,因为所有在主站上提交的事务都会被复制到从站。

trans-unit.source: If the maximum length is exceeded, and SQL strict mode is not enabled , the extra characters will be dropped with a warning. If strict mode is enabled, an error will occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过了最大长度，并且未启用SQL严格模式，则会删除多余的字符并显示警告。如果启用严格模式，将发生错误。

trans-unit.source: If the mysql client loses its connection to the server while sending a statement, it immediately and automatically tries to reconnect once to the server and send the statement again. However, even if mysql succeeds in reconnecting, your first connection has ended and all your previous session objects and settings are lost: temporary tables, the autocommit mode, and user-defined and session variables. Also, any current transaction rolls back. This behavior may be dangerous for you, as in the following example where the server was shut down and restarted between the first and second statements without you knowing it:
trans-unit.target: 如果mysql客户端在发送语句时失去了与服务器的连接,它就会立即自动尝试重新连接一次服务器,并再次发送语句。然而,即使mysql成功地重新连接,你的第一次连接也已经结束,你之前所有的会话对象和设置都会丢失:临时表、自动提交模式以及用户定义和会话变量。同时,任何当前事务也会回滚。这种行为对你来说可能是危险的,就像下面的例子一样,服务器在第一条和第二条语句之间被关闭并重新启动,而你却不知道。

trans-unit.source: If the mysql database is edited directly, logging is performed as expected according to the binlog_format. Statements that directly edit the mysql database include INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE, REPLACE, DO, LOAD DATA INFILE, SELECT, and TRUNCATE TABLE.
trans-unit.target: 如果直接编辑mysql数据库，则根据binlog_format按预期执行日志记录。直接编辑mysql数据库的语句包括INSERT，UPDATE，DELETE，REPLACE，DO，LOAD DATA INFILE，SELECT和TRUNCATE TABLE。

trans-unit.source: If the mysqld process is killed during an ALTER TABLE you may find a table named #sql-... in your data directory. In MariaDB 10.3, InnoDB tables with this prefix will de deleted automatically during startup. In MariaDB 10.4 we will ensure that these temporary tables will always be deleted automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果mysqld进程在ALTER TABLE期间被杀死，则可以在数据目录中找到一个名为#sql -...的表。在MariaDB 10.3中，具有此前缀的InnoDB表将在启动期间自动删除。在MariaDB 10.4中，我们将确保始终将这些临时表自动删除。

trans-unit.source: If the named routine is available, each statement produces a result set. Each row in the result set corresponds to one "instruction" in the routine. The first column is Pos, which is an ordinal number beginning with 0. The second column is Instruction, which contains an SQL statement (usually changed from the original source), or a directive which has meaning only to the stored-routine handler.
trans-unit.target: 如果命名的例程可用,每条语句都会产生一个结果集。结果集中的每一行对应于例程中的一个 "指令"。第一列是Pos,这是一个从0开始的序数。 第二列是Instruction,它包含一个SQL语句(通常从原始源更改),或者一个只对存储程序处理程序有意义的指令。

trans-unit.source: If the new primary key column is not defined as NOT NULL, then it is highly recommended for strict mode to be enabled in SQL_MODE. Otherwise, NULL values will be silently converted to the default value for the given data type, which is probably not the desired behavior in this scenario.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的主键列未定义为 NOT NULL ，则强烈建议在 SQL_MODE 中启用严格模式。否则， NULL 值将被静默转换为给定数据类型的默认值，这在这种情况下可能不是所需的行为。

trans-unit.source: If the new table has a primary key or UNIQUE indexes, you can use the IGNORE or REPLACE keywords to handle duplicate key errors during the query. IGNORE means that the newer values must not be inserted an identical value exists in the index. REPLACE means that older values must be overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果新表具有主键或 UNIQUE 索引，则可以在查询过程中使用IGNORE或 REPLACE 关键字来处理重复的键错误。 IGNORE 表示不得插入较新的值，索引中存在相同的值。 REPLACE 表示必须覆盖旧值。

trans-unit.source: If the new table has a primary key or UNIQUE indexes, you can use IGNORE to handle duplicate key errors during the query. The newer values will not be inserted if an identical value already exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果新表具有主键或UNIQUE索引，则可以在查询过程中使用IGNORE处理重复的键错误。如果已经存在相同的值，则不会插入较新的值。

trans-unit.source: If the new value is higher than the current maximum value, the AUTO_INCREMENT value is updated, so the next value will be higher. If the new value is lower than the current maximum value, the AUTO_INCREMENT value remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果新值高于当前最大值，则会更新 AUTO_INCREMENT 值，因此下一个值将更高。如果新值小于当前最大值，则 AUTO_INCREMENT 值保持不变。

trans-unit.source: If the node is a replication master, then its replication slaves only replicate transactions which are in the binary log, so this means that the transactions that correspond to Galera Cluster write-sets would not be replicated by any replication slaves by default. If you would like a node to write its replicated write sets to the binary log, then you will have to set log_slave_updates=ON. If the node has any replication slaves, then this would also allow those slaves to replicate the transactions that corresponded to those write sets.
trans-unit.target: 如果该节点是复制主服务器，则其复制从属服务器仅复制二进制日志中的事务，因此这意味着默认情况下，任何复制从属服务器都不会复制与Galera Cluster写入集相对应的事务。如果希望节点将其复制的写集写入二进制日志，则必须设置 log_slave_updates=ON 。如果节点具有任何复制从属，则这还将允许那些从属复制与那些写集相对应的事务。

trans-unit.source: If the node is a replication slave, then it is probably also a good idea to enable wsrep_restart_slave. When this is enabled, the node will restart its slave threads whenever it rejoins the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果该节点是复制从站，那么启用 wsrep_restart_slave 也是一个好主意。启用此功能后，无论何时节点重新加入群集，节点都将重新启动其从属线程。

trans-unit.source: If the node is a replication slave, then the node's slave SQL thread will be applying transactions that it replicates from its replication master. Transactions applied by the slave SQL thread will only generate Galera Cluster write-sets if the node has log_slave_updates=ON set. Therefore, in order to replicate these transactions to the rest of the nodes in the cluster, log_slave_updates=ON must be set.
trans-unit.target: 如果该节点是复制从属节点，则该节点的从属SQL线程将应用它从其复制主节点复制的事务。如果节点设置了 log_slave_updates=ON ，则从属SQL线程应用的事务将仅生成Galera Cluster写集。因此，为了将这些事务复制到群集中的其余节点，必须设置 log_slave_updates=ON 。

trans-unit.source: If the node is synchronizing with the cluster by performing a state transfer that allows access to the server, such as an Incremental State Transfer (IST) or a State Snapshot Transfer(SST) that uses the mysqldump SST method, then you can check the status of the state transfer by connecting to the server through the mysql client, then checking the wsrep_local_state_uuid and wsrep_cluster_state_uuid status variables. When they equal each other, the node is in sync with the cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果节点通过执行允许访问服务器的状态传输（例如，使用 mysqldump SST方法的增量状态传输（IST）或状态快照传输（SST））与集群同步，则可以检查状态通过 mysql 客户端连接到服务器，然后检查 wsrep_local_state_uuid 和 wsrep_cluster_state_uuid 状态变量来完成状态转移。当它们彼此相等时，该节点与集群同步。

trans-unit.source: If the number of opened tables is increasing rapidly, you should look at increasing the table_open_cache value. Try to find a value that sees a slow, or possibly even no, increase in the number of opened tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果打开的表的数量增加很快,你应该考虑增加table_open_cache的值。试着找到一个打开的表数量增加缓慢,甚至可能不增加的值。

trans-unit.source: If the operation requires the table to be rebuilt, then the operation might have to create temporary tables.
trans-unit.target: 如果操作需要重建表,那么操作可能要创建临时表。

trans-unit.source: If the option is completely invalid, then remove it from the option file.
trans-unit.target: 如果该选项完全无效，则将其从选项文件中删除。

trans-unit.source: If the option is set in an option file and if mysql_install_db is executed, then mysql_install_db will read this option from the option file, and it will automatically set this option.
trans-unit.target: 如果在选项文件中设置了该选项，并且执行了 mysql_install_db ，则 mysql_install_db 将从选项文件中读取该选项，并且它将自动设置该选项。

trans-unit.source: If the option's name has changed, then fix the name.
trans-unit.target: 如果选项的名称发生了变化,那就修正名称。

trans-unit.source: If the option's valid values have changed, then change the option's value to a valid one.
trans-unit.target: 如果选项的有效值发生了变化,则将选项的值改为有效值。

trans-unit.source: If the optional OR REPLACE clause is used, it acts as a shortcut for:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用了可选的 OR REPLACE 子句，则该子句将用作以下操作的快捷方式：

trans-unit.source: If the optional OR REPLACE clause is used, it is basically a shortcut for:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用可选的 OR REPLACE 子句，则它基本上是以下各项的快捷方式：

trans-unit.source: If the original SQL statement has a result set from the foreign data source, the FederatedX storage engine iterates through the result set and converts each row and column to the internal handler format
trans-unit.target: 如果原始SQL语句有一个来自外部数据源的结果集,则FederatedX存储引擎会遍历该结果集,并将每一行和每一列转换为内部处理程序格式。

trans-unit.source: If the original SQL statement only returns the number of rows returned (affected_rows), that number is added to the table stats which results in the user seeing how many rows were affected.
trans-unit.target: 如果原来的SQL语句只返回返回的行数(affected_rows),那么这个数字就会被添加到表统计中,从而导致用户看到有多少行受到影响。

trans-unit.source: If the password is specified using the PASSWORD() or OLD_PASSWORD() function, the literal text of the password should be given. If the password is specified without using either function, the password should be the already-encrypted password value as returned by PASSWORD().
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 PASSWORD() 或 OLD_PASSWORD() 函数指定了密码，则应提供密码的文字文本。如果未使用任何功能指定密码，则密码应为 PASSWORD() 返回的已经加密的密码值。

trans-unit.source: If the path does not exist, Transparent Hugepages are not enabled and you may continue.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径不存在,则不启用透明Hugepages,您可以继续。

trans-unit.source: If the pattern does not occur in the string list or if the string list is an empty string, the function returns 0. If either argument is NULL, the function returns NULL. The function does not return the correct result if the pattern contains a comma (",") character.
trans-unit.target: 如果字符串列表中未出现该模式，或者字符串列表为空字符串，则该函数返回 0 。如果任一参数为 NULL ，则函数返回 NULL 。如果模式包含逗号（“ , ”）字符，则该函数不会返回正确的结果。

trans-unit.source: If the prepared statement contains a syntax error, PREPARE will fail. As a side effect, stored procedures can use it to check if a statement is valid. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果准备好的语句包含语法错误,prepare将失败。作为一个副作用,存储过程可以使用它来检查语句是否有效。例如

trans-unit.source: If the previous statement returned an error, the value of LAST_INSERT_ID() is undefined. For transactional tables, if the statement is rolled back due to an error, the value of LAST_INSERT_ID() is left undefined. For manual ROLLBACK, the value of LAST_INSERT_ID() is not restored to that before the transaction; it remains as it was at the point of the ROLLBACK.
trans-unit.target: 如果前一条语句返回错误，则LAST_INSERT_ID（）的值未定义。对于事务表，如果由于错误而回滚了该语句，则LAST_INSERT_ID（）的值将保持未定义状态。对于手动ROLLBACK，LAST_INSERT_ID（）的值不会恢复为事务之前的值；它保持在ROLLBACK时的状态。

trans-unit.source: If the problem is caused by a simple typo, then fix the typo.
trans-unit.target: 如果问题是由简单的错别字引起的,那就修改错别字。

trans-unit.source: If the query contains a GROUP BY clause, the last group where the limit was reached will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果查询中包含GROUP BY子句,那么最后一个达到限制的组将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: If the query doesn't match Cassandra's schema, they need to run Hive (or Pig), which have some kind of distributed join support. Hive/Pig compile queries to Map/reduce job which are ran across the whole cluster, so they will certainly beat Cassandra Storage Engine which runs on one mysqld node (you can have multiple mysqld nodes of course, but they will not cooperate with one another).
trans-unit.target: 如果查询不符合Cassandra的模式,他们需要运行Hive(或Pig),它们有某种分布式连接支持。Hive/Pig将查询编译成Map/reduce作业,这些作业在整个集群中运行,所以它们肯定会击败运行在一个mysqld节点上的Cassandra存储引擎(当然你可以有多个mysqld节点,但它们不会相互合作)。

trans-unit.source: If the query is for instance "SELECT * FROM foo ", then the primary methods you would see with debug turned on would be first:
trans-unit.target: 如果查询是例如“ SELECT * FROM foo ”，那么打开调试时您会看到的主要方法将是第一个：

trans-unit.source: If the query was "INSERT INTO foo (id, ts) VALUES (2, now()); ", the trace would be:
trans-unit.target: 如果查询为“ INSERT INTO foo (id, ts) VALUES (2, now()); ”，则跟踪将为：

trans-unit.source: If the query was "UPDATE foo SET ts = now() WHERE id = 1; ", the resultant trace would be:
trans-unit.target: 如果查询为“ UPDATE foo SET ts = now() WHERE id = 1; ”，则结果跟踪为：

trans-unit.source: If the realm is not provided in the user account's definition, then the realm is not used for comparison. Therefore, 'usr1@EXAMPLE.COM', 'usr1@EXAMPLE.CO.UK' and 'mymachine\usr1' would all identify as the following user account:
trans-unit.target: 如果用户帐户的定义是不提供的境界，那么境界是不用于比较。因此，“ usr1@EXAMPLE.COM”，“ usr1@EXAMPLE.CO.UK”和“ mymachine \ usr1”将全部标识为以下用户帐户：

trans-unit.source: If the relay logs are taking up too much space on the slave, the relay_log_space_limit system variable can be set to limit the size. The IO thread will stop until the SQL thread has cleared the backlog. By default there is no limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果中继日志在从属服务器上占用太多空间，则可以将relay_log_space_limit系统变量设置为限制大小。IO线程将停止，直到SQL线程清除了积压。默认情况下没有限制。

trans-unit.source: If the result is a single row, SELECT ... INTO @var_name can also be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果是单行，则也可以使用SELECT ... INTO @var_name。

trans-unit.source: If the result set is of reasonable size, it is also possible to specify the block_size option equal or slightly larger than the result set. The whole result set being read on the first fetch, can be accessed many times without having to do anything else.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果集的大小合理,也可以指定block_size选项等于或略大于结果集。整个结果集在第一次获取时被读取,可以多次访问,而不需要做任何其他操作。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is used in a REAL context or all arguments are real-valued, they are compared as reals.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值是在real上下文中使用的,或者所有参数都是实值,则将其作为real进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If the return value is used in an INTEGER context or all arguments are integer-valued, they are compared as integers.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回值在INTEGER上下文中使用,或者所有参数都是整数值,则将其作为整数进行比较。

trans-unit.source: If the routine name is the same as the name of a built-in SQL function, you must use a space between the name and the following parenthesis when defining the routine, or a syntax error occurs. This is also true when you invoke the routine later. For this reason, we suggest that it is better to avoid re-using the names of existing SQL functions for your own stored routines.
trans-unit.target: 如果例程名称与内置SQL函数的名称相同,那么在定义例程时,必须在名称和下面的括号之间使用空格,否则会出现语法错误。以后调用例程时也是如此。出于这个原因,我们建议最好避免在自己的存储例程中重复使用现有SQL函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the same column needs to be referenced more than once in the projection list, a unique name is required for each column using a column alias.The total length of the name of a column, inclusive of length of functions, in the projection list must be 64 characters or less.
trans-unit.target: 如果同一列需要在投影列表中引用一次以上,则需要使用列别名为每一列取一个唯一的名称,投影列表中列名的总长度(包括函数长度)必须小于64个字符。

trans-unit.source: If the script tries to create the repository configuration file and one with that name already exists, then the script will rename the existing file with an extension in the format ".old_[0-9]+", which would make the OS's package manager ignore the file. You can safely remove those files after you have confirmed that the updated repository configuration file works..
trans-unit.target: 如果脚本试图创建版本库配置文件,而这个名字已经存在,那么脚本会将现有的文件重命名为".old_[0-9]+"格式的扩展名,这将使操作系统的包管理器忽略这个文件。你可以在确认更新后的版本库配置文件工作后,安全地删除这些文件。

trans-unit.source: If the search criteria cannot be confined to an INDEX in a single table, this technique is doomed. I have another paper that discusses "Lists", which solves that (which extra development work), and even improves on what is discussed here.
trans-unit.target: 如果搜索标准不能局限在一个表中的INDEX,这种技术就注定要失败。我有另一篇讨论 "列表 "的论文,它解决了这个问题(这是额外的开发工作),甚至改进了这里讨论的内容。

trans-unit.source: If the separator is NULL, the result is NULL; all other NULL values are skipped. This makes CONCAT_WS() suitable when you want to concatenate some values and avoid losing all information if one of them is NULL.
trans-unit.target: 如果分隔符为 NULL ，则结果为 NULL 。跳过所有其他 NULL 值。这使 CONCAT_WS() 适合连接一些值，并避免其中一个为 NULL 时丢失所有信息。

trans-unit.source: If the sequence has not yet been used by the connection, PREVIOUS VALUE FOR returns NULL (same thing applies when the server is restarted, a new connection doesn't see a last value for an existing sequence).
trans-unit.target: 如果连接尚未使用该序列，则 PREVIOUS VALUE FOR 返回 NULL （重新启动服务器时也是如此，新连接看不到现有序列的最后一个值）。

trans-unit.source: If the server crashes, usually the Change Buffer is not empty. However, changes are not lost because they are written to the transaction logs, so they can be applied at server restart.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器崩溃,通常变更缓冲区不是空的。然而,更改不会丢失,因为它们被写入事务日志,所以它们可以在服务器重新启动时应用。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not find the error message file for the language, then it tries to interpret the value of the lc_messages_dir system variable as a direct path to the directory storing the specific language's error message file.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器找不到该语言的错误消息文件，则它将尝试将 lc_messages_dir 系统变量的值解释为指向存储特定语言的错误消息文件的目录的直接路径。

trans-unit.source: If the server does not find the error message file for the language, then it tries to interpret the value of this system variable as a direct path to the directory storing the specific language's error message file.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器找不到该语言的错误消息文件，则它将尝试将该系统变量的值解释为指向存储特定语言的错误消息文件的目录的直接路径。

trans-unit.source: If the server finds that either the server-side or client-side default authentication plugin does not match the actual authentication plugin that should be used for the given user account, then the server restarts the authentication on either the server side or the client side.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器发现服务器端或客户端的默认认证插件与给定用户账号应该使用的实际认证插件不匹配,那么服务器就会重新启动服务器端或客户端的认证。

trans-unit.source: If the server is MariaDB 10.3 or later or if it is running MariaDB 10.2 and the innodb_safe_truncate system variable is set to OFF, then the format will actually be #sql-ib${TABLESPACE_ID}-${RAND}, where ${TABLESPACE_ID} is the table's tablespace ID within InnoDB and ${RAND} is a randomly initialized number. Therefore, the datadir may contain files with file names like #sql-ib230291-1363966925.ibd.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器是MariaDB 10.3或更高版本，或者正在运行MariaDB 10.2，并且 innodb_safe_truncate 系统变量设置为 OFF ，则格式实际上是 #sql-ib${TABLESPACE_ID}-${RAND} ，其中 ${TABLESPACE_ID} 是InnoDB中表的表空间ID， ${RAND} 是随机初始化的数字。因此， datadir 可能包含文件名，例如 #sql-ib230291-1363966925.ibd 的文件。

trans-unit.source: If the server is a replication slave, then this option causes Mariabackup to print the hostname of the slave's replication master and the binary log file and position of the slave's SQL thread to stdout.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器是复制从属服务器，则此选项使Mariabackup将从属服务器的复制主服务器的主机名以及二进制日志文件和从属计算机的SQL线程的位置打印到 stdout 。

trans-unit.source: If the server is configured to automatically re-encrypt table data with the newer version of the encryption key after the key is rotated, then that prevents an encryption key from being used for long periods of time.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器被配置为在密钥轮换后自动用较新版本的加密密钥重新加密表数据,那么就可以防止加密密钥被长时间使用。

trans-unit.source: If the server is configured to simultaneously encrypt table data with multiple versions of the encryption key after the key is rotated, then that prevents all data from being leaked if a single encryption key version is compromised.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器被配置成在密钥旋转后同时用多个版本的加密密钥对表数据进行加密,那么就可以防止在单个加密密钥版本被泄露的情况下,所有数据被泄露。

trans-unit.source: If the server is restarted at this point, then the AUTO_INCREMENT counter will revert to 101, which is the persistent value set as part of the failed INSERT IGNORE.
trans-unit.target: 如果此时重新启动服务器，则AUTO_INCREMENT计数器将恢复为 101 ，这是作为失败的INSERT IGNORE的一部分设置的持久值。

trans-unit.source: If the server is running MariaDB 10.1 or before or if it is running MariaDB 10.2 and the innodb_safe_truncate system variable is set to ON, then the renamed table will have a temporary table name in the format #sql-ib${TABLESPACE_ID}, where ${TABLESPACE_ID} is the table's tablespace ID within InnoDB. Therefore, the datadir may contain files with file names like #sql-ib230291.ibd.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器运行的是MariaDB 10.1或 innodb_safe_truncate ，或者服务器运行的是MariaDB 10.2，并且innodb_safe_truncate系统变量设置为 ON ，则重命名的表将具有格式为 #sql-ib${TABLESPACE_ID} 的临时表名，其中 ${TABLESPACE_ID} 是InnoDB中表的表空间ID。因此，数据 datadir 可能包含文件名，例如 #sql-ib230291.ibd 。

trans-unit.source: If the server is running, make sure you run a FLUSH TABLES statement first.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器正在运行，请确保首先运行FLUSH TABLES语句。

trans-unit.source: If the server variable log_warnings > 1 then you will get some information in the log about how the multi-master-info file is updated (mainly for debugging).
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器变量 log_warnings > 1，那么您将在日志中获得一些有关如何更新multi-master-info文件的信息（主要用于调试）。

trans-unit.source: If the server was started with the --skip-show-database option, you cannot use this statement at all unless you have the SHOW DATABASES privilege.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器是通过 --skip-show-database 选项启动的，则除非拥有 SHOW DATABASES privilege 否则您将根本无法使用此语句。

trans-unit.source: If the server's handshake packet contains a 20-byte scramble, then the client will default to the mysql_native_password authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器的握手数据包包含20字节的加扰，则客户端将默认使用 mysql_native_password 身份验证插件。

trans-unit.source: If the server's handshake packet contains a 9-byte scramble, then the client will default to the mysql_old_password authentication plugin.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器的握手数据包包含9字节的加扰，则客户端将默认使用 mysql_old_password 身份验证插件。

trans-unit.source: If the size of `Staging` changes depending on the busy versus idle times of the day, this pair of SQL statements has another comforting feature. The more rows in `Staging`, the more efficient the SQL runs, thereby helping compensate for the "busy" times.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Staging`的大小根据一天中繁忙与空闲时间的不同而变化,这对SQL语句还有一个令人欣慰的特点。`Staging`中的行数越多,SQL的运行效率越高,从而有助于补偿 "繁忙 "时间。

trans-unit.source: If the size of the temporary table is less than the tmp_table_size system variable, the table is a hash-indexed in-memory HEAP table. In the rare cases when the subquery result exceeds this limit, the temporary table is stored on disk in an ARIA or MyISAM B-tree indexed table (ARIA is the default).
trans-unit.target: 如果临时表的大小小于tmp_table_size系统变量,则该表是一个哈希索引的内存HEAP表。在极少数情况下,当子查询结果超过这个限制时,临时表会被存储在磁盘上的ARIA或MyISAM B树索引表中(ARIA是默认的)。

trans-unit.source: If the slave has the log_slave_updates system variable enabled and if the slave has the binary log enabled, then every write by the slave's SQL thread will also go into the slave's binary log. This means that GTIDs of replicated transactions would be reflected in the value of the gtid_binlog_pos system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果从属 log_slave_updates 启用了log_slave_updates系统变量，并且从属服务器启用了二进制日志，那么从属服务器的SQL线程的每次写操作也将进入从属服务器的二进制日志中。这意味着复制事务的GTID将反映在 gtid_binlog_pos 系统变量的值中。

trans-unit.source: If the slave has the log_slave_updates system variable enabled and if the slave has the binary log enabled, then every write by the slave's SQL thread will also go into the slave's binary log. This means that GTIDs of replicated transactions would be reflected in the value of the gtid_binlog_pos system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果从属 log_slave_updates 启用了log_slave_updates系统变量，并且从属服务器启用了二进制日志，那么从属服务器的SQL线程的每次写操作也将进入从属服务器的二进制日志中。这意味着复制事务的GTID将反映在 gtid_binlog_pos 系统变量的值中。

trans-unit.source: If the slave is replicating binary log events that contain GTIDs, then the slave's SQL thread will write every GTID that it applies to the mysql.gtid_slave_pos table. This GTID can be inspected and modified through the gtid_slave_pos system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果从被复制的二进制日志包含事件GTIDs，那么奴隶的SQL线程会写每GTID，它适用于 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表。可以通过 gtid_slave_pos 系统变量来检查和修改此GTID 。

trans-unit.source: If the slave is replicating binary log events that contain GTIDs, then the slave's SQL thread will write every GTID that it applies to the mysql.gtid_slave_pos table. This GTID can be inspected and modified through the gtid_slave_pos system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果从被复制的二进制日志包含事件GTIDs，那么奴隶的SQL线程会写每GTID，它适用于 mysql.gtid_slave_pos 表。可以通过 gtid_slave_pos 系统变量来检查和修改此GTID 。

trans-unit.source: If the slave is replicating normally, then the next step would be to start the MariaDB Server process on the other nodes in the second cluster.
trans-unit.target: 如果从属服务器正常复制，那么下一步将是在第二个集群中的其他节点上启动MariaDB Server进程。

trans-unit.source: If the slave tries to connect starting at a GTID that is missing in the master's binlog, this is an error in GTID strict mode even if a GTID exists with a higher sequence number (this indicates a GTID on the slave missing on the master). Note that this error is controlled by the setting of GTID strict mode on the connecting slave server.
trans-unit.target: 如果从站试图从主站 binlog 中缺少的 GTID 开始连接,即使存在具有较高序列号的 GTID,这也是 GTID 严格模式下的错误(这表明从站上的 GTID 在主站上缺失)。请注意,该错误由连接的从站服务器上的GTID严格模式的设置所控制。

trans-unit.source: If the source database server is a replication slave of the desired replication master, then we should add the --slave-info option, and possibly the --safe-slave-backup option. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果源数据库服务器是所需复制主服务器的复制从属服务器，则应添加 --slave-info 选项，并可能添加 --safe-slave-backup 选项。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the specific authentication plugin uses the authentication_string column, then this value for the account can be specified after a USING or AS keyword. trans-unit.source: If the specified statement has not been PREPAREd, an error similar to the following will be produced:
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的语句没有被PREPAREd,将产生类似于下面的错误。

trans-unit.source: If the stopword list is changed, any existing full-text indexes need to be rebuilt
trans-unit.target: 如果更改了停止词列表,则需要重建任何现有的全文索引。

trans-unit.source: If the syntax for a given SHOW statement includes a LIKE 'pattern' part, 'pattern' is a string that can contain the SQL "%" and "_" wildcard characters. The pattern is useful for restricting statement output to matching values.
trans-unit.target: 如果给定 SHOW 语句的语法包括 LIKE 'pattern' 部分，则 'pattern' 是可以包含SQL“ % ”和“ _ ”通配符的字符串。该模式对于将语句输出限制为匹配值很有用。

trans-unit.source: If the system ever gets into DBRM Read-Only Mode, its best resolved by do a restart system form the 'pm1' module:
trans-unit.target: 如果系统进入DBRM只读模式,最好通过 "pm1 "模块重新启动系统来解决。

trans-unit.source: If the system is unable to generate sequence numbers because that will not fit into the destination datatype (e.g. if the autoincrement column is a TINYINT datatype and you attempt to insert more than about 127 rows), the statement or job will fail. At this point you must either reset the autoincrement settings or drop the autoincrement column and add a new autoincrement column with a wider datatype.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统无法生成序列号,因为那将不适合目标数据类型(例如,如果自动增量列是TINYINT数据类型,而你试图插入超过约127行),则语句或作业将失败。此时,你必须重新设置自动增量,或者放弃自动增量列,并添加一个新的具有更宽数据类型的自动增量列。

trans-unit.source: If the table already exists, an error similar to the following will be returned:
trans-unit.target: 如果该表已经存在,将返回一个类似于以下的错误。

trans-unit.source: If the table contains a hidden FTS_DOC_ID column due to a FULLTEXT INDEX, then instant ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN will not be possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于FULLTEXT INDEX该表包含一个隐藏的 FTS_DOC_ID 列，那么将无法使用即时 ALTER TABLE ... ADD COLUMN 。

trans-unit.source: If the table has an AUTO_INCREMENT primary key and the statement inserts or updates a row, the LAST_INSERT_ID() function returns its AUTO_INCREMENT value.
trans-unit.target: 如果表具有 AUTO_INCREMENT 主键，并且该语句插入或更新了一行，则 LAST_INSERT_ID() 函数将返回其AUTO_INCREMENT值。

trans-unit.source: If the table is a sequence, then it will have the SEQUENCE set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果该表是一个序列，则它将 SEQUENCE 设置为 1 。

trans-unit.source: If the table is already using the DYNAMIC row format, then another potential solution to this problem is to change the table schema, so that the row format can store more columns on overflow pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果表已在使用 DYNAMIC 行格式，则此问题的另一种可能的解决方案是更改表架构，以便该行格式可以在溢出页面上存储更多列。

trans-unit.source: If the table is created on several zip files, it is specified as for all other multiple tables:
trans-unit.target: 如果表是在多个压缩文件上创建的,则与其他所有多表一样指定。

trans-unit.source: If the table is in a file-per-table tablespace, and if innodb_encrypt_tables is set to ON or FORCE, and if innodb_encryption_threads is set to a value greater than 0, then you can also set the specific encryption key for the table by using the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果该表位于每个文件的文件表空间中，并且 innodb_encrypt_tables 设置为 ON 或 FORCE ，并且 innodb_encryption_threads 设置为大于 0 的值，则还可以使用以下命令为该表设置特定的加密密钥： ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项。例如：

trans-unit.source: If the table is made from several files such as emp01.csv, emp02.csv, etc., the standard create table would be:
trans-unit.target: 如果表是由emp01.csv、emp02.csv等多个文件组成的,标准的创建表是:。

trans-unit.source: If the table is using either the REDUNDANT or the COMPACT row format, then one potential solution to this problem is to convert the table to use the DYNAMIC row format instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果表使用 REDUNDANT 或 COMPACT 行格式，则此问题的一种可能解决方案是将表转换为使用 DYNAMIC 行格式。

trans-unit.source: If the table name pattern for a filter is just specified as %, then all tables in the database will be matched. In this case, the filter will also affect certain database-level statements, such as CREATE DATABASE, ALTER DATABASE and DROP DATABASE.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅将过滤器的表名模式指定为 % ，则将匹配数据库中的所有表。在这种情况下，过滤器还将影响某些数据库级别的语句，例如 CREATE DATABASE ， ALTER DATABASE 和DROP DATABASE .

trans-unit.source: If the table was initially void, further inserts will populate it according to the partition function. However, if the files did exist and contained data, this is your responsibility to determine what partition function actually matches the data distribution in them. This means in particular that partitioning by key or by hash cannot be used (except in exceptional cases) because you have almost no control over what the used algorithm does.
trans-unit.target: 如果表最初是空的,进一步的插入将根据分区函数填充它。然而,如果文件确实存在并包含数据,这是你的责任,以确定什么分区函数实际上符合其中的数据分布。这特别意味着不能使用按键或按哈希的分区(除非在特殊情况下),因为你几乎无法控制所使用的算法做什么。

trans-unit.source: If the table were using the REDUNDANT or COMPACT row formats, then the error or warning would be the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果表使用的是 REDUNDANT 或 COMPACT 行格式，则错误或警告如下：

trans-unit.source: If the thread group already has active worker threads, then the following condition also needs to be met:
trans-unit.target: 如果线程组已经具有活动的工作线程，则还需要满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: If the time zone tables in the mysql database were loaded, then a named time zone, such as America/New_York, Africa/Johannesburg, or Europe/Helsinki, is also permissible. See mysql Time Zone Tables below for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果已加载 mysql 数据库中的时区表，则也可以使用命名时区，例如 America/New_York ， Africa/Johannesburg 或 Europe/Helsinki 。有关更多信息，请参见下面的mysql时区表。

trans-unit.source: If the trigger only reads from the other table, that table will be read locked. If the trigger writes to the other table, it will be write locked. If a table is read-locked for reading via LOCK TABLES, but needs to be write-locked because it could be modified by a trigger, a write lock is taken.
trans-unit.target: 如果触发器仅从另一个表读取，则该表将被锁定读取。如果触发器写入另一个表，它将被写锁定。如果通过 LOCK TABLES 将表读锁定以进行读取，但是由于可以通过触发器进行修改而需要对其进行写锁定，则会采用写锁定。

trans-unit.source: If the user account already exists and if you provide the IDENTIFIED BY clause, then the user's password will be changed. You must have the privileges needed for the SET PASSWORD statement to change a user's password with GRANT.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户帐户已经存在，并且提供 IDENTIFIED BY 子句，则将更改用户密码。您必须具有 SET PASSWORD 语句所需的特权，才能使用 GRANT 更改用户密码。

trans-unit.source: If the user neither has privilege to the routine nor the SELECT privilege on mysql.proc table, it raises Error 1305, informing them that the procedure does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户既没有对该例程的特权，也没有对 mysql.proc 表的 SELECT 特权，则会引发错误1305，通知他们该过程不存在。

trans-unit.source: If the user skips a BACKUP STAGE, then all intermediate backup stages will automatically be run. This will allow us to add new stages within the BACKUP STAGE hierarchy in the future with even more precise locks without causing problems for tools using an earlier version of the BACKUP STAGE implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户跳过 BACKUP STAGE ，则所有中间备份阶段将自动运行。这将使我们将来可以使用更精确的锁定在 BACKUP STAGE 层次结构中添加新阶段，而不会导致使用较早版本的 BACKUP STAGE 实现的工具出现问题。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies COPY, then InnoDB uses the COPY algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户指定 COPY ，则InnoDB使用 COPY 算法。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies DEFAULT, then InnoDB uses its default choice for the operation. The default choice is to use the most efficient algorithm supported by the operation. The default choice will also be used if no algorithm is specified. Therefore, if you want InnoDB to use the most efficient algorithm supported by an operation, then you usually do not have to explicitly specify any algorithm at all.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户指定 DEFAULT ，则InnoDB使用其默认选项进行操作。默认选择是使用操作支持的最高效算法。如果未指定算法，还将使用默认选项。因此，如果您希望InnoDB使用某个操作支持的最高效的算法，则通常根本不必显式指定任何算法。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies any other algorithm, then InnoDB interprets that choice as the least efficient algorithm that the user is willing to accept. This means that if the user specifies INPLACE, then InnoDB will use the most efficient algorithm supported by the specific operation from the set (INPLACE, NOCOPY, INSTANT). Likewise, if the user specifies NOCOPY, then InnoDB will use the most efficient algorithm supported by the specific operation from the set (NOCOPY, INSTANT).
trans-unit.target: 如果用户指定任何其他算法，则InnoDB会将该选择解释为用户愿意接受的效率最低的算法。这意味着如果用户指定 INPLACE ，则InnoDB将使用集合中特定操作（ INPLACE ， NOCOPY ， INSTANT ）支持的最高效算法。同样，如果用户指定 NOCOPY ，则InnoDB将使用集合中特定操作（ NOCOPY ， INSTANT ）支持的最高效算法。

trans-unit.source: If the user wants to run huge joins that touch a big fraction of table's data, for example:
trans-unit.target: 如果用户想要运行巨大的联接,触及到很大一部分表的数据,例如。

trans-unit.source: If the value is DISABLED, then the server supports TLS, but TLS is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值是 DISABLED ，则服务器支持TLS，但TLS 无法启用。

trans-unit.source: If the value is NO, then the server was not compiled with TLS support, so TLS cannot be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 NO ，则服务器未使用TLS支持进行编译，因此无法启用TLS。

trans-unit.source: If the value is YES, then the server supports TLS, and TLS is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 YES ，则服务器支持TLS，并且启用TLS。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set to 8 no block-based algorithm can be used for a join operation. The values from 1 to 8 correspond to the following variants of block-based join algorithms :
trans-unit.target: 如果将值设置为8,则连接操作中不能使用基于块的算法。从1到8的值对应于以下基于块的连接算法的变体。

trans-unit.source: If the value of join_cache_level is set to N, any of block-based algorithms with the level greater than N is disallowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果join_cache_level的值设置为N，则不允许使用级别大于N的任何基于块的算法。

trans-unit.source: If the value of plugin_dir is a relative path name, it is taken to be relative to the MySQL base directory (the value of the basedir system variable).
trans-unit.target: 如果 plugin_dir 的值是相对路径名，则将其视为相对于MySQL基本目录（ basedir 系统变量的值）。

trans-unit.source: If the value of plugin_dir is a relative path name, it is taken to be relative to the MySQL base directory (the value of the basedir system variable).
trans-unit.target: 如果 plugin_dir 的值是相对路径名，则将其视为相对于MySQL基本目录（basedir系统变量的值）。

trans-unit.source: If the variable has a session value, not specifying either GLOBAL or SESSION will be the same as specifying SESSION. If the variable only has a global value, not specifying GLOBAL or SESSION will apply to the change to the global value.
trans-unit.target: 如果变量有一个会话值,不指定GLOBAL或SESSION将与指定SESSION相同。如果变量只有一个全局值,不指定GLOBAL或SESSION将适用于全局值的变化。

trans-unit.source: If the wait completes without a timeout, 0 is returned. Passing NULL for the gtid-list makes the function return NULL immediately, without waiting.
trans-unit.target: 如果等待结束后没有超时,则返回0。gtid-list的值为NULL,则函数立即返回NULL,无需等待。

trans-unit.source: If there are DELETE or INSERT triggers, it works as following: any matched row is deleted, and then one or two rows are inserted. If the record is deleted completely, nothing is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果有 DELETE 或 INSERT 触发器，则其工作方式如下：删除任何匹配的行，然后插入一或两行。如果记录被完全删除，则不会插入任何内容。

trans-unit.source: If there are big gaps in `id` values (and there will after the first purge), then
trans-unit.target: 如果`id`值有很大的差距(第一次清理后会有差距),那么。

trans-unit.source: If there are foreign keys, ON DELETE action will be activated by REPLACE.
trans-unit.target: 如果有外键，则 REPLACE 将激活 ON DELETE 操作。

trans-unit.source: If there are millions of rows in the table, this statement may take minutes, maybe hours.
trans-unit.target: 如果表中有几百万行,这条语句可能需要几分钟,可能需要几个小时。

trans-unit.source: If there are more closed parentheses than open parentheses, the error usually looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果封闭的小括号比开放的小括号多,错误通常是这样的。

trans-unit.source: If there are more open parentheses than closed parentheses, the error usually looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果打开的小括号比关闭的小括号多,错误通常看起来像这样。

trans-unit.source: If there are more parts to the WHERE clause, you must stop now.
trans-unit.target: 如果WHERE子句还有更多的部分,你必须马上停止。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple columns in the ORDER BY, and there is a mixture of ASC and DESC, do not add the ORDER BY columns; they won't help; stop.
trans-unit.target: 如果ORDER BY中有多列,而且ASC和DESC混合,就不要添加ORDER BY列,它们没有用,停止。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple topics for each article, you need a many-to-many table.
trans-unit.target: 如果每篇文章有多个主题,就需要一个多对多表。

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple triggers for the same action, then the triggers are shown in action order.
trans-unit.target: 如果同一动作有多个触发器,则按动作顺序显示触发器。

trans-unit.source: If there are no errors, MaxScale-1 is now running as a replication slave to Server-1.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有错误，则 MaxScale-1 现在作为 Server-1 的复制从属运行。

trans-unit.source: If there are some differences between the input file and table definition then the colxml utility can be utilized to handle these cases:
trans-unit.target: 如果输入文件和表定义之间存在一些差异,那么可以利用colxml工具来处理这些情况。

trans-unit.source: If there is a my.cnf file in the MariaDB data directory, but not in the MariaDB base directory, MYSQL_HOME is set to the MariaDB data directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB数据目录中有 my.cnf 文件，但MariaDB基本目录中没有my.cnf文件， MYSQL_HOME 设置为MariaDB数据目录。

trans-unit.source: If there is a GROUP BY, all the columns of the GROUP BY should now be added, in the specified order, to the INDEX you are building. (I do not know what happens if one of the columns is already in the INDEX.)
trans-unit.target: 如果有GROUP BY,那么GROUP BY的所有列现在应该按照指定的顺序添加到你正在建立的INDEX中。我不知道如果其中一列已经在INDEX中,会发生什么情况)。

trans-unit.source: If there is a JOIN or GROUP BY or ORDER BY LIMIT in the subquery, that complicates the JOIN in new format. So, it might be better to use this pattern:
trans-unit.target: 如果子查询中存在JOIN或GROUP BY或ORDER BY LIMIT,就会使JOIN以新的格式复杂化。所以,使用这种模式可能会更好。

trans-unit.source: If there is a ORDER BY, all the columns of the ORDER BY should now be added, in the specified order, to the INDEX you are building.
trans-unit.target: 如果有ORDER BY,那么现在应该按照指定的顺序将ORDER BY的所有列添加到你正在建立的INDEX中。

trans-unit.source: If there is a bug in the Aria recovery code or in the code that generates the logs, or if the logs become corrupted, then mysqld may fail to start because Aria can't execute the logs at start up.
trans-unit.target: 如果Aria的恢复代码或者生成日志的代码有错误,或者日志损坏,那么mysqld可能会因为Aria在启动时无法执行日志而无法启动。

trans-unit.source: If there is a root user password in the MariaDB server Database, remember to setup the Password Configuration file on each User Module and Performance Module that has User Modules functionality.
trans-unit.target: 如果MariaDB服务器数据库中有根用户密码,记得在每个具有用户模块功能的用户模块和性能模块上设置密码配置文件。

trans-unit.source: If there is already an existing slave running using old-style binlog filename/offset position, then this can be changed to use GTID directly. This can be useful for upgrades for example, or where there are already tools to setup new slaves using old-style binlog positions.
trans-unit.target: 如果已经有一个使用旧式binlog文件名/偏移位置的现有从机在运行,那么可以将其改为直接使用GTID。这对于升级来说是很有用的,比如说,或者已经有工具来设置使用旧式binlog位置的新从机。

trans-unit.source: If there is an AUTO_INCREMENT field, a new value will be generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一个 AUTO_INCREMENT 字段，将生成一个新值。

trans-unit.source: If there is no x_init() function, or it has been called and did not return an error, x() is then called once per row.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有x_init（）函数，或者它已被调用且未返回错误，则每行调用一次x（）。

trans-unit.source: If there is no PARTITION BY clause, all rows of the result set define the group.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有partition by子句,结果集的所有行都定义了组。

trans-unit.source: If there is no current role, NULL is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有当前角色,则返回NULL。

trans-unit.source: If there is no existing key, the statement runs as a regular INSERT:
trans-unit.target: 如果没有现存的键,该语句就像普通的INSERT一样运行。

trans-unit.source: If there is no match for the search string, the search fails. Use HELP contents to see a list of the help categories:
trans-unit.target: 如果搜索字符串不匹配，则搜索失败。使用 HELP contents 查看帮助类别的列表：

trans-unit.source: If there is only one nameless master, or the default master (as specified by the default_master_connection system variable) is intended, connection_name can be omitted. If provided, the RESET SLAVE statement will apply to the specified master. connection_name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有一个无名主机，或者要使用默认主机（由default_master_connection系统变量指定），则可以省略 connection_name 。如果提供，则 RESET SLAVE 语句将应用于指定的主服务器。 connection_name 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If there is only one nameless master, or the default master (as specified by the default_master_connection system variable) is intended, connection_name can be omitted. If provided, the SHOW RELAYLOG statement will apply to the specified master. connection_name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有一个无名主机，或者要使用默认主机（由 default_master_connection 系统变量指定），则可以省略 connection_name 。如果提供，那么 SHOW RELAYLOG 语句将应用于指定的主服务器。 connection_name 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If there is only one nameless master, or the default master (as specified by the default_master_connection system variable) is intended, connection_name can be omitted. If provided, the START SLAVE statement will apply to the specified master. connection_name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有一个无名主机，或者要使用默认主机（由 default_master_connection 系统变量指定），则可以省略 connection_name 。如果提供， START SLAVE 语句将应用于指定的主服务器。 connection_name 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If there is only one nameless master, or the default master (as specified by the default_master_connection system variable) is intended, connection_name can be omitted. If provided, the STOP SLAVE statement will apply to the specified master. connection_name is case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有一个无名主机，或者要使用默认主机（由 default_master_connection 系统变量指定），则可以省略 connection_name 。如果提供，则 STOP SLAVE 语句将应用于指定的主服务器。 connection_name 不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: If there's an existing service listening on port 3306, the installer will create /usr/local/mariadb/etc/my.cnf with skip-networking. You can edit this file to set an alternate port for MariaDB Server to listen on, or you can remove skip-networking if you have disabled the daemon that had bound port 3306.
trans-unit.target: 如果端口3306上已有服务在监听，则安装程序将使用 skip-networking 创建/usr/local/mariadb/etc/my.cnf 。您可以编辑此文件以设置供MariaDB Server侦听的备用端口，或者如果禁用了绑定了端口3306的守护程序，则可以删除 skip-networking 。

trans-unit.source: If these are not available, you will need to build Galera from source, as follows:
trans-unit.target: 如果这些都没有,你将需要从源头开始构建Galera,如下所示。

trans-unit.source: If they don't, the type and length of the columns in the result take into account the values returned by all of the SELECTs, so there is no need for explicit casting. Note that currently this is not the case for recursive CTEs - see MDEV-12325.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，则结果中列的类型和长度将考虑所有SELECTs返回的值，因此不需要显式强制转换。请注意，当前递归CTE并非如此-请参阅MDEV-12325。

trans-unit.source: If they match, the distribution can be correct although this does not prove it. However, if they do not match, the distribution is surely wrong.

trans-unit.source: If this checkbox is selected, the default storage engine is set to Innodb (or XtraDB) and the sql_mode parameter is set to "NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES". trans-unit.source: If this system variable is set, then the Aria storage engine will not lock a table when it decrements the table's in-file counter that keeps track of how many connections currently have the table open. See MDEV-19393 for more information.

trans-unit.source: If this system variable is set, then the MyISAM storage engine will not use file-based locks. Otherwise, it will use the fcntl() function with the F_SETLK option to get file-based locks on Unix, and it will use the LockFileEx() function to get file-based locks on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了此系统变量，则MyISAM存储引擎将不使用基于文件的锁。否则，它将使用带有 F_SETLK 选项的 fcntl() 函数来在Unix上获取基于文件的锁，并且它将使用 LockFileEx() 函数来在Windows上获取基于文件的锁。

trans-unit.source: If this system variable's value is not prefixed with FILE:, then it is interpreted as the plain-text encryption password. However, this is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 如果此系统变量的值没有前缀 FILE: ,那么它将被解释为纯文本加密密码。但是，不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: If using MariaDB 10.1 or earlier, and your applications often connect and disconnect to MariaDB, you should set up thread-cache-size to the number of concurrent queries threads you are typically running. This is important in MariaDB as we are using the jemalloc memory allocator. jemalloc usually has better performance when running many threads compared to other memory allocators, except if you create and destroy a lot of threads, in which case it will spend a lot of resources trying to manage thread specific storage. Having a thread cache will fix this problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用MariaDB 10.1或更早版本，并且您的应用程序经常连接和断开与MariaDB的连接，则应将 thread-cache-size 设置为通常运行的并发查询线程数。这在MariaDB中很重要，因为我们正在使用jemalloc内存分配器。与运行其他内存分配器相比，jemalloc在运行多个线程时通常具有更好的性能，除非您创建并销毁了很多线程，在这种情况下，它将花费大量资源尝试管理特定于线程的存储。具有线程缓存将解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: If we have a query with a join of three tables t1, t2, t3 such that table t1 is joined with table t2 and the result of this join operation is joined with table t3 then two join buffers can be used to execute the query. The first join buffer B1 is used to store the records comprising interesting fields of table t1, while the second join buffer B2 contains the records with fields from the partial join of t1 and t2. The interesting fields of any record r1 from B1 are copied into B2 for any record record r1,r2 from the partial join of t1 and t2. One could suggest storing in B2 just a pointer to the position of the r1 fields in B1 together with the interesting fields from t2. So for any record r2 matching the record r1 the buffer B2 would contain a reference to the fields of r1 in B1 and the fields of r2. In this case the buffer B2 is called incremental. Incremental buffers allow to avoid copying field values from one buffer into another. They also allow to save a significant amount of buffer space if for a record from t1 several matches from t2 are expected.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们有一个对三个表t1、t2、t3进行连接的查询,这样表t1与表t2连接,并且这个连接操作的结果与表t3连接,那么可以使用两个连接缓冲区来执行查询。第一个连接缓冲区B1用于存储由表t1的有趣字段组成的记录,而第二个连接缓冲区B2则包含来自t1和t2的部分连接的字段记录。对于来自t1和t2部分连接的任何记录r1,r2,B1中任何记录的有趣字段都会被复制到B2中。我们可以建议在B2中只存储一个指向B1中r1字段位置的指针,以及来自t2的有趣字段。所以对于任何与r1匹配的记录r2,缓冲区B2将包含对B1中r1字段和r2字段的引用。在这种情况下,缓冲区B2被称为增量缓冲区。增量缓冲区允许避免将字段值从一个缓冲区复制到另一个缓冲区。如果一条来自t1的记录预期会有几个来自t2的匹配,那么增量缓冲区还可以节省大量的缓冲区空间。

trans-unit.source: If we try to connect to the MariaDB server on localhost, the client will bypass networking and attempt to connect to the server using a socket file in the local filesystem. However, this doesn't work when MariaDB is running inside a container because the server's filesystem is isolated from the host. The client can't access the socket file which is inside the container, so it fails to connect.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们尝试连接到 localhost 上的MariaDB服务器，则客户端将绕过网络连接，并尝试使用本地文件系统中的套接字文件连接到服务器。但是，当MariaDB在容器内运行时，这将不起作用，因为服务器的文件系统与主机隔离。客户端无法访问容器内的套接字文件，因此无法连接。

trans-unit.source: If you added the apt repository by using the add-apt-repository command, then you can update the major release that the repository uses by using the the add-apt-repository command again.
trans-unit.target: 如果添加了 apt 使用的存储库 add-apt-repository 命令，那么您可以更新主要版本，通过使用该信息库使用 add-apt-repository 再次命令。

trans-unit.source: If you already have an AWS account, you can skip this section.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经有一个AWS账户,你可以跳过本节。

trans-unit.source: If you also want to allow authentication from local Unix users, the pam_unix PAM module adds some additional configuration steps on a lot of systems. We basically have to give the user that runs mysqld access to /etc/shadow.
trans-unit.target: 如果您还希望允许来自本地Unix用户的身份验证，则 pam_unix PAM模块会在许多系统上添加一些其他配置步骤。基本上，我们必须给运行 mysqld 的用户访问 /etc/shadow 的权限。

trans-unit.target: 如果您还想更改排序规则，则必须使用 COLLATE 运算符：

trans-unit.source: If you also want to remove config files, remove /usr/local/mariadb/etc/
trans-unit.target: 如果您还想删除配置文件，请删除 /usr/local/mariadb/etc/

trans-unit.source: If you are 100% sure this applies to you, you can just run mysql_upgrade with the ---upgrade-system-tables option.
trans-unit.target: 如果您100％确定适用于您，则可以使用 ---upgrade-system-tables 选项运行 mysql_upgrade 。

trans-unit.source: If you are GROUPing BY an expression (including function calls), you cannot use the GROUP BY; stop.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在对一个表达式进行GROUPING BY(包括函数调用),你不能使用GROUP BY;停止。

trans-unit.source: If you are ORDERing BY an expression (including function calls), you cannot use the ORDER BY; stop.
trans-unit.target: 如果对表达式进行ORDER BY(包括函数调用),不能使用ORDER BY;停止。

trans-unit.source: If you are a super user running a log batch job that you don't want to have logged (for example mysqldump), do:
trans-unit.target: 如果你是一个超级用户,正在运行一个你不希望被记录的日志批处理作业(例如mysqldump),请这样做。

trans-unit.source: If you are already logged in as 'guest' you will need to log out and back in again for this change to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经以 "访客 "身份登录,您需要先退出,然后再重新登录,才能使这一更改生效。

trans-unit.source: If you are already logged in as 'mysql' you will need to log out and back in again for this change to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经以'mysql'的身份登录,你将需要注销,然后再重新登录,这个改变才会生效。

trans-unit.source: If you are already logged in as 'mysql' you will need to logout, then login for this change to take effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已经以'mysql'的身份登录,你将需要注销,然后登录,这个更改才会生效。

trans-unit.source: If you are already using MariaDB 10.1 on your Debian 8 "Jessie" machine, you can choose to continue to use the MariaDB repositories or move to using the Debian repositories as with MariaDB 5.5 and 10.0. In either case, the upgrade will at most be just a minor upgrade from one version of MariaDB 10.1 to a newer version. In the case that you are already on the current version of MariaDB that exists in the Debian repositories or a newer one) MariaDB will not be upgraded during the system upgrade but will be upgraded when future versions of MariaDB are released.
trans-unit.target: 如果您已经在Debian 8“ Jessie”机器上使用过MariaDB 10.1，则可以选择继续使用MariaDB存储库，或者像MariaDB 5.5和10.0 一样继续使用Debian存储库。无论哪种情况，升级最多只是从MariaDB 10.1的一个版本到较新版本的较小升级。如果您已经在Debian存储库中的当前版本或更新的版本中使用MariaDB，则MariaDB将不会在系统升级期间进行升级，而会在将来的MariaDB版本发布时进行升级。

trans-unit.source: If you are building a Galera cluster by starting with one node as a Slave to an existing non-Galera system, and if you have multi-row INSERTs that depend on AUTO_INCREMENTs, the read this Percona blog
trans-unit.target: 如果你是通过将一个节点作为现有非Galera系统的Slave开始构建Galera集群,如果你有依赖于AUTO_INCREMENTs的多行INSERT,请阅读Percona的博客。

trans-unit.source: If you are building a large table then for best performance add the index after the table is populated with data. This is to increase the insert performance and remove the index overhead during inserts.
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在构建一个大表,那么为了获得最佳性能,在表被数据填充后添加索引。这是为了提高插入性能,消除插入过程中的索引开销。

trans-unit.source: If you are calling mysql-test-run.pl directly, you do not need to specify a timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果你直接调用mysql-test-run.pl,你不需要指定超时。

trans-unit.source: If you are comparing DOUBLEs or FLOATs with numeric decimals, it is not safe to use the equality operator.
trans-unit.target: 如果将DOUBLE或FLOAT与数字十进制数进行比较，则不安全使用相等运算符。

trans-unit.source: If you are concerned about these bugs, and you want to perform an operation that supports the INSTANT algorithm, but you want to avoid using that algorithm, then you can set the algorithm to INPLACE and add the FORCE keyword to the ALTER TABLE statement:
trans-unit.target: 如果您担心这些错误，并且想要执行支持 INSTANT 算法的操作，但又不想使用该算法，则可以将算法设置为 INPLACE ，并将 FORCE 关键字添加到 ALTER TABLE 语句中：

trans-unit.source: If you are connecting from a lot of different machines you should increase host_cache_size to the max number of machines (default 128) to cache the resolving of hostnames. If you don't connect from a lot of machines, you can set this to a very low value!
trans-unit.target: 如果从许多不同的计算机连接，则应将host_cache_size增加到最大计算机数（默认为128），以缓存主机名的解析。如果您没有从很多计算机连接，则可以将其设置为非常低的值！

trans-unit.source: If you are currently running MySQL 5.5 on Debian 8 "Jessie" and are planning an upgrade to MariaDB 10.1 on Debian 9 "Stretch", there are some things to keep in mind:
trans-unit.target: 如果您当前在Debian 8“ Jessie”上运行MySQL 5.5，并计划在Debian 9“ Stretch”上升级到MariaDB 10.1，请牢记以下几点：

trans-unit.source: If you are doing a Amazon Multi-Node install and you want the ColumnStore processes to utilize the Amazon API Tool, you will need to either Provide an IAM role that has the Certifications Keys associated with it or you can update a file locally in the AMI Instance. To add it in the local file, you will need to do the following once the AMI Instance is launched and you are logged in using the <USER> user.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在执行Amazon Multi-Node安装，并且希望ColumnStore流程使用Amazon API工具，则需要提供一个具有与其相关的认证密钥的IAM角色，或者您可以在AMI中本地更新文件。实例。要将其添加到本地文件中，启动AMI实例并使用<USER>用户登录后，需要执行以下操作。

trans-unit.source: If you are doing a backup on the server and your tables all are MyISAM tables, consider using mysqlhotcopy instead because it can accomplish faster backups and faster restores.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在服务器上进行备份，并且所有表都是MyISAM表，请考虑使用mysqlhotcopy，因为它可以完成更快的备份和更快的还原。

trans-unit.source: If you are doing a lot of fast connections / disconnects, you should increase back_log and if you are running MariaDB 10.1 or below thread_cache_size.
trans-unit.target: 如果要进行大量快速连接/断开连接，则应增加back_log，并且如果您正在运行MariaDB 10.1或thread_cache_size以下。

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with how sort-merge works, consider the parallels to Tokudb. Each "sort" does some work of ordering things; each "merge" is quite efficient.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉 sort-merge 的工作原理,可以考虑与 Tokudb 的相似之处。每一个 "排序 "都会做一些排序的工作;每一个 "合并 "都是相当高效的。

trans-unit.source: If you are going to start/stop MariaDB a lot of times, you should create a ~/.my.cnf file for the common options you are using.
trans-unit.target: 如果您打算多次启动/停止MariaDB，则应为正在使用的常用选项创建 ~/.my.cnf 文件。

trans-unit.source: If you are having a problem creating a table after an new install is performed and you get the error "Error occurred when calling system catalog", chances are the System Catalog didnt get created by postConfigure. The call to create happens at the very end of postConfigure, so its possible that postConfigure didn't successfully complete or there was an error when trying to create it.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在执行新的安装后遇到创建表的问题,并得到 "调用系统目录时发生错误 "的错误信息,很可能是postConfigure没有创建系统目录。调用创建发生在postConfigure的最后,所以有可能是postConfigure没有成功完成,或者在尝试创建时出现了错误。

trans-unit.source: If you are installing MariaDB to replace MySQL, then you can leave out the call to mysql_install_db. Instead shut down MySQL. MariaDB should find the path to the data directory from your old /etc/my.cnf file (path may vary depending on your system).
trans-unit.target: 如果要安装MariaDB替换MySQL，则可以忽略对 mysql_install_db 的调用。而是关闭MySQL。MariaDB应该从旧的 /etc/my.cnf 文件中找到数据目录的路径（该路径可能因系统而异）。

trans-unit.source: If you are installing as a Single-Node system, you can follow install instructions on how to run postConfigure in the follow document for non-root user:
trans-unit.target: 如果你是以单节点系统的方式安装,你可以按照安装说明来运行postConfigure,在下面的文档中,非root用户。

trans-unit.source: If you are loading large tables, you might have to increase the values of net_read_timeout and net_write_timeout on both the master and slave servers. See Server System Variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果要加载大表，则可能必须在主服务器和从服务器上都增加 net_read_timeout 和 net_write_timeout 的值。请参阅服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If you are not in the database directory, you can check all the tables there by specifying the path to the directory:
trans-unit.target: 如果你不在数据库目录中,你可以通过指定目录的路径来检查那里的所有表。

trans-unit.source: If you are not sure whether a statement has implicitly committed the current transaction, you can query the in_transaction server system variable.
trans-unit.target: 如果不确定语句是否隐式提交了当前事务，则可以查询in_transaction服务器系统变量。

trans-unit.source: If you are not using Amazon Web Services as your S3 provider you must also specify s3-hostname and possibly change s3-protocol-version to "Original".
trans-unit.target: 如果您没有将Amazon Web Services用作S3提供程序，则还必须指定 s3-hostname 并可能将 s3-protocol-version 更改为“ Original”。

trans-unit.source: If you are performing Mariabackup SSTs with IPv6 addresses, then the socat utility needs to be passed the pf=ip6 option. This can be done by setting the sockopt option in the [sst]option group in an option file. For example:
