trans-unit.source: If you are performing Percona XtraBackup SSTs with IPv6 addresses, then the socat utility needs to be passed the pf=ip6 option. This can be done by setting the sockopt option in the [sst]option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用IPv6地址执行Percona XtraBackup SST，则需要为 socat 实用程序传递 pf=ip6 选项。这可以通过在选项文件的 [sst] 选项组中设置 sockopt 选项来完成。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are renaming a table, then it also requires the DROP, CREATE and INSERT privileges for the table or the database as well.
trans-unit.target: 如果要重命名表，那么它还需要表或数据库的 DROP ， CREATE 和 INSERT 特权。

trans-unit.source: If you are running MySQL or an older MariaDB, you should be aware of that if you are running the slave in binlog_format=STATEMENT mode, the slave will stop if the master is used with binlog_format set to anything else than STATEMENT.
trans-unit.target: 如果您运行的是MySQL或更旧的MariaDB，则应注意，如果您在 binlog_format=STATEMENT 模式下运行从属服务器，则在将 binlog_format 设置为 STATEMENT 以外的其他情况下使用主服务器时，从属服务器将停止运行。

trans-unit.source: If you are running an older MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 release that still uses Galera 2 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.2.x), then it is recommended to first upgrade to the latest MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 release that uses Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x).
trans-unit.target: 如果您运行的MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0版本较早,且仍在使用Galera 2(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.2.x),那么建议您首先升级到使用Galera 3的最新MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0版本(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.3.x)。

trans-unit.source: If you are running an older MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 release that still uses Galera 2 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.2.x), then it is recommended to first upgrade to the latest MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 release that uses Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x).
trans-unit.target: 如果您运行的MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5版本较早,且仍在使用Galera 2(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.2.x),那么建议您首先升级到使用Galera 3的最新MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5版本(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.3.x)。

trans-unit.source: If you are starting a slave against a fresh master that was configured for replication from the start, then you don't have to specify MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS.
trans-unit.target: 如果要针对从一开始就配置用于复制的 MASTER_LOG_FILE 启动从属服务器，则不必指定MASTER_LOG_FILE和 MASTER_LOG_POS 。

trans-unit.source: If you are starting the server with mysqld_safe, then you can set the system time zone with the --timezone option either on the command-line or in the [mysqld_safe]option group in an option file. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果要使用 mysqld_safe 启动服务器，则可以在命令行或选项文件的 [mysqld_safe] 选项组中使用 --timezone 选项设置系统时区。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are trying to get a nested dynamic column as a string use 'as BINARY' as the last argument of COLUMN_GET (otherwise problems with character set conversion and illegal symbols are possible):
trans-unit.target: 如果你想获得一个嵌套的动态列作为一个字符串,请使用'as BINARY'作为COLUMN_GET的最后一个参数(否则可能会出现字符集转换和非法符号的问题)。

trans-unit.source: If you are unsure which GPG public key you need, then it is perfectly safe to import both keys.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不确定你需要的是哪一个GPG公钥,那么导入两个密钥是完全安全的。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from 1.1.7 or have upgraded in the past you should run the MariaDB ColumnStore stored procedure. This updates the MariaDB FRM files by altering every ColumnStore table with a blank table comment. This will not affect options set using table comments but will erase any table comment the user has manually set.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是从1.1.7升级的,或者在过去升级过,你应该运行MariaDB ColumnStore存储过程。这将通过改变每个ColumnStore表的空白表注释来更新MariaDB FRM文件。这不会影响使用表注释设置的选项,但会删除用户手动设置的任何表注释。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB 10.1 release to MariaDB 10.2, then the versions will be compatible. Both MariaDB 10.1 and MariaDB 10.2 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从最新的MariaDB 10.1版本升级到MariaDB 10.2，则这些版本将兼容。无论MariaDB的10.1和MariaDB的10.2使用加莱拉3（即加莱拉wsrep提供商版本25.3.x），所以他们应该是兼容的。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB 10.2 release to MariaDB 10.3, then the versions will be compatible. Both MariaDB 10.2 and MariaDB 10.3 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从最新的MariaDB 10.2版本升级到MariaDB 10.3，则这些版本将兼容。无论MariaDB的10.2和MariaDB的10.3使用加莱拉3（即加莱拉wsrep提供商版本25.3.x），所以他们应该是兼容的。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB 10.3 release to MariaDB 10.4, then the versions will be compatible. MariaDB 10.3 uses Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), and MariaDB 10.4 uses Galera 4 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 26.4.x). This means that upgrading to MariaDB 10.4 also upgrades the system to Galera 4. However, Galera 3 and Galera 4 should be compatible for the purposes of a rolling upgrade, as long as you are using Galera 26.4.2 or later.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从最新的MariaDB 10.3版本升级到MariaDB 10.4，则这些版本将兼容。MariaDB 10.3使用Galera 3（即Galera wsrep提供程序版本25.3.x），MariaDB 10.4使用Galera 4（即Galera wsrep提供程序版本26.4.x）。这意味着升级到MariaDB 10.4也会将系统升级到Galera4。但是，只要您使用的是Galera 26.4.2或更高版本，Galera 3和Galera 4就应该兼容，以进行滚动升级。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 release to MariaDB 10.1, then the versions will be compatible. The latest releases of MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 and all releases of MariaDB 10.1 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要从最新的MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0版本升级到MariaDB 10.1，则这些版本将兼容。MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0的最新版本和MariaDB 10.1的所有版本都使用Galera 3（即Galera wsrep提供程序版本25.3.x），因此它们应该兼容。

trans-unit.source: If you are upgrading from the most recent MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 release to MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0, then the versions will be compatible. The latest releases of MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5 and MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0 use Galera 3 (i.e. Galera wsrep provider versions 25.3.x), so they should be compatible.
trans-unit.target: 如果你是从最新的MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5版本升级到MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0,那么这两个版本将是兼容的。最新版本的MariaDB Galera Cluster 5.5和MariaDB Galera Cluster 10.0使用Galera 3(即Galera wsrep provider版本25.3.x),所以它们应该是兼容的。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB Galera Cluster, then keep in mind that the first node will have to be bootstrapped.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB Galera Cluster，则请记住，第一个节点必须被引导。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB Galera Cluster, then you may want to try one of the following pages instead:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB Galera Cluster，则可能需要尝试以下页面之一：

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB MaxScale proxy, then you can use MaxScale to handle the whole process of taking down the master and replacing it with one of the slaves.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是MariaDB MaxScale proxy，则可以使用MaxScale来处理拆除主服务器并将其替换为从服务器之一的整个过程。

trans-unit.source: If you are using multi-source replication and if you would like to make this filter persist server restarts by adding it to a server option group in an option file, then the option file can also include the connection name that each filter would apply to. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是多源复制，并且希望通过将此持久过滤器添加到选项文件中的服务器选项组中来使服务器重新启动，那么该选项文件还可以包含每个过滤器将应用到的连接名称。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are using multi-source replication, then you need to specify a connection name when you execute CHANGE MASTER. There are two ways to do this:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是多源复制，则在执行 CHANGE MASTER 时需要指定一个连接名称。有两种方法可以做到这一点：

trans-unit.source: If you are using mysqldump for state transfer, and it failed for whatever reason (e.g. you do not have the database account it attempts to connect with, or it does not have necessary permissions), you will see an SQL SYNTAX error in the server error log. Don't let it fool you, this is just a fancy way to deliver a message (the pseudo-statement inside of the bogus SQL will actually contain the error message).
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用mysqldump进行状态传输，并且由于某种原因而失败（例如，您没有尝试与其连接的数据库帐户，或者它没有必要的权限），则服务器错误中将显示SQL SYNTAX 错误日志。不要让它愚弄您，这只是一种传递消息的好方法（伪SQL内部的伪语句实际上将包含错误消息）。

trans-unit.source: If you are using SELinux, then you may also need to set the SELinux context for the directory. See SELinux: Setting the File Context for Log Files for more information. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用SELinux，则可能还需要为目录设置SELinux上下文。有关更多信息，请参见SELinux：设置日志文件的文件上下文。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are using Semisynchronous Replication you can just stop the server with the SHUTDOWN command as the slaves should be automatically up to date.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是半同步复制，则只需使用SHUTDOWN命令停止服务器，因为从属服务器应自动更新。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB 10.2, then you would need to install Percona XtraBackup 2.4:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB 10.2，则需要安装Percona XtraBackup 2.4：

trans-unit.source: If you are using MariaDB 10.3 or earlier, you should checkout mariadb-3.x instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MariaDB 10.3或更早版本，则应 mariadb-3.x 。

trans-unit.source: If you are using mysqld_safe to start mysqld, then see the instructions at mysqld_safe: Configuring the Core File Size.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mysqld_safe 启动 mysqld ，请参见mysqld_safe上的说明：配置核心文件大小。

trans-unit.source: If you are using mysqld_safe to start mysqld, then see the instructions at mysqld_safe: Configuring the Open Files Limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 mysqld_safe 启动 mysqld ，请参见mysqld_safe上的说明：配置打开文件数限制。

trans-unit.source: If you are using systemd to start mysqld, then see the instructions at systemd: Configuring the Core File Size.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 systemd 启动 mysqld ，请参见systemd：配置核心文件大小中的说明。

trans-unit.source: If you are using systemd to start mysqld, then see the instructions at systemd: Configuring the Open Files Limit.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 systemd 启动 mysqld ，请参见systemd上的说明：配置打开文件数限制。

trans-unit.source: If you are using systemd, then there are a few relevant notes about startup failures:

trans-unit.source: If you are using systemd 228 or older, then you can execute the following to set an infinite timeout:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是 systemd 228或更早的版本，则可以执行以下操作来设置无限超时：

trans-unit.source: If you are using MIT Kerberos KDC, then you can create a keytab file using the kadmin utility. To do so, follow the steps listed below.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是MIT Kerberos KDC，则可以使用 kadmin 实用程序创建密钥表文件。这样做，请按照下面列出的步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Microsoft Active Directory KDC, then you may need to create a keytab using the ktpass.exe utility on a Windows host. The service principal will need to be mapped to an existing domain user. To do so, follow the steps listed below.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Microsoft Active Directory KDC，则可能需要使用Windows主机上的 ktpass.exe 实用程序来创建密钥表。服务主体将需要映射到现有域用户。这样做，请按照下面列出的步骤。

trans-unit.source: If you are using CONNECT to analyze files that can be modified by an external process, the indexes are of course not modified by it and become outdated. Use the OPTIMIZE TABLE command to update them before using the tables based on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用CONNECT来分析可以被外部进程修改的文件,索引当然不会被它修改而变得过时。在使用基于它们的表之前,使用OPTIMIZE TABLE命令更新它们。

trans-unit.source: If you are using DirectAdmin and you encounter any issues with Installing MariaDB with YUM, then the directions below may help. The process is very straightforward.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是DirectAdmin，并且在使用YUM安装MariaDB时遇到任何问题，那么以下说明可能会有所帮助。这个过程非常简单。

trans-unit.source: If you are using LIMIT, then in case of >= or > then there is an implicit NEXT implied, while if you are using <= or < then there is an implicit PREV implied.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用LIMIT，则在> =或>的情况下隐含NEXT，而如果使用<=或<则隐含的PREV。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Linux and if you installed MariaDB with a package manager, then MariaDB's files will probably be owned by the mysql user and the mysql group.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是Linux，并且使用包管理器安装了MariaDB，则MariaDB的文件可能归 mysql 用户和 mysql 组所有。

trans-unit.source: If you are using MySQL 8.0 or above, you have to use mysqldump to move your database to MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是MySQL 8.0或更高版本，则必须使用mysqldump将数据库移至MariaDB。

trans-unit.source: If you are using Spider with replication, you can expand the list of transaction errors to be retried by setting slave_transaction_retry_errors to the following to avoid network problems:
trans-unit.target: 如果您将Spider与复制一起使用，则可以通过将slave_transaction_retry_errors设置为以下内容来避免网络问题，从而扩展要重试的事务错误的列表：

trans-unit.source: If you are using Windows, then you will need to import pre-populated time zone tables. Some are available at MySQL's documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用Windows，则需要导入预填充的时区表。有些可以在MySQL的文档中找到。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a SAN for storage, the following must be taken into account:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用SAN进行存储,必须考虑到以下因素。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a SAN to store the database files, an ‘users‘ option will need to be added to the fstab entries (by the root user). For more information, please see the “SAN Mounted Database Files” section earlier in this guide.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用SAN存储数据库文件，则需要（由root用户）将“用户”选项添加到fstab条目中。有关更多信息，请参阅本指南前面的“ SAN挂载的数据库文件”部分。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a SAN to store the database files, the following must be taken into account:
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用SAN存储数据库文件,必须考虑到以下几点。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a Unix-like operating system, then you can populate these tables using the mysql_tzinfo_to_sql utility, which uses the zoneinfo data available on Linux, Mac OS X, FreeBSD and Solaris.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是类似Unix的操作系统，则可以使用 mysql_tzinfo_to_sql 实用程序填充这些表，该实用程序使用Linux，Mac OS X，FreeBSD和Solaris上可用的 zoneinfo 数据。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a Unix-like operating system, then you can set the system time zone by setting the TZenvironment variable in your shell before starting the server. For example:
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的是类似Unix的操作系统，则可以在启动服务器之前通过在外壳程序中设置 TZ 环境变量来设置系统时区。例如：

trans-unit.source: If you are using a log of on-disk temporary tables, increase the above to as much as you can afford. See Aria Storage Engine for more details.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是磁盘上的临时表的日志，则将上述值增加到您可以承受的范围。有关更多详细信息，请参见Aria Storage Engine。

trans-unit.source: If you are using a recent version of mysqldump to generate a dump to be reloaded into a very old MySQL server, you should not use the --opt or --extended-insert option. Use --skip-opt instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在使用最新版本的 mysqldump 生成转储以重新加载到非常老的MySQL服务器中，则不应使用 --opt 或 --extended-insert 选项。请改用 --skip-opt 。

trans-unit.source: If you are using an 'external' storage configuration, you will need to allow the new user to mount and unmount those filesystems. Add the 'users' option to those filesystems in your /etc/fstab file.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的是 "外部 "存储配置,您需要允许新用户挂载和卸载这些文件系统。在/etc/fstab文件中为这些文件系统添加 "用户 "选项。
